description.hltext_display: Nestlé sits of $28 billion in cash
description.content:
Nestl� sat on $28.3 billion (R192.6bn) in cash this year while competitors shelled out billions for acquisitions, investing instead on building a personalised nutrition business and making smaller purchases. Nestl� aims to become the leader in health science nutrition in 10 years, extending its dominance beyond coffee, powdered milk and baby food.
The Swiss chocolate maker says Nestl� Health Science?s products will help treat or prevent conditions such as high blood pressure and obesity. Nestl� shunned the three biggest food deals of the year, even after amassing a cash pile from the sale of its stake in Alcon. Kraft Foods purchased Cadbury in a $21bn deal; PepsiCo agreed to pay more than $3.8bn for Wimm-Bill-Dann Dairy & Juice in Russia; and KKR led a $4bn buyout of Del Monte Foods. ?They choose not to play,? said Thomas Russo, a partner at Gardner Russo & Gardner. ?We have long been rewarded by Nestl�?s willingness to step away from the moves made popular by the crowd.? The company would not say how much it was investing in the health unit, which opens on January 1 to develop gels, shakes and soluble powders.
Luis Cantarell, the head of the business, said he would spend five years developing a products to prevent or treat Alzheimer?s, obesity, diabetes and high blood pressure. ?There is a race to the middle between pharma and food,? Cantarell said in October. ?The opportunity is big. The risk is big, and the reward is big.? Nestl�?s capitalisation has swelled by more than Sf70bn (R495bn) since 2004, making it Europe?s second-most valuable company. It has returned Sf60bn of cash to shareholders.
The total return on Nestl� shares since the end of 2004 is 120 percent, compared with 9.4 percent for Kraft and 46 percent for PepsiCo.
In the past year, Nestl� shares have risen 11 percent, the same as PepsiCo. Kraft has gained 18 percent.
The Swiss firm has not shunned all acquisitions, buying Kraft?s North American pizza business for $3.7bn. It has made about 10 bolt-on acquisitions this year. ? Bloomberg

event_or_fact.property: he would spend five years developing a products to prevent or treat Alzheimer?s, obesity, diabetes and high blood pressure

description.hltext_display: "모바일 검색패턴, � � 과 다르다"
description.content: 아이뉴스24 스마트폰 보급이 1천만대를 향해 달려가고 있는 가운데 사용자들의 스마트폰 검색패턴이 기존 PC검색과 다른 양상을 보이고 있어 향후 모바일 광고시장 등 관련 업계에 어떤 영향을 미칠 지 주목된다. NHN(대표 김상헌) 검색포털 네이버는 22일 포털업계 최초로 모바일 검색 및 이용 트래픽 분석 결과를 공개했다. 이에 따르면, 지난 10월7일 네이버 애플리케이션 출시 후 2개월 여 동안 모바일 이용 트래픽을 분석한 결과 이용자들이 가장 많이 찾은 검색어는 '연평도'였던 것으로 나타났다. 이어 2위는 '박지성골', 3위는 '지연'이 차지하는 등 특히 실시간 이슈에 대한 검색이 많았던 것으로 집계됐다. 업체는 이와 관련, "컴퓨터를 켜지 않고 이동 중에도 즉각적으로 관심 정보를 얻으려는 욕구가 잦은 탓으로 분석된다"고 설명했다. 실제로 같은 기간 유선 웹에서 '연평도'는 11위, '박지성 골'은 8위에 그쳐 모바일 검색 순위와 대조를 이뤘다고 업체는 근거를 제시하기도 했다. 반면 이슈와 상관없이 꾸준한 검색이 이어진 검색어에는 로또·영화·날씨·야구·환율 등이 있었던 것으로 나타났다. 업체는 "이는 간단한 생활정보일 수록 유선웹보다 모바일로 찾는 경향이 많은 때문인 것으로 나타났다"며 "또 지도·길찾기·지하철노선도 등 위치기반 검색어도 찾는 이가 많아 이동기기인 모바일의 특징을 그대로 반영했다"고 분석했다. 모바일 인물 검색의 경우 가장 많이 찾은 인물은 걸그룹 티아라의 '지연'이었고, 인기가수 조성모와 결혼한 탤런트 '구민지' 가 2위, 슈퍼스타K2의 스타 '허각'과 '존박'이 나란히 3, 4위를 차지해 대중의 관심도를 실감하게 했다. 한편 11월 첫 주 이용량을 통해 모바일 웹 이용 패턴을 분석한 결과, 분야별로는 주중에는 방송·연예 관련 검색(39.4%)이 가장 많았고 그 뒤를 대중음악(11.9%), 스포츠(7.8%), 시사·미디어(7%) 등이 이었다. 특히 축구·야구 등 프로스포츠 경기가 몰려있는 주말에는 스포츠(32.8%) 분야가 방송·연예(23.8%) 분야 보다 이용자들의 관심을 더 높게 샀다. 이는 야외 활동시 관심 정보를 찾아보려는 욕구가 많았기 때문인 것으로 업체는 근거를 짚었다. 또 모바일웹 서비스는 전체적으로 주중과 주말이 비슷한 이용량을 보였으며 주중에는 증권, 메일 서비스가, 주말에는 TV편성표 서비스가 압도적으로 이용이 많았다. 날씨는 평일 오전 6~8시인 출근 시간대가 가장 이용이 많았던 반면 모바일지역 서비스는 나들이가 많은 주말 10시~18시 까지 많이 썼던 것으로 나타나 주중·주말 행태별 차이 분석에 힘을 실었다. 두 달 동안 이용자들이 가장 많이 찾은 TV프로그램은 시크릿가든, 슈퍼스타K, 성균관스캔들 순이었고 영화는 초능력자, 라스트갓파더, 부당거래 순인 것으로 나타났다. 게임은 아이온, 라그나로크, 프리스타일풋볼 순이었다. 한편 네이버는 전체 검색뿐 아니라 네이버앱에 추가된 새로운 검색 기능별 순위도 공개했다 포털 중 최초로 음악을 들려주면 제목과 가수, 가사를 찾아주는 음악검색 기능에서 동기간 동안 가장 많이 찾은 음악은 '2NE1'의 'Go Away'였다. 2위는 '소녀시대'의 '훗(Hoot)', 3위는 '슈프림팀'의 '그땐 그땐 그땐' 등으로 전체적으로 같은 기간 동안 최신 인기곡 순위와 비슷했다. 장르별로는 해외음악보다 가요 검색이 압도적으로 많았으며(88.8%), 발라드 가요, 댄스 가요, 랩·힙합 가요 순으로 검색이 많았다. 모르는 음악을 더 많이 찾아볼 것이라는 예상과는 달리 Top 100 순위 안에 포함된 해외음악은 4곡뿐이었다. 음성검색에서는 경쟁사의 CF에 등장하는 '꽃게'가 동기간 음성검색어 1위에 올라 이색적이었으며 이어 대중의 관심이 높은 '소녀시대'가 2위, 날씨(3위), 허각(4위) 등이 검색어 순위에 올랐다. 모바일 앱 중에는 '오빠믿지'앱이 가장 인기 검색어였고, 카카오톡(2위), 네이트온(3위) 등 통합커뮤니케이션 도구도 인기를 얻었다. 한편 네이버가 출시한 앱 중에서는 네이버앱-지도-미투데이-웹툰-윙버스 순으로 다운로드수가 많았고 이 중 가장 많이 구동하는 어플리케이션은 네이버앱-미투데이-블로그-웹툰 순으로, 모바일에서는 역시 SNS(소셜네트워크서비스)에 대한 충성도가 높게 나타났다. 특히 10월 초 모바일 전용 어플리케이션 출시 2개월 후 조사결과 네이버 모바일 일간 검색 수는 60%나 늘어 어플리케이션 유무에 따라 이용량의 차이를 보이는 것으로 분석됐다. 네이버의 모바일 검색 이용자는 남자(63.4%)가 여자(36.6%)보다 많았으며, 연령별로는 20대(45.9%)-30대(28.6%)-10대(15.6%)순으로 이용자가 많았다. /박정일기자 comja@inews24.com [BIZ] [BIZ] ☞ IT는 아이뉴스24 연예ㆍ스포츠는 조이뉴스24 ☞ ☞ 메일로 보는 뉴스 클리핑, 아이뉴스24 뉴스레터

description.hltext_display: Ivory Coast leader faces sanctions
description.content:
The United States has approved travel sanctions on Laurent Gbagbo and 30 of his allies as pressure mounted on the incumbent Ivory Coast leader to step down following last month's presidential election that the international community says he lost.
Meanwhile, the UN refugee agency said that some 6,200 people already have fled the West African country's post-election violence, and regional leaders called on Gbagbo to "yield power with dignity without further delay".
The rebuke from neighbouring nations carries added weight because Gbagbo's representatives have dismissed similar calls from former coloniser France and other Western nations as foreign interference.
The regional bloc, Ecowas, also said Gbagbo's weekend demand that thousands of UN peacekeepers leave the volatile country "would further heighten tensions and worsen the plight of the vulnerable".
The UN certified Alassane Ouattara as the winner of the November 28 vote, and Gbagbo on Saturday ordered the nearly 9,000 peacekeepers to leave immediately. The UN has refused to do so, and a Security Council resolution adopted unanimously on Monday has extended the force's mandate until June 30.
UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon warned on Tuesday that Ivory Coast faces "a real risk" of a return to civil war.
He said the UN peacekeeping force in Ivory Coast has "confirmed that mercenaries, including freelance former combatants from Liberia, have been recruited to target certain groups in the population".
He said forces loyal to Gbagbo are also obstructing the movement of UN personnel and their operations and called on member states to do what they can to supply the UN mission.

description.hltext_display: 斥资30亿 东航"三合一"整合国内货运航空巨无霸
description.content:
下的中国货运航空有限公司(以下简称“中货航”)、上海国际货运航空有限公司(以下简称“上货航”)、长城航空有限公司(以下简称“长城航”)等三家货运航企的重组先一步取得实质性进展。
12月20日，东航旗下中货航、上货航、长城航三家货运航空公司的四方股东东航股份、中远集团、长荣航空和新加坡货航正式签署了成立新中货航增资协议。
据东方航空证券部门人士介绍，中货航原本的经营中心就是在上海，以前中货航在上海大概占20%的市场份额，新成立的新中货航在上海的市场份额将增加至近25%的市场份额。 出资10.455亿元 东航控股新中货航
12月20日，东航集团旗下的中货航、上货航、长城航三家货运航空公司的四方股东东航股份、中远集团、长荣航空和新加坡货航正式签署成立新中货航增资协议。
增资前，东航是中货航、上货航和长城航的控股股东，中远集团持有中货航30%的股权；ConcordPacificLimited拥有上货航25%的股权，新加坡航空旗下的新加坡货航则是长城航空的股东之一。
东航、中远集团、Concord Pacific Limited、新加坡货航4家公司对中货航共增资人民币20.5 亿元。增资后，东航以出资人民币10.455亿元牢牢占据了新中货航51%的股份，成为新中货航的控股股东。
此外，中远集团出资人民币3.485亿元，ConcordPacific Limited出资人民币3.28亿元，新加坡货航出资人民币3.28亿元。新中货航的持股比例分别为：东航持股51%、中远集团持股17%、Concord PacificLimited持股16%、新加坡货航持股16%。
新的中货航将收购上货航、长城航的航空货运主业及关联资产，包括上货航的全部资产、负债、飞机、人员、航线以及合同等，初步转让价格为2931.60万元。而长城航的初步转让价格为3.87亿元。
东航方面称，中货航向长城航购买资产符合公司发展战略，既有利于增强中货航的可持续发展能力，也避免了同业竞争，符合公司和全体股东的整体利益。
立足上海
地空合一建立“长三角根据地”
新中货航的成立获得国资委、民航局、上海市政府的支持。国资委一位副主任指出，中国货运航空起步晚、规模小，在国际市场上份额较少，因此，国家去年就把长城航的51%股份划给了东航，此次又实现了以上海为基地的3家货运航空公司齐聚东航，都是为了探索更好利用航空区域资源。
东航集团总经理兼东航股份公司董事长刘绍勇表示：“中货航自1998年成立后，发展航空货运事业一直是东航的战略目标之一。我们要将新中货航打造成为一家具有国际竞争力的航空货运公司，为中国物流事业的振兴和上海'两个中心'的建立作最大贡献。”
东航认为，上海市场在中国的货运市场中具有得天独厚的货源条件，不过，潜力巨大的上海市场也同样面临激烈的竞争。对此，新的中货航希望通过拓展空地联运，打造延伸产业链的物流企业来应对竞争。
“长三角是全民航潜力最大的市场。”东航董事长给新的中货航设定了立足上海、立足长三角的战略。新的中货航将借助股东强大的腹舱资源，全力打造上海货运枢纽，做强做优上海核心市场；将在浦东机场设立长三角卡车转运中心，同时利用现有的900亩土地，自建航空货栈；将实施空地合一的经营模式，向价值链的两端延伸业务。新的中货航已经向国家邮政局申请邮政经营权，将大力发展快件、邮件、特货等高附加值货源。
据东方航空证券部门人士介绍，中货航原本是以航空货运为主，并不涉及地面运输。看来，新中货航要想建立地面运输网的话，恐怕要从头做起。
东航的全球货运“野心”
东航董事长刘绍勇、总经理马须伦两人提到，新的中货航将依托4家股东的力量，构建从中国内地延伸至欧美亚洲的航线网络。新的中货航现有18架全货机，为中国最大货运航空公司。今后将尽快整合中货航、上货航、长城航的资源，优化机队结构，4种机型将归并为B777、B747，并在“十二五”期间扩大成30架的机队规模。
中货航总经理朱益民表示，重组后几家股东会在市场和网络上进行协调，比如中货航就计划与新加坡货运在澳洲航线实现代码共享，将新中货航的网络迅速拓展到全球各地。
据了解，新中货航的"十二五"战略还确定机队规模30架的目标，并考虑适时加入全球货运联盟。东航对于新的中货航的设想包括打造欧美区域枢纽，通过区域枢纽辐射非洲、南美，巩固亚太市场优势，并考虑适时加入货运联盟，依托网络资源，加强辐射能力；利用先进的信息化手段，推进全球货运跟踪系统项目建设。
目前，上海的航空货运市场几乎全部被以UPS、DHL为首的国际航空货运巨头垄断。而国航和国泰早先宣布成立的合资货运航空公司已获得所有政府审批，基地同样是在上海。
新中货航希望通过拓展空地联运，打造延伸产业链的物流企业来应对竞争。
据东航介绍，国内货航公司对国际市场份额的占据快速下降，从1995年的65%下降至2009年的28%。“离国家的物流业振兴规划和上海建设航运中心的目标，差距太大，迫切需要打造货运航空的巨头。”东航总经理马须伦讲到。
据记者调查了解，以前的中货航涉及的业务只是航空运输这一块，可以说是附加值低、成本高的业务，如果环境不好，甚至还会亏本经营。而新中货航成立后，东航明显要摆脱这种吃力不讨好的局面了。
马须伦认为，未来新中货航就是要走“天地合一”的路子，向价值链的两端延伸，做大空地联运，并大力发展快件运输，提供端到端、门到门的服务。“最近，中货航还向邮政局申请了快递经营资质，希望发展邮件、特货等高附加值运输业务。” (记者 矫 月)

description.hltext_display: SARB Oct leading indicator up 11.5%
description.content:
South Africa's leading economic
indicator rose 11.5% year-on-year (y/y) in October from a 16.3% increase
recorded in September, according to central bank data released on Wednesday.
The country's seasonally adjusted leading economic indicator provides a
guideline for economic growth for at least six months ahead.
The latest increase takes the indicator to an index level of 129.8 which,
on a trend basis, is higher than the 121.8 index level in December 2009.
Month-month (m/m) growth has returned to negative territory, registering a
0.6% decline from a 0.8% rise in September.
September's index was revised downwards to 130.6 from 131.9.
The leading indicator had been over 120 and nearer to 130 for the whole of
2007. It however slowed and then dissipated when the first recession in 17
years was entered in late 2008.
The coincident indicator - which moves in line with the economy - for
September came in at 142.2 from a revised 142.5 (142.7) a month before. The
lagging indicator was reported at 99.4 from a revised 100.5 (102.1).
The leading indicator confirmed a few months ahead that South Africa's
economic growth would slow somewhat in 2010.
The coincident indicator is an economic factor that varies directly and
simultaneously with the business cycle, thus indicating the current state of
the economy. The lagging indicator changes after the economy has already begun
to follow a particular trend.
The South African Reserve Bank uses over 200 economic time series to
determine the turning points of the South African business cycle. Using these
indicators, the leading, coincident and lagging composite business cycle
indices are produced that indicate the direction of the change in economic
activity rather than the level of economic activity. - I-Net Bridge

description.hltext_display: 数据帝现身说法：一级翅膀最低花费1000RMB
description.content:
作者：中关村在线 叶其明 【原创】 CBSi中国·ZOL 2010年12月22日 09:34 [评论]
神魔大陆的1级翅膀少了1000RMB就是扯淡，尤其是像战士、法师、火枪这样的DPS职业出翅膀！
下面是个大概的分析统计：
OK，我们先花费了2000RMB把金币买好了，然后开始搞翅膀！！
我相信不会有人在20级出翅膀，真有这样的人，我只能说这哥们有钱，而且是有钱人中的脑残，脑残中的极品，极品中的精锐，精锐中的王者。
话说，有钱不代表不珍惜钱，不珍惜钱不代表随便扔钱，反正玩神魔到现在，没看见哪位哥20级出翅膀，30级我也没看见过。（或许是我孤陋寡闻了）
我们说比较合理的吧，很多40级装备出翅膀，那么我们算下40级装备出翅膀需要多少钱钱。
首先我们看看翅膀要求：1级翅膀需要达到光泽100度——1级宝石1点光泽、2级宝石2点光泽、3级宝石6点光泽。
那么要想达到100光泽，有如下几条道路：
第一条：17个3级石头=17个洞
第二条：16个3级石头+2个2级石头=18个洞
第三条：15个3级石头+5个2级石头=20个洞
第四条：14个3级石头+8个2级石头=22个洞
第无条：13个3级石头+11个2级石头=24个洞
以此类推（经过计算，2级石头越多，洞越多，强化不划算）
大概得出第三种，也就是15个3级石头+5个2级石头=20洞，光泽可以达到100，消费也算比较便宜的。
现在我们就拿这样的宝石搭配例子，算算需要多少钱吧！
宝石价格在各个区存在差别，据我所知道的，我们区诸神梦境算比较适中，不算贵，也不算便宜，所以就拿我们区的宝石价格算吧！
以下皆为1级宝石价格：
锐利：17J
毁灭：28J
割裂：15J
自然：16J
灵巧：6J
泉水：4J
鹰眼：6J
敦厚：5J
好吧，我们首先满足那些只为出翅膀的人吧，既然只看重翅膀，毫无实用，那么肯定按最低价格算了。
因为一件装备不能打重复的宝石，所以选择价格最低的3种。
8个3级泉水+7个3级敦厚+5个2级鹰眼=100光泽度
3级泉水=5个2级泉水=25个1级泉水=25*4=100J
3级敦厚=5个2级敦厚=25个1级敦厚=25*5=125J
2级鹰眼=5个1级鹰眼=5*6=30J
宝石合成剂：
以上可见，总共15个3级宝石，5个2级宝石，那么需要：15个2级合成剂+80个1级合成剂=15*80叶子+80*40叶子=4400叶子=（约300J）
所需要宝石总价格：
8个3级=8*100J=800J、7个3级敦厚=7*125J=875J、5个2级鹰眼=5*30J=150J
宝石费用合计：800J+875J+150J+300J=2225J
40级装备，武器+9，其余全部+6，需要多少J，自己算去，难道总共7砖都不要？虽然我没有强化40级装备，但根据30级和50级装备推算，40级装备强化也不便宜。
所以，出最“垃圾”翅膀，大约估计3000J=1000RMB，这里垃圾只是说价格便宜，其实对于诗人、牧师等BUFF职业，这样的宝石也算比较合理，所以他们出这样的翅膀也很合理。
但是，对于DPS职业而言，出1级翅膀先在这个价格上*3吧，绝对保守价格！！
其实，不管BUFF还是DPS，自然石头是必然会打的，这个价格就比泉水+敦厚贵了，所以，DPS职业要想出翅膀，准备5000RMB左右再说吧！！

description.hltext_display: Rand steadies vs US dollar
description.content:
South Africa's rand steadied against the dollar on Wednesday, with market players expecting it to stay in familiar ranges in thin holiday trading.
Stock futures were steady after the bourse closed at its highest level in 30 months on Tuesday. The JSE's blue chip Top-40 March futures contract ticked up 0.06 percent ahead of the 9am SA time start of trade.
By 08:35 SA time, the rand was trading at 6.83 to the dollar, not far from Tuesday's New York close of 6.8275.
The rand tried and failed to break resistance at 6.80 in the previous session and is unlikely to pierce it due to thin volumes in the market. ?Liquidity and underlying interest in the market is rapidly dissipating as we approach the Christmas festivities and holidays, and momentum in any particular direction will be limited,? said Tradition Analytics in a note.
Government bonds firmed, supported by expectations that the central bank may reduce interest rates in the first quarter of 2011.
The yield on the 2015 note was down four basis points to 7.41 percent and that on the 2026 note fell 5.5 basis points to 8.395 percent.
Bonds have also been boosted by foreign inflows that have tripled this year compared to last. - Reuters

description.hltext_display: Sve o začinima za božićne kolačiće
description.content: Keksi i kolači koje sa zadovoljstvom pečemo i jedemo u vrijeme blagdana sadrže čitav niz vrlo aromatičnih začina koji daju specifičan, božićni okus. Dobra vijest je da upravo ti začini…

description.hltext_display: Welkom-Bultfontein road closed
description.content:
The R701 between Welkom and Bultfontein in the Free State was closed on Wednesday due to rain damage to a bridge, the province's roads department said.
Motorists travelling between Welkom and Bultfontein were advised to use the Odendaalsrus - Wesselsbron - Bultfontein route. Motorists travelling to Bloemfontein can use the R30 Rev Mahabane route via Theunissen and Brandfort but that route is still under construction so motorists should be cautious and vigilant, the roads department said. - Sapa

description.hltext_display: 投资白银热钱高涨 工商银行个人白银交易翻番
description.content: 国内个人投资白银的热钱高涨。工商银行公布的最新数据显示，11月份该行个人账户白银实现交易量4852吨，较上月猛增191%，交易金额达278.88亿元人民币，较上月增长231%，创下了新的交易纪录。截至11月末，工商银行账户白银业务已累计实现交易量7167吨。 8月份以来，国际白银价格步入上涨行情，在各类大宗商品中年度涨幅排名第一。(熊焱)

description.hltext_display: Risk för förseningar i färdtjänsten
description.author: webmaster@nt.se
description.content:
Norrköping- Vid ett normalt trafikläge skulle vi kunna lösa resorna i rätt tid, men som väderläget är idag och SMHI:s prognoser om ytterligare snö och blåst för julafton, gör att vi vill förvarna våra resenärer om att det kan uppstå förseningar av större eller mindre omfattning under dagen, säger Benny Sköld, chef för länsfärdtjänsten i ett pressmeddelande.
Julafton är årets största dag för färdstjänsten, ingen annan dag är det så hård belastning och Östgötatrafiken har laddat upp med cirka 100 fordon.
Östgötatrafiken vädjar också till de som är tveksamma att resa julafton avbokar snarast för att få loss resurser till de som ska ut och åka.
NT
Större text Mindre text

description.hltext_display: Judgement day for Taki
description.content:
Hundreds of people blocked the entrance to the Durban High Court on Wednesday waiting to hear the fate of the man accused of murdering 13 women and dumping their bodies in sugarcane fields.
The court is expected to hand down judgment in the case against Thozamile Taki who is accused of killing 13 women after promising them jobs.
Their bodies were found in sugarcane plantations in Umzinto, KwaZulu-Natal, and in tea plantations in Port St Johns, in the Eastern Cape in 2007.
Among the people packed into the court gallery were women wearing ANC Women's League uniforms.
There was a strong police presence outside the courtroom.
The case was expected to start at 10am. - Sapa

description.hltext_display: MALLOY TAPS DOCTOR TO OVERSEE STATE HEALTH AGENCY
description.content: Hartford - Gov.-elect Dan Malloy has named a physician and Massachusetts health official to oversee Connecticut's public health agency. Malloy on Tuesday announced he's selected Dr. Jewel Mullen as his pick for commissioner of the Department of Public Health. She's the latest in a growing list of appointees for the new Democratic administration. Dr. Mullen, who lives in Guilford, Conn., directs the Bureau of Community Health and Prevention for the Massachusetts Department of Public Health. Her bureau covers a range of programs, including school-based health centers, oral health, sexual assault services, family planning, and youth violence prevention.

description.hltext_display: 소니, 2010 기업부문 우수 블로그 � � �
description.content: 아이뉴스24 소니코리아(대표 이토키 기미히로)는 22일 자사의 기업 블로그 '소니, 스타일을 말하다'가 '2010 대한민국 블로그 어워드'에서 기업 부문 우수 블로그에 선정됐다고 발표했다. 소니는 지난해에 이어 2년 연속 '대한민국 블로그 어워드'를 수상했으며, 이를 기념해 오는 23일부터 29일까지 고객 감사 이벤트를 실시한다. 올 한해 동안 소니 블로그 포스트 중 가장 마음에 드는 포스트를 선정해 URL과 함께 선정 이유, 상 이름 등을 이벤트 페이지에 댓글로 남기면 된다. 소니코리아 김덕봉 부장은 "소니 블로그는 2년 연속 수상을 통해 대표적인 기업 블로그로서 자리매김할 수 있게 됐다"며 "앞으로도 소니 블로그가 고객들과의 활발한 소통의 장으로서 역할을 하길 기대한다"고 말했다. 한편 '소니, 스타일을 말하다' 블로그(www.stylezineblog.com)는 지난 2008년 8월 19일 개설됐다. 이 블로그에서는 소니 브랜드와 제품, IT 트렌드 전반에 대한 다양한 정보를 다루고 있다. /박웅서기자 cloudpark@inews24.com [BIZ] [BIZ] ☞ IT는 아이뉴스24 연예ㆍ스포츠는 조이뉴스24 ☞ ☞ 메일로 보는 뉴스 클리핑, 아이뉴스24 뉴스레터

description.hltext_display: 果然很失望龙之谷天启巢穴称号很不给力
Columnist trashes police unfairly and inaccurately
description.content:
Recently, Ron Williams has twice written columns trashing our local police. His evidence includes initial police news releases that were not correct. Williams accuses police of doctoring and lying in these releases. Williams has not heard the terms fog of war and initial reports are often incorrect. I envision him trying to rush the police for a statement immediately following any shooting.
Most upsetting is that Williams finds it remarkable that not a single incident of police fault is found in nine fatal NCCo Police shootings. Shame on his disappointment! He goes on to show his disdain by saying, of a police shooting in Elsmere: The officers were found you guessed it free of any misconduct.
I can only conclude that Ron Williams believes the only righteous police shooting is one where the police officer is shot first. Williams needs to partake of a few ride-arounds with police to see firsthand what these fine men and women deal with every day.
To be fair, Williams does not outright accuse the police of wrongdoing in a shooting. It is his pompous string of innuendo and insinuation that turns my stomach.
Rich Shears, Wilmington

event_or_fact.property: Columnist trashes police unfairly and inaccurately Recently

description.hltext_display: 山西阳泉市侨联青年委员会成立 《章程》获通过
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据阳泉市侨联消息，近日，山西省阳泉市侨联在市宾馆召开了“阳泉市侨联青年委员会成立暨一届一次会议”。阳泉市侨联主席信秀莲主持了会议。山西省侨联副主席、省侨联青年委员会主席范安龙，阳泉市委常委、统战部长杨永生，市政府副市长刘兆林出席了会议并与全体侨联青年委员合影留念。 阳泉市侨联青年委员会委员是由全市青年归侨、侨眷、留学回国人员及港澳同胞、海外华裔新生代组成，具有广泛的代表性和先进性，是阳泉市侨界青年中的优秀代表。
此次会议实到委员45名。会议始终在和谐而又活跃的气氛中进行。特别是在讨论中，青年委员们自我介绍，自我推荐，发言踊跃，具有独特敏锐的思考方式。经过大家充分的酝酿和讨论，决定会议聘名誉主席1名，名誉副主席2名；选举产生了第一届侨联青年委员会主席1名，副主席5名，秘书长1名，常务委员9名；通过了《阳泉市归国联合会青年委员会章程》及其他办法草案。
会上，山西省侨联范安龙主席和市领导杨永生、刘兆林对新成立的青年委员会及当选人员表示祝贺！同时对各位委员在今后的工作和发展中提出了希望和要求，指出：大家要充分认识成立侨联青年委员会的重要意义；不断提高服务大局，服务侨界的能力；要坚持党的领导，强化政治意识，加强组织建设；使用好侨联青年委员会这个平台，立足阳泉、立足山西，胸怀祖国、面向世界，成就一番事业和理想。会议在热烈的掌声中圆满结束。
会议号召阳泉市广大侨界青年朋友，要以此次会议为契机，认真学习和领会省、市领导的讲话精神，切实增强履行职责的素质和能力，增强使命感和责任意识，扩大对外交往、扩大社会影响，注重团结，与时俱进、开拓创新，以饱满的热情和崭新的姿态，为阳泉经济社会的不断进步和侨联事业的蓬勃发展做出贡献！

description.hltext_display: 你是否是那仅有的7%龙之谷天启巢穴攻略
description.content:
是的今天龙之谷开启全新篇章，同时也会开启最难的副本龙之谷天启巢穴，据传说韩国龙之谷天启巢穴通关率仅有7%，看过这篇高手的攻略以后你是否能成为那7%的一员呢？热血澎湃的我们学习天启巢穴吧。
首先我们先对这个副本简单的介绍一下。这里仅介绍普通版本，高级版本的大同小异，只是怪物数量以及强度会增加，别的没有太多变化。
龙之谷天启巢穴介绍：
前不久看过龙之谷天启视频的朋友可能对龙之谷天启巢穴有了一个相当的认识，即使不认识也不要紧，这里会给你介绍的。
龙之谷天启巢穴位置以及条件
龙之谷天启巢穴入口在[黑山角]。练兵场的右边。入场卷就是[狮蝎]的入场卷。狮蝎天启票是[通用]的。所以大家不用担心这个。
因为龙之谷天启巢穴副本比较长。在这里。我把天启巢穴副本的关卡分为[3]个部分。
龙之谷天启巢穴地图关卡介绍：
第1部分。【广场】一共[7]个关卡。包括一箱子房间。
[序]。【天启的测试】白色幽灵。
[1-1]。【害怕光的镰刀死神】死神
[1-2]。【五炮姬】五只黑烟。其中只有1只是真的。
[1-3]。【闪烁的精灵】巨大的魔灵。
[1-4]。【铁皮的追击】巨大的铁皮胖子。
[1-5]。【双子牛】红色蓝色的骷髅牛。
[1-6]。【堕落的船长】那个拿着两把弹珠枪的犀牛船长。
[1-7]。【礼物】皇冠箱子。
第2部分【广场内部的守护】
[2]个关卡。
[2-1]。【暴走的雷兽】雷胖子。
[2-2]。【红烟兄弟】左右道各会出现一只红烟。
第3部分【核心】
[1]个关卡。
[3-1]。【天启】天启副本的最终BOSS。
进门位置为[入口]。地图移动顺序 :A---B C---D
龙之谷天启巢穴攻略：
每个关卡前都有一门。门上有一定数量的锁。需要钥匙将锁打开以后门才会打开。
每个关卡结束后都会得到固定数量的钥匙。用来开启下个关卡的锁。
击倒[序]白幽灵之后会打开一箱子。内有2把钥匙。可以开启2把锁。
在广场中间有[6颗封印石]。这6颗封印石是根据每个关卡的开锁数量来解封的。
也就是说。如果你刷的关卡需要开1把锁。那关卡完成后6颗封印石就会有一颗被解封。
如果是需要开2把锁的关卡。那关卡完成后则是2颗封印石解封。以此类推。
当封印全部解封时。通往[2-1]暴走的雷兽的门将会打开了。
击倒雷胖子后。A传送点被激活。进入A点会被传送到B点。。
然后队伍会被随机分配成两组(2人/组)。分别从左右两侧前进。左右各出现一只红烟。
任意一边击倒该边的红烟之后中间的障碍会消失。便可以从中间去到另一边支援队友。
2边的红烟全部击倒后。前往天启BOSS的大门将会打开(C点)。
进入C点。便会出现在D点。天启BOSS将会出现。
感谢您支持本篇龙之谷天启巢穴攻略！

description.hltext_display: Robot restaurant opens in China
description.content:
Service with a smile also comes with an electronic voice at China's Dalu Robot restaurant.
The hotpot meals are not yet as famous as the staff, who never lose their patience and never take tips.
The restaurant, which opened this month in Jinan in the northern Shandong province, is touted as China's first robot hotpot eatery where robots resembling Star Wars droids circle the room carrying trays of food in a conveyor belt-like system.
More than a dozen robots operate in the restaurant as entertainers, servers, greeters and receptionists. Each robot has a motion sensor that tells it to stop when someone is in its path so customers can reach for dishes they want.
The service industry in China has not always kept up with the country's rapid economic growth and can be quite basic in some restaurants, leading customers in the Dalu restaurant to praise the robots.
"They have a better service attitude than humans," said Li Xiaomei, 35, who was visiting the restaurant for the first time.
"Humans can be temperamental or impatient, but they don't feel tired, they just keep working and moving round and round the restaurant all night."
Inspired by space exploration, robot technology and global innovation, the restaurant's owner, Zhang Yongpei, said he hoped his restaurant would show the world China was a serious competitor in developing technology.
"I hope this new concept shows that China is forward-thinking and innovative," he said.
Mr Zhang said he hoped to roll out 30 robots - which cost 3,870 each - in the coming months and eventually develop ones with human-like qualities that serve customers at their table and can walk up and down the stairs.

description.hltext_display: 巽位法宝探奇 《武林外传》闪耀新玩点
description.author: zolgame

description.hltext_display: "소비자, 이동통� 서비스내역 잘 몰라"
description.content: (서울=연합뉴스) 안승섭 기자 = 소비자들이 요금과 부가서비스 등 이동통신 서비스의 구체적인 내용을 잘 모르는 것으로 조사됐다. 녹색소비자연대는 1천명의 소비자에게 각각 19개 질문을 제시해 이동통신 서비스에 대한 상식 수준을 조사한 결과 100점 만점에 평균 35.9점을 기록했다고 22일 밝혔다. 응답자 중 의무약정 및 부가서비스에 대한 정확한 정보를 아는 응답자는 15%에 지나지 않았다. 또 해외로밍 무선데이터 서비스요금을 정확히 아는 응답자도 28%에 불과했다. 녹색소비자연대는 이동통신사가 소비자들에게 관련 정보를 많이 제공해야 한다고 지적했다. ssahn@yna.co.kr (끝) 저작권자(c)연합뉴스. 무단전재-재배포금지.

description.hltext_display: U.S. pivotal clinical trial of Medtronic CoreValve begins
description.author: Editors
description.content: Medtronic, Inc. (NYSE: MDT) today announced the beginning of its Medtronic CoreValve® U.S. Pivotal clinical trial in the United States. The first CoreValve transcatheter aortic valve implantation (TAVI) procedure was performed by David H. Adams, M.D., and Samin K. Sharma, M.D., at The Mount Sinai Medical Center in New York City. The Medtronic CoreValve® System, a revolutionary treatment alternative to open-heart surgery for patients with severe aortic stenosis, will be investigated in more than 1,200 patients at up to 40 U.S. clinical trial sites. A second CoreValve case took place this week at El Camino Hospital in Mountain View, Calif.; St. Francis Hospital, The Heart Center in Roslyn, N.Y, also has been activated in the trial and is screening patients. "Through this trial, we are investigating a minimally invasive, non-surgical alternative to open-heart surgery for valve replacement in patients with severe aortic stenosis," said Dr. Adams, who is chair of the Department of Cardiothoracic Surgery at Mount Sinai and is a national co-principal investigator of the CoreValve U.S. clinical trial. "This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of the CoreValve system for use in the United States, where many thousands of patients are diagnosed with severe aortic stenosis every year." The CoreValve System is designed with self-expandable technology to replace a diseased aortic valve percutaneously (through the skin), usually through the femoral artery, without open-heart surgery or surgical removal of the native valve. The CoreValve device is delivered through a controlled deployment delivery system. "We are very excited with this first step in bringing this important transformational therapy to patients in the United States with life-threatening aortic valve disease, particularly those patients who have limited surgical options," said Jeffrey Popma, M.D., national co-principal investigator of the Medtronic CoreValve U.S. Pivotal Trial and director, Interventional Cardiology at the Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center in Boston.

description.hltext_display: GameDay New and Notes
description.content:
Charlie Litchfield/IPT Boise State running back Doug Martin By Dave Southorn dsouthorn@idahopress.com Idaho Press-Tribune | 0 comments
BRONCOBITES
• Boise State and Utah have met six times prior to today’s bowl game, with the Broncos holding a 4-2 edge. The first meeting was in 1980’s season opener, which the Broncos won 28-7 at Utah, and the most recent was a 36-3 Boise State win at Utah.
• The only two schools outside the six automatic-qualifying BCS conferences to play in two BCS bowls are Boise State and Utah. TCU will join the ranks Jan. 1 in the Rose Bowl, but both the Utes and Broncos are 2-0 in their BCS games.
• Boise State is 6-4 all-time in bowl games, having made a bowl every season since 1999 except 2001. The Utes are 12-3 all-time in bowl games, with the first coming in 1939. They’ve won nine bowls in a row.
• Boise State senior tight end Tommy Gallarda and junior middle linebacker Byron Hout will both miss the bowl game with foot injuries.
• Boise State has played at Sam Boyd Stadium in Las Vegas three times, losing all three in the 1970s. The Broncos are due to return in 2011 to play UNLV.
FIVEKEYS
For Boise State
1. Razor focus. Some folks think as long as the Broncos feel like showing up, they’ll win. It may not be that simple, but having the mentality of finishing the season right, even if it’s not the Rose Bowl, will be paramount.
2. Let it fly. Opposing defenses have to be hip to the Kellen Moore to Titus Young deep ball, right? Well, few have figured it out. A nice, long TD pass early will give the Broncos tons of momentum.
3. Put some pressure on. One thing the Broncos do better than anyone is rush the quarterback. After all, they lead the nation with 3.8 sacks per game, behind a deep defensive line. Getting in the face of Terrance Cain, who hasn’t started since September, will be a good way to end 2010 on a
winning note.
4. Teach me how to Dougie. In the last six quarters, junior RB Doug Martin has 13 carries. The downhill runner, once he is in a groove, is consistently capable of picking up 7, 8 or 10 yards. If the Broncos can get him going against a good Utah rush defense, it will also open up the play action pass for Moore and company.
5. It’s not a vacation. Though we all know East Carolina was better than many believed, there was a feeling the Broncos did a bit too much relaxing in Hawaii in 2007. Las Vegas has its pratfalls, but if the Broncos can stay off the Strip, they’ll be in good shape.
PLAYERS TO WATCH
BOISE STATE RB: DOUG MARTIN
Boise State coach Chris Petersen jokes that Doug Martin only knows one speed, but that’s not so funny to anyone that’s tried to tackle him this season.
The junior running back, fulltime at the position after starting his sophomore campaign playing some defense, has rushed for 1,113 yards on 184 carries this season, scoring 11 touchdowns. His yardage total is already 12th best in a single season at Boise State, and just 94 yards shy of tying the No. 6 slot.
“He’s been great,” Petersen said. “He’s been consistent and he’s been as reliable as anyone.”
A very fresh Martin will greet Utah today — he has 13 carries in the last six quarters after the infamous second half at Nevada and only eight attempts in the season finale against Utah State. The Utes have the nation’s No. 8 rush defense, but Martin’s about the best they’ve seen.
“He’s a smart runner, he’s patient, and when he has a hole, he runs hard,” Utah defensive end Christian Cox said.
Ask Martin about his year, and he cracks one of his high-wattage smiles.
“Doug Martin, running back — I just like the sound of that,” he said.
UTAH WR/PR/KR: SHAKY SMITHSON
Could there possibly be a better name for one of the nation’s best return men?
Shaky Smithson’s very apt nickname wasn’t always so fitting, but it’s one he has sure grown into.
“When I was 6 in Baltimore, I’d be playing with my brothers, and they’d be complaining, saying ‘you’re always so shaky,’” said Smithson, whose real name is Antoine. “It stuck, and now it’s a good thing.”
Averaging 19.7 yards per return, the shifty senior leads the nation in punt return average, and his two touchdowns are tied with three others for the second-most nationally.
“Whether it’s his returns or if teams kick away from him and out of bounds, he’s a huge reason we’ve scored as many points as we have, giving us a lot of short fields,” Utah coach Kyle Whittingham said.
Smithson also has proven to be the type of player that has thrived no matter where he is place on the field. He stepped in at running back late last season with the Utes’ backs dinged up. This season, he’s thrown a touchdown pass and has caught 22 passes for 327 yards and three scores.
“I’m glad I’ve been asked to help out in a lot of ways,” Smithson said. “I feel I can contribute with the ball in my hands and the coaches have let me earn that trust.”
With Boise State’s punt return defense ranked 91st, Smithson is very much a cause for concern.
“He’s just one of those dynamic guys — he’s just special,” Boise State coach Chris Petersen said. “There’s a few things you can do to coach up a returner, and the rest is God-given skills, speed and instincts.”
More about Boise State Football

description.hltext_display: 券商论道：年尾行情是否就要来了？
description.content:
主持人：羊城晚报记者 陈道
嘉宾：
英大证券研究所所长 李大霄 华泰联合首席策略分析师 程峰 开年3200点，现在2900点，股市折腾一年，不但没有进步，还倒退了。2010年的股市就这样惨淡收场吗？剩下的8个交易日，能不能表现好点？
年尾估值修复值得期待
羊城晚报：股市几乎一整年都走得窝窝囊囊，很多投资者对今年股市失去了信心。但昨日地产股的领头反弹，又让大家对年尾行情燃起希望，你们认为年尾还有行情吗？
程峰：中国股市往往出乎意料。大家觉得有行情的，结果往往没有；对它失去信心，却又通常给你意外惊喜。这次很可能也是这样。现在大家觉得股市虽然下有支撑，但上有压力，通胀、加息、紧缩等等政策预期，觉得股市今年完了。但是，今年一年来，金融、地产等周期性板块估值长期处于低位，年尾进行一番估值修复，很应该。而且这些板块权重较大，对指数推动很大。所以年尾行情不但可以有，而且可能还真的有。
李大霄：对年尾行情以及明年年初行情可以乐观期待。关键是金融地产等大盘股、主流股的股价处在偏低位置。另外，宏观政策比较平稳，中国走在经济复苏的前头，欧美的复苏也在不断进行中，现在大家担心的加息利空等，不足以改变市场方向。股市的方向是振荡向上。而且临近年终，券商以及私募基金的结算也进行得七七八八，该分的钱也早就筹备好了，不需要再在市场卖股票了。综合起来，对未来一段时间的股市行情可以看好。
周期性股票推动纠错行情
羊城晚报：如果年尾有行情，按照你们的逻辑，是不是金融、地产等所谓的周期性机会来了。年尾行情会不会成为股价结构调整的纠错行情？
程峰：有错必究。有可能。我鼓励中小投资者大胆做周期性股票的抄底者。阶段性的风格转换已经到来。从昨日股市表现看，明显有资金流入地产、金融等周期性板块。如果地产股能持续反弹，必然带动金融、水泥、钢铁等周期性股票的反弹。而且必然引导投资者抛售高估值的中小板以及创业板股票，加入持有周期性股票的行列，从而引发一波纠错行情。
李大霄：我最看好今年不涨甚至去年也没怎么涨的所谓“N年不涨股”。这类股票以周期性股票居多。所以周期性股票的机会来了。它们可能是中石油、中石化，地产、银行、建筑、水泥等板块的个股。 陈道

description.hltext_display: SCG announces management reshuffle
description.content:
Siam Cement Group today announced a management reshuffle, effective on January 1, which will see Roongrote Rangsiyopash, vice president and chief financial officer, assume the presidency of SCG Paper.
Chaovalit Ekabut, incumbent president of SCG Paper, will then become vice president for finance and investment, as well as chief financial officer and president of Cementhai Holding.
Aree Chavalitcheewingul, managing director of Thai-German Ceramic Industry, will become a vice president for corporate administration.
The reshuffle was designed ahead of the retirement of Cementhai Holding president Damri Tunshevavong in May 2011. From January 1, Damri himself would become an advisor to the president and CEO office.

description.hltext_display: Kakuta wants regular football
description.content:
Chelsea forward Gael Kakuta set his sights on earning a regular place in Carlo Ancelotti's first team after committing his future to the club by signing a new four-and-a-half year deal on Tuesday.
Reports had suggested the French youngster could be set to leave Stamford Bridge at the end of the season after talks that opened in September failed to come to an agreement over a contract extension.
"Since I signed for Chelsea when I was 16 all I was thinking about was to get to the first team," said Kakuta, who has made nine appearances for the club this season.
"Now I have been playing a few times with the first team and I have signed for four-and-a-half more years, I have to make a way for myself into the starting 11 and make my dream come true.
"The manager said to me it is the right time to play and I think for me it is as well. It's my job to do my best and try to play more often and show the coach that I am good enough to play in the team."
Blues boss Carlo Ancelotti has put faith in Kakuta, Dutch youngster Jeffrey Bruma and English prospect Josh McEachran, rather than dip into the transfer market this season.
The Italian also hopes to add 15-year-old Feyenoord defender Nathan Ake in January.
The Londoners are understood to have come to an agreement with the Dutch club over the transfer of the youngster, who is expected to sign a professional contract at Stamford Bridge when he turns 16 in February - a deal which will see Feyenoord receive compensation set by a tribunal.
The move for Ake has caused controversy in Holland, where Feyenoord sporting director Leo Beenhakker, without naming Chelsea specifically, expressed his dismay at how he thinks Premier League clubs are taking youngsters from their clubs before their 16th birthday.
"It's driving me crazy that hot prospects are walking away from us like this," Beenhakker told Dutch newspaper Algemeen Dagblad. "The Premier League clubs spoil the market with their behaviour. Other clubs in Europe aren't doing this kind of things, but the English sides just don't care."

description.hltext_display: Huskies win No. 89, surpass UCLA's mark
description.author: Jessica Hill / AP
description.content:
Former Connecticut basketball player Tina Charles (left) hugs current Huskies guard Tiffany Hayes after the historic win. Men's teams, women's teams, it doesn't matter. No. 89 belongs to UConn. It beats them all.
The No. 1-ranked Huskies women's basketball team topped the 88-game winning streak set by John Wooden's UCLA men's teams of 1971-74, beating No. 22 Florida State 93-62 on Tuesday night. Playing with the relentlessness that has become its trademark - and would have made Wooden proud - Connecticut blew past the Seminoles as it has so many other teams in the last 2 1/2 years.
"I don't want my team to compare themselves to anyone," UConn coach Geno Auriemma said. "I'm not John Wooden, and this isn't UCLA. This is Connecticut, and that's good enough."
Maya Moore had a career-high 41 points and 10 rebounds, and freshman Bria Hartley added 21 points for the Huskies, who have not lost since April 6, 2008, against Stanford in the NCAA tournament semifinals. Only twice during the record run has a team come within single digits of UConn - Stanford in the NCAA championship game last season and Baylor in early November.
When the final buzzer sounded, UConn players sprinted across the floor to shake hands with the student section as fans held up "89" signs and "89" balloons bobbed in the stands behind center court. Two other fans raised a banner that read "The Sorcerer of Storrs" - a play on Wooden's nickname, "The Wizard of Westwood."
After a brief huddle in front of their bench, UConn players re-emerged wearing "89 and Counting" T-shirts. As fans roared, the players bounced around the court before posing for photos.
"It's pretty amazing. It really is," said Auriemma, at a rare loss for words.
The Huskies own seven national titles and four perfect seasons under Auriemma, and they've produced a galaxy of stars that includes Rebecca Lobo, Diana Taurasi, Jennifer Rizzotti, Sue Bird and Tina Charles.
Two days after beating No. 11 Ohio State to tie UCLA, UConn toppled the mark in front of a sellout crowd of 16,294 at the XL Center that included Wooden's grandson, Greg, attending his first women's game.
"My grandfather would have been thrilled. He would have been absolutely thrilled to see his streak broken by a women's basketball team," the 47-year-old Wooden said. "He thought, especially in the last 10 years, that the best basketball was played at the collegiate level - and it wasn't by the men."

description.hltext_display: [동영상뉴스]델이 만� 5인치 태블릿폰 ‘스트릭’
description.content:
글로벌 PC제조기업 델(DELL)이 국내 스마트폰 시장에 출사표를 던졌다. 델코리아는 22일 태블릿PC와 대형 스마트폰 기종 간의 중간형태인 5인치 태블릿형 스마트폰 '스트릭'을 내놓았다. 전세계적으로 5인치형 스마트폰을 제품군에 갖춘 브랜드는 오직 델뿐이다.
임정아 델 북아시아본부장은 22일 서울 광화문 KT올레 스퀘어에서 기자 간담회를 열고 "델은 컴퓨팅 디바이스 기술력을 바탕으로 모바일 컴퓨팅 시대를 내다보고 3년을 준비해 왔다"며 "이제 5인치 스마트폰 시대를 열며 새로운 모빌리티 시장을 개척해 나갈 것"이라고 밝혔다.
'스트릭'은 델이 수 십년간 쌓아온 PC 제조 기술력을 응집해 만든 스마트폰으로 국내에서는 가장 큰 5인치 아몰레드 디스플레이를 갖춘 모델이다. 특히 사용자 인터페이스는 안드로이드 기본 형태뿐 아니라 델만의 별도 화면구성인 '스테이지(Stage)' 버전 1.0을 적용했다. 뒷모습은 DELL 로고와 함께 배터리 탈거형으로 설계되었고 500만 화소 카메라가 장착된 모습이다.
이와 함께 출시한 '베뉴'는 전 세계 최초로 한국에서만 출시하는 4인치대 아몰레드 스마트폰이다. '스트릭'과 동일하게 코닝사의 고릴라 글래스를 적용했고 정전식 터치감을 증대키 위해 패널 상면부는 볼록으로 처리하는 고난위 가공기술을 적용했다.
임 본부장은 "5인치 스마트폰은 가장 이상적인 모빌리티를 실현한 컴퓨팅 기기"라면서 "화면이 너무 크면 휴대하기가 불편하고 너무 작으면 데이터 서비스 활용에 한계가 있었던 게 사실"이라고 말했다.
스마트폰 대형화는 최근 잇달아 출시된 HTC 디자이어 'HD2'와 팬택의 '베가엑스' 등과 일맥상통한다. 특히 내년부터는 LG전자를 비롯한 HP, 모토로라 등 외산 기업들 조차 스마트폰 대형화를 집중할 태세다.
게다가 팬택의 베가엑스가 PC급에 이르는 고성능 DDR2 메모리를 장착하고 HTC 등 외산브랜드를 집중 공략할 계획이어서 4인치를 넘는 스마트폰 라인의 경쟁은 더욱 치열할 것으로 보인다.
델 관계자는 "델은 델만이 가진 아이덴티티로 시장을 리드해 나갈 것이고 과감한 마케팅 투자 예산이 모바일 시장에 집중될 예정"이라고 말했다. 스트릭과 베뉴는 오는 24일 KT를 통해 판매된다.
< 디지털뉴스팀 손재철기자 son@khan.co.kr >

description.hltext_display: اجرای موسیقی «مختارنامه» در تالار رودکی
Anelka agent eyes US switch
description.content:
Nicolas Anelka's brother and agent has claimed the striker could move to the United States when his Chelsea contract expires.
The 31-year-old's deal at Stamford Bridge runs until 2012, by which time he will have spent 11 seasons in English football. And he could be tempted to follow former France team-mate Thierry Henry to the States in search of a fresh challenge.
Claude Anelka said, in comments reported by the Daily Star: "Nicolas told me he is interested in playing in the United States. We could see him crossing the Atlantic, and I'm serious when I say this."
He added: "He asked himself what he will do once his current contract runs out.
"The US is quite something, and a dream destination. He says he will give it a try, even though he would earn less money than in somewhere like Qatar."

description.hltext_display: Shortsightedness, as usual, reigns in state government
description.content:
There are times when taxpayers might wonder whether the folks in state government can see past June 30. That's the annual deadline to pass Delaware's budget. Each year it seems the drama starts slowly, with mild concern over a dim threat to government services. Then as we enter the new year, the pace quickens, and the threats grow more ominous. Layoffs and service cuts are threatened.
And then, just as the ax is about to come down on some innocuous, but popular, program, money is found, and the program is spared -- along with the salaries and benefits and special favors for a host of employees and interests.
The found money comes either from unclaimed property or a federal stimulus program.
The effect is that the found money spares the legislators from making really tough decisions. Presumably, the euphoria produced by finding that money prevents the legislators from seeing a few months down the road.
For example, the latest threat is that the recession is still here and the federal stimulus dollars drop drastically in the next fiscal year. That's true enough, but everyone knew the money would be reduced in the 2012 fiscal year and few people thought the recession would disappear quickly.
Why didn't anyone listen to the warnings last year, when longer-range savings could have been found? That would have been more prudent than counting on found money -- again.

description.hltext_display: GOP objections threaten whistle-blower rights bill
description.content:
WASHINGTON — House Democrats scrambled on Tuesday to salvage legislation that would bar federal agencies from punishing employees who report corruption, waste and mismanagement after Republicans linked the bill to the WikiLeaks scandal.
In hopes of securing needed GOP support, Democrats offered to strip from the bill provisions that extend whistle-blower protections to workers at U.S. intelligence agencies — seen as a major concession by backers of the bill. Even though the bill's supporters say the legislation does not permit public disclosures of classified information, Republicans had complained it still might encourage leaks by employees in the most sensitive government jobs.
Even that concession may not be enough to sway House Republicans, who see no reason to rush the legislation before Congress adjourns for the year.
A spokesman for Rep. Darrell Issa, R-Calif., who next month becomes chairman of House Oversight and Government Reform Committee, said GOP lawmakers contacted the congressman with their worries about the Obama administration's plan to deal with WikiLeaks. They also wanted to know whether the legislation included provisions to block further disclosures.
"There's a lot of ambiguity out there about what the administration is or isn't going to do on WikiLeaks," said spokesman Frederick Hill. "I think that's really creating a lot of concern."
Three years ago, Issa and more than 100 other Republicans had voted for a version of whistle-blower protection legislation that ultimately didn't make it through Congress.
In a Dec. 16 letter to Issa, a coalition of public interest groups urged Issa to back the new bill, saying "efforts to draw a connection between WikiLeaks and this good government measure are misguided."
On Monday, one of the coalition members, the Project on Government Oversight, was more critical of Issa.
"We are disappointed that Mr. Issa has flip-flopped on the bill he used to support and instead is perpetuating the myth that this bill would protect WikiLeaks," the Project said in a statement posted on its Web site.
Without the national security provisions, the Whistleblower Protection Enhancement Act provides expanded whistle-blower protections for civil service employees outside the intelligence agencies, including thousands of Transportation Security Administration baggage screeners and headquarters staff. The rights also extend to employees who challenge the censorship or misrepresentation of federal research.
Whistle-blowers outside the intelligence agencies would also be able to seek a jury trial in federal court to appeal dismissals or demotions.
Losing the national security provisions would be a significant blow to the White House and the public interest coalition that spent months working with the House and Senate to shape the bill. With the GOP taking control of the House in January, supporters of the legislation expect a less sympathetic climate if they're forced to start anew.
In an e-mailed statement, White House spokesman Reid Cherlin said the "administration has been working to resolve the objections raised by the minority in the House, and we will continue to do so."
The Senate approved the bill on Dec. 10. House Democrats had wanted to pass the measure before adjourning for the year under a procedure used to pass non-controversial bills quickly. But a two-thirds vote is required, which meant roughly 40 Republicans were needed.
Changing the Senate bill would shift the procedural picture. If the Republicans agree to the scaled-down bill, the House could pass it in short order. But it would have to go back to the Senate for final approval because of the changes. And that may not happen because there is so little time left before adjournment.
__
Online:
Project on Government Oversight: http://pogo.org/

There's a lot of ambiguity out there about what the administration is or isn't going to do on WikiLeaks; I think that's really creating a lot of concern.

description.hltext_display: 케이티스, 가천길병원과 U헬스 사업 맞손
description.content: 아이뉴스24 KT의 자회사인 케이티스(대표 노태석, 이하 ktis)는 가천의대길병원과 u헬스 사업 공동추진에 관한 협력을 맺었다고 22일 발표했다. 이날 가천의대길병원 뇌과학연구소 1층 회의실에서 진행된 MOU 체결식에는 가천의대길병원 이태훈 원장, ktis 노태석 대표이사를 포함한 양측 주요 임원이 참석했다. 양측은 MOU를 통해 u헬스 사업을 공동으로 추진하게 된다. ktis는 가천의대길병원과 u헬스 사업모델을 공동으로 개발하고 사업화할 계획이다. 이 회사는 그동안 서울 지역 종합병원을 포함해 약 30여개 병의원 예약센터를 운영하며 쌓아온 고객서비스 운영노하우와 전문인력 인프라를 이번 사업에 활용한다는 전략이다. ktis 노태석 대표는 "언제 어디서나 예방, 진단, 치료, 사후관리의 의료서비스를 기대하는 고객의 요구가 높아짐에 따라 u헬스 산업이 급성장할 것으로 예견되고 있어 이번 MOU에 거는 기대가 크다"고 소감을 밝혔다. ktis는 향후 가천의대길병원을 비롯한 타병원과의 u헬스 및 예약센터 운영에 대한 협력을 지속적으로 확대해 나간다는 방침이다. /강은성기자 esther@inews24.com [BIZ] [BIZ] ☞ IT는 아이뉴스24 연예ㆍ스포츠는 조이뉴스24 ☞ ☞ 메일로 보는 뉴스 클리핑, 아이뉴스24 뉴스레터

description.hltext_display: A股再遭做空盘打压午后一度跳水
description.content:
[世华财讯]沪深A股12月22日午后震荡下挫。沪深A股早盘窄幅高开后受做多盘惯性驱使窄幅上扬，盘面个股多数延续弱势震荡，从个股涨跌比例上看，多数个股仍然处于弱势下跌局面；午后两市遭遇权重品种打压盘中一度跳水，其中多数个股的调整趋势有明显加剧，做多盘稀缺令大盘企稳稍显乏力，预计两市将延续弱势震荡。
盘面看，个股普跌，农林牧渔、酿酒、金融、传媒娱乐等板块跌幅居前，东方海洋 ( 002086 ) 跌4.85%、通葡股份 ( 600365 ) 跌5.91%、广发证券 ( 000776 ) 跌2.84%、天威视讯 ( 002238 ) 跌3.99%；生物制药、房地产、煤炭、商业百货等板块亦有走弱，华海药业 ( 600521 ) 跌3.95%、四川圣达 ( 000835 ) 跌2.68%、万科A ( 000002 ) 跌1.42%；钢铁、石油、交通运输、有色金属等板块走势稍强，方大特钢 ( 600507 ) 涨停、准油股份 ( 002207 ) 涨1.80%、海南航空 ( 600221 ) 涨2.75%；新股方面，N瑞尔（300150）涨78.84%、N量子（300149）涨54.21%、N昌红（300151）涨31.26%，两市约两至三成股票上涨。

description.hltext_display: Angry Samba seeks Rovers exit
description.content:
Captain Christopher Samba is intent on leaving Blackburn after being angered by the decision of new owners Venky's to sack manager Sam Allardyce.
The Indian food group axed Allardyce within a month of completing their takeover of the club, with Steve Kean currently in temporary charge as a long-term replacement is sought.
"If this is the way the club's going to be run from now on, I don't want to be part of it and I want to leave," said the 26-year-old in remarks reported by the Sun.
"As captain it's very difficult to say this but I've thought long and hard about it. Nobody in football understands the decision to sack Sam.
"We could have been relegated last year and Sam saved the club, so how can he be treated like this now?"
Samba exempted chairman John Williams from blame, though, before pleading for a swift decision over Allardyce's replacement.
"I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision. He's a football man and respects what a great job Sam has done," he said.
He added: "The players and fans need answers about the club's future. Unless we commit to who the manager is, how can we attract big players in January?"

event_or_fact.property: The players and fans need answers about the club's future.
I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision.

description.hltext_display: 华夏银行小企业贷款超千亿
description.content:
到今年末，华夏银行小企业贷款余额将突破千亿元，小企业贷款占比不低于18.9%。
华夏银行行长樊大志昨天在“华夏银行龙舟计划小企业成长加油站”全国巡回活动上表示，未来三年，华夏将力争为20万的小企业客户提供全面金融服务，其中小企业贷款客户数不低于5万，小企业贷款占比不低于30%。(记者熊焱)

description.hltext_display: NCB네트웍스, 사파이어 잉곳 장비 사업 진출
description.content: 아이뉴스24 디스플레이 광학검사 장비 전문회사 NCB네트웍스(대표 허대영)는 LED 소재인 사파이어와 차세대 소재인 탄화규소(SiC) 잉곳 장비를 생산하기 위해 싱가포르 인텔로그와 계약을 체결했다고 22일 발표했다. 두 회사는 각각 300만 달러를 출자해 자본총액 600만 달러의 조엔트 벤처 회사를 설립한다. 이 회사는 오는 2011년 3월부터 생산을 시작해 국내외 수요처에 사파이어 잉곳 장비를 공급할 계획이다. 인텔로그는 사파이어 잉곳 제조 장비 및 SiC 잉곳 제조 장비를 개발해 납품 실적을 갖고 있는 러시아 국영연구소(EZAN)와 공동으로 장비 자동화를 추진할 계획이다. NCB네트웍스 관계자는 "SiC는 지식경제부에서 미래시장을 선점할 10대 핵심소재로 선정한 소재"라며 "실리콘과 탄소의 화학 반응으로 만들기 때문에 고효율 및 대용량 고전압에 쓸 수 있는 전력 소재"라고 말했다. 이어 "고온에서도 형태를 유지하기 때문에 전기적 신호를 전달할 때 안전해 꿈의 반도체 소재라고 불리고 있지만 지금 100% 수입에 의존하고 있는 상황"이라고 덧붙였다. /김도윤기자 moneyno@inews24.com [BIZ] [BIZ] ☞ IT는 아이뉴스24 연예ㆍ스포츠는 조이뉴스24 ☞ ☞ 메일로 보는 뉴스 클리핑, 아이뉴스24 뉴스레터

description.hltext_display: Indian missile test 'successful'
description.content:
India claims to have successfully tested a short-range, nuclear-capable missile with a range of 220 miles.
The army twice fired the surface-to-surface missile Prithvi II from a range in Chandipur in the eastern state of Orissa, a senior official said.
The missile, which would target mainly military installations, can carry a warhead weighing up to 1,100lb (500kg).
It has already been tested more than half a dozen times. However, a test of the same missile three months ago failed due to technical problems.
India and long-time rival Pakistan routinely test-fire missiles, and usually notify each other ahead of the launches.
New Delhi has said it developed its current crop of missiles - including the short-range Prithvi, the anti-tank Nag and the supersonic BrahMos - as a deterrent against neighbours China and Pakistan.
India's Agni-II missile, with a range of up to 1,250 miles, can put areas of southern China within striking distance. And the Agni-III, successfully tested last year, can carry nuclear warheads across much of Asia and the Middle East.

description.hltext_display: FCC backs net neutrality; Congress will vote later
description.author: JOELLE TESSLER
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- The has approved rules meant to prohibit broadband companies from interfering with Internet traffic flowing to their customers. The 3-2 vote Tuesday marks a victory for FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, who has spent a year crafting a compromise. The FCC's three Democrats voted to pass the rules, while the two Republicans opposed them, calling them unnecessary regulation. The new rules are likely to face intense scrutiny on Capitol Hill once Republicans take over the House.
Known as "net neutrality," the rules prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services, such as those from rivals.
The rules require broadband providers to let subscribers access all legal online content, applications and services over their wired networks -- including online calling services, Internet video and other Web applications that compete with their core businesses. But the rules give broadband providers flexibility to manage data on their systems to deal with problems such as network congestion and unwanted traffic, including spam, as long as they publicly disclose their network management practices.
The regulations prohibit unreasonable network discrimination -- a category that FCC officials say would most likely include services that favor traffic from the broadband providers themselves or traffic from business partners that can pay for priority. The rules do, however, leave the door open for broadband providers to experiment with routing traffic from specialized services such as smart grids and home security systems over dedicated networks, as long as these services are separate from the public Internet.
In addition, the regulations prohibit wireless carriers from blocking access to any websites or competing applications such as Internet calling services on mobile devices, and require them to disclose their network management practices, too. But the rules give wireless companies more leeway to manage data traffic because wireless systems have more bandwidth constraints than wired networks.
Genachowski said the regulations will prohibit broadband providers from abusing their control over the on-ramps that consumers use to get onto the Internet. He said the companies won't be able to determine where their customers can go and what they can do online.
Public interest groups decried the regulations as too weak, particularly for wireless systems. Some feel the rules may not do enough to ensure that broadband providers do not favor their own traffic or the traffic of business partners that pay for priority -- resulting in a two-tiered Internet.

event_or_fact.property: the companies won't be able to determine where their customers can go and what they can do online
the regulations will prohibit broadband providers from abusing their control over the on-ramps that consumers use to get onto the Internet

description.hltext_display: 北京两超市查出“哈喇”食品(名单一览)
description.content:
市工商局今天通报，北京首航国力商贸有限公司第45店和亿客隆路通超市在近期食品监测中发现了过氧化值超标的锅巴和干果,就是人们俗称的“哈喇味儿”。
市工商局今天宣布停售16批次食品，其中从首航、亿客隆两家超市发现的食品分别是“澳华”番茄小妩锅巴和散装金丝猴干果。据介绍，过氧化值偏高可能是食品油炸时间过长或温度过高，或者由于产品包装不严实、贮存环境条件不好导致的。而食用过氧化值超标的食品严重的可引起人体肠胃不适、腹泻、损害肝脏等。
市工商局本周共抽取食品样本731个，不合格样本16个，抽检合格率为97.81%。其中蔬菜、鲜肉、食盐、大米、食用油、食糖、水发产品、鲜奶等产品抽检全部合格。D044
样品名称 商标 生产日期 标注生产单位名称 不合格项目 好吃嘴 鹏程 2010.8.27 湖南省平江县珍德沅食品厂 甜蜜素
方师傅 方师傅 2010.8.09 郑州市管城区方师傅熟食厂 甜蜜素
夏威夷木瓜 金箭 2010.5.17 广州市同喜食品有限公司 柠檬黄
牛筋王 张师傅 2010.7.22 安徽正元食品有限公司 甜蜜素
非常6+1 振仔 2010.8.06 郑州市管城区振宇食品厂 糖精钠甜蜜素
土豆丝 华沣 2010.8.12 郑州市管城区农华食品厂 甜蜜素
话梅皇 中祥 2010.8.31 天津市中祥食品有限公司 二氧化硫
韩国料理 尔滨 2010.8.27 郑州市管城区尔滨食品厂 甜蜜素
素鸡柳 彩姐 2010.8.26 新郑市树林食品厂 山梨酸甜蜜素
红心地瓜干 薯哥 2010.7.8 连城县鸿兴食品厂 二氧化硫
小米辣 城旺 2010.8.1 东莞市城旺食品有限公司 二氧化硫
番茄小妩锅巴 澳华 2010.7.17 廊坊市澳华食品有限公司 过氧化值
金丝猴干果 -- 2010.4.6 河南迁里缘食品公司 酸价过氧化值
快乐同桌 张建湘 2010.6.3 郑州市管城区张建湘食品厂 甜蜜素
奶香雪梅 绿洲庄园 2010.1.8 揭西县金和绿洲庄园食品厂 二氧化硫
味美思棒 清林 2010.7.23 郑州市管城区清林食品厂 甜蜜素
杨滨点评
小食品别买
“郑州管城区”
记者发现，本周下架的16种不合格食品中，标着“郑州管城区”生产的就有6种，差不多占了三分之一。而郑州管城区已经多次出现在本市的下架黑名单中。
据了解，麻辣食品的质量问题，一直是郑州市质监局的一个心病，其中管城区的麻辣食品生产企业就占了郑州市企业的一半。当地媒体曾列出这些不正规麻辣调味面制食品存在的安全隐患。一是潜在的铅中毒，一些不正规的生产企业使用铸铁机器挤压面食，铸铁中残留的铅会被挤压进面里，造成铅污染;二是病菌污染，一些不正规的企业，生产工序和包装工序均为手工操作，食品极易被病菌污染;三是滥用食品添加剂，一些小企业没有真空包装设备，便超量使用食品添加剂以保证产品长期不变质。
因此，不管是超市进货，还是消费者选购，尽量远离“郑州管城区”的小食品。 记者杨滨

description.hltext_display: 12月22日期指午后下跌 主力合约IF1101现跌0.87%
description.content:
[世华财讯]12月22日沪深300股指期货各合约午后快速下跌。主力合约IF1101现报3,263.0点，跌28.6点或0.87%，最高至3,307.0点，最低至3,232.0点。下月合约IF1102现报3,298.0点，跌28.2点或0.85%；季月合约IF1103现报3,329.8点，跌31.8点或0.93%；隔季合约IF1106
现报3,412.8点，跌25.0点或0.73%。
期指午后快速下跌。今日股指小幅高开后震荡盘整，昨日权重股走强推动股指走出一根大阳线，但股指仍未脱离前期箱体，表明短期市场相当谨慎，加之临近年末，市场活跃度也有所下降，午后昨日大幅上涨的房地产板块集体走低，带动股指快速下探。从盘面看，此前多头利用利好消息再次向上突破，主力合约IF1101短线向上趋势基本确立，目前市场主要以消化之前的获利筹码为主，短期市场或仍将延续盘整。总体而言，市场交易氛围有所改善，对于后市持乐观态度。

description.hltext_display: 解析2010年中国证券业十大焦点事件(3)
description.content:
八、15年姻缘到头
大摩与中金“分手”
今年11月26日，备受关注的摩根士丹利 (下简称“大摩”)转让34.3%中金股权的交易正式获得中国证监会批准。12月8日，大摩方面宣布，出售中金公司股权预计将实现7亿美元的税前收益，该笔交易预计将于年底前完成。至此，成就内地首家合资券商的双方15年牵手之路走到尽头。
按照大摩的初始入股成本计算 3700万美元计算，如不考虑历年分红，大摩这笔投资的回报约为19倍。出售中金股权获批后，12月2日晚，参股华鑫证券的飞乐音响、上海金陵等四家公司发布公告，称华鑫证券已于11月29日召开了董事会及股东会，同意华鑫证券出资6.8亿元与大摩成立合资投行公司，华鑫证券占三分之二股权。 大摩与中金的结缘，注定是中国证券史上里程碑式的事件。1995年,大摩成为第一个与中方机构合资成立投资银行的外资金融机构。在“蜜月期”，大摩曾帮助中金迅速成长。
但是，随着“蜜月期”过去，双方在企业文化、公司治理上存在的分歧开始显现，大摩在中金公司的重大决策上逐步被边缘化。而大摩入主中金的初衷是希望将中国投行业务变成其全球业务的一部分。为了寻求控制权,大摩再次在中国寻找投行业务着陆点。
2007年,大摩跟华鑫证券就签订了设立合资证券公司的协议，由于中国证监会相关规定,外资公司仅能在国内成立一家合资券商,因此大摩那时就计划出售中金股权。直到今年今年3月，大摩出售所持中金股权取得阶段性进展。其后，在股权转让的审批过程中，大摩和中金方面三缄其口，直至11月26日获批。
九、广发起大早赶晚集
借壳上市三年终成正果
2010年2月12日，牛年的最后一天，也就是虎年的前一天， 经历三年多的借壳过程后，广发证券在深交所上市交易。
搭上牛年上市末班车的广发证券，上市首日牛劲十足。当日收报50.05元，大涨374.4%，成为两市最贵的券商股；市值达1254.75亿元，仅次于海通证券和中信证券。
广发证券上市进程可谓一路坎坷。虽然广发证券是券商行业最早提出借壳上市的券商，却起了个大早赶了个晚集。仅在2007年，就有国金证券、海通证券、东北证券、国元证券、长江证券相继成功借壳上市。
2006年9月，S延边路公告了广发证券借壳上市的方案，但一直没有获得证监会正式批准。S延边路仅上市交易了7个交易日，就于2006年10月20日起再次停牌。S延边路股价的超前异动引起了监管层的关注，随后的2007年5月，证监会初步调查完成后称，广发证券借壳延边公路上市信息披露违规，涉嫌内幕交易。这一事件被媒体称为“董正青案”。
“董正青案”经过两次庭审后，2009年1月9日在广州天河区人民法院进行了宣判。董正青被判构成泄露内幕信息罪，判处有期徒刑4年，并处罚金300万元。“董正青案”的宣判搬掉了阻碍广发证券上市的主要“绊脚石”。
2010年1月，延边公路发布新股改方案，并获通过。2010年2月，证监会有条件通过广发证券借壳方案。 自此，历经三年磨难的广发证券终于圆梦上市。
十、国泰君安曲线上市
子公司抢先登陆H股
在母公司受限于“一参一控”之际，国泰君安证券在港子公司――国泰君安国际控股有限公司(简称“国泰君安国际”)却另辟蹊径，于今年7月8日，在香港挂牌上市，成为首家以IPO形式登陆香港交易所的中资券商。
国泰君安国际此次的发行方式为全球发售,实际发行4.51亿股,其中90%为国际发售,10%为香港公开发售。发售价为每股4.3港元,发行市盈率为24倍,募集资金19.39亿港元。分析认为，国泰君安国际在港IPO的成功启动，不仅实现了内地券商首家以首发形式登陆国际资本市场，也实现了券商谋求上市形式的创新。
早在2009年4月初，国泰君安董事会讨论通过了国君香港在香港交易所IPO上市议案，今年3月8日，国泰君安国际正式成立，其通过国泰君安香港，间接全资持有国泰君安(香港)证券等六家子公司以及50%的国泰君安基金管理的股权。
国泰君安国际招股说明书显示，2008年和2009年国泰君安国际的收入分别为5.17亿港元和5.83亿港元；净利润分别为1.23亿港元和3亿港元，增长速度显著。 （记者 潘侠 吴婷婷 于德良）

description.hltext_display: 04:41 Evacuation as storm hits California
description.content:
Authorities in California have begun evacuations as concerns grow about potential mudslides in the wildfire-scarred foothills across the southern part of the state.
Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger declared a state of emergency for Kern, Orange, Riverside, San Bernardino, San Luis Obispo and Tulare counties because of the extreme weather conditions.
Officials ordered evacuation of 232 homes in La Canada Flintridge and La Crescenta, foothill suburbs of Los Angeles, because of forecasts of more heavy rains on already saturated mountainsides.
San Diego police evacuated dozens of homes and businesses but no structural damage was reported in the city, said Lt Andra Brown. A commuter rail station was closed in the city's Sorrento Valley area due to heavy rains. About a dozen homes were evacuated in a cul-de-sac south of downtown.
A mudslide closed one street in the La Jolla area of San Diego. Farther inland in Riverside, a surge of water swept through a homeless camp near the banks of the Santa Ana River.
Rebecca Truver, 45, was in her tent when her dog and her cat started acting strangely. "They knew something was happening," Truver said of her dog and cat. "Then all of a sudden the water came through up to my knees."
"We'll keep our fingers crossed, but the more rain that comes, the possibility of mudslides is definitely real," said Jim Amormino, spokesman for the Orange County sheriff's office, which has rescued nine people from the flooding in the past 24 hours.
"We've been lucky so far, but I'm not sure how much longer the luck will hold out," he said.
For all the perils of the torrential rains, there was a silver lining: The water is expected to help ease the effects of years of drought. Thursday is expected to be dry, with sunshine. There will be light rain on Christmas Day in parts of California.
The immediate concern, however, was the impact of the expected downpours, particularly in areas where wildfires stripped hillsides of the vegetation that keeps soil in place and burns up dead leaves and other debris that act like a sponge.

event_or_fact.property: a state of emergency for Kern, Orange, Riverside, San Bernardino, San Luis Obispo and Tulare counties because of the extreme weather conditions

San Diego police evacuated dozens of homes and businesses but no structural damage was reported in the city

description.hltext_display: 'Agreement reached' on aircraft export credits
description.content:
"An agreement was reached yesterday evening. It concerns Europe, the United States, Brazil and Canada. And the governments should approve it by February 1," the source told AFP.
Major aircraft manufacturing countries have been holding talks for months at the Paris headquarters of the the Organisation of Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) on reforming the so-called export credits.
European manufacturer Airbus and Boeing of the United States have defended the current system, under which foreign buyers get government loan guarantees to help them to buy aircraft, saying it helps many foreign airlines to finance their aircraft purchases.
A number of big airlines in Europe and the United States oppose the current system, complaining that it unfairly supports their competitors in the Gulf.
A reform was also necessary to take into account new competitors in the passenger aircraft market such as the Brazilian company Embraer and Canadian Bombardier.
The French business daily Les Echos said on Monday that a compromise had been found that would extend the system to benefit US and European airlines.
A source told AFP on Tuesday that the new system should satisfy in part the complaints of airlines such as Air Berlin, Air France, British Airways, Delta Airlines, Lufthansa, Virgin.
The source said that European and US airlines, which previously had not been able to benefit from the financing at very preferential rates meant to boost foreign sales, would under certain circumstances be able to get cut-rate financing.
The source said negotiators were still trying on Tuesday to reach an agreement on how many of the Airbus and Boeing contracts made before 2007 could still benefit from the current credits system.

entity.property: Organisation of Economic Cooperation and Development

description.hltext_display: 巨头云集《降龙之剑》玩家答谢会圆满结束
description.author: zolgame
description.content:
次世代2D热血PK网游《降龙之剑》在10月28日公测开启之后，开启了总奖金额高达百万的第一家族悬赏令活动。在经过一个多月的激烈角逐之后，重生公会、义本无言以及海纳百川家族脱颖而出，分享了总计100万的奖金，更在12月18日派出家族族长，与其余优秀家族族长一起，参与了《降龙之剑》玩家答谢会，更与研发及运营团队进行了全面、深入的沟通交流。
《降龙之剑》公测客户端及补丁包高速下载：http://xlzj.wanmei.com/download/client/index.shtml 《降龙之剑》“第一家族悬赏令”
《降龙之剑》10月28日开启家族征战，开战之日起30日内，各服务器中首登5级之家族可参与“第一家族悬赏令”争霸，雄踞前三家族，可分获50万、30万、20万赏金。其中第一家族，封“降龙第一家族”封号，赏金50万。此次参加颁奖及答谢会的有重生公会的Devil丶床単，义本无言的，海纳百川的以及5173网游公会的几位族长，由于拥有着共同的话题——《降龙之剑》，几位族长落座后不久就自然而然地熟络起来，就游戏进行了热烈的讨论。而在简短的颁奖仪式之后，各位族长就立刻开始了最为重视的与研发团队就游戏内容进行的沟通。 沟通：激情
在电话会议开始，众位族长们就以玩家的代表身份对游戏提出了不少意见和建议，其中更不乏交流中突然的神来一笔和灵犀之触。虽然《降龙之剑》的研发们可以说是最了解游戏的一群人，但是各位族长所带来的众多家族成员汇总的精彩建议，仍旧让研发人员们纷纷表示受益匪浅，并将汲取其中的精华在后续的游戏版本中予以实现。而在长达两个多小时的讨论中，族长们与研发团队从游戏的特点到经济体系、从战斗玩法到装备系统都进行了热烈而充满激情的讨论，而各位族长更纷纷表示将持续收集家族成员提出的更多合理建议与意见，及时反馈给研发与运营团队，从而一起将《降龙之剑》打造成为最好玩的次世代2D网游。 在总时长达到3个半小时的答谢会结束之后，各位族长依然意犹未尽，都表示对此次能与研发团队近距离沟通、直面玩家对游戏的建议非常满意，更希望能有机会继续与研发进行沟通，反馈更多玩家意见。
《降龙之剑》已于12月10日开放全新电信服务器【烽火连城】，即刻入驻，所有内容抢先体验就此开始。
《降龙之剑》官方网站：http://xlzj.wanmei.com
《降龙之剑》玩法大荟萃：http://xlzj.wanmei.com/info/index.htm

description.hltext_display: "창의� � 체험활동, 박물관에서 하세요"
description.content: 【서울=뉴시스】김훈기 기자 = 교육과학기술부는 한국박물관협회, 한국과학관협회와 '박물관·미술관·과학관을 활용한 창의적 체험활동 시범사업'을 겨울 방학(2011년1~2월) 기간 중 실시한다고 22일 밝혔다. 이를 위해 교과부는 전국 630여개의 박물관·미술관·과학관이 운영하는 프로그램 중 창의적 체험활동에 맞는 8개 프로그램을 선정했다. 시범사업으로 선정된 프로그램은 '박물관 GO! GO!'(국립중앙박물관), '유전의 원리 탐구교육'(국립과천과학관) 등이며 5곳의 국립 박물관·미술관·과학관에서 진행된다. 여기에는 전국 문화예술 소외지역 21개 초·중학교 학생 1000여명이 참여하게 된다. 이번 사업은 지역의 박물관·미술관·과학관을 활용해 지역 학생들이 손쉽게 이용할 수 있고 창의적 체험활동에 부합하는 프로그램을 개발·보급하는 것이 목적이다. 교과부 관계자는 "2011년 도입되는 창의적 체험활동시간에 일선 학교에서 박물관과 미술관, 과학관을 적극 활용한 문화예술·과학기술 분야 현장 체험형 교육을 확대할 수 있도록 지원할 것"이라고 밝혔다. bom@newsis.com 저작권자ⓒ '한국언론 뉴스허브' 뉴시스통신사. 무단전재-재배포 금지.

description.hltext_display: Stopgap spending measure clears Congress
description.content:
WASHINGTON — Congress cleared a stopgap funding bill Tuesday to keep the federal government open into March, a temporary truce until Republicans and President Barack Obama rejoin the battle over the budget next year.
The bill was passed by the House in the evening just hours after speeding through the Senate. Obama was poised to sign it by midnight to avoid a government shutdown.
The measure would freeze agency budgets at current levels. That's still too high for Republicans set to take over the House, who vow to cut many programs to levels in place when Obama took office. That will be difficult to achieve, even though Republicans will control the House and possess greater strength in the senate.
The bill would also create hardship at the Pentagon and the Homeland Security Department, which will be denied funding increases until their budgets pass next year.
The measure is needed because the Democratic-controlled Congress — in an unprecedented failure to complete its most basic job on passing a budget — has failed to enact a single one of the 12 annual spending bills that fund the day-to-day operations of every federal agency.
The House cleared the bill for Obama on a 193-165 vote after a 79-16 vote in the Senate.
Republicans promise to try next year to cut most domestic agency budgets back to pre-Obama levels. Such cuts would exceed 20 percent for some agencies.
Republicans say such cuts would produce savings of $100 billion compared to Obama's February budget request. But with the government operating at current levels for almost half of the fiscal year, the actual savings that Republicans might be able to accomplish are likely to be considerably smaller. The budget year began Oct. 1.
Republicans will have increased leverage, but Democrats will retain control of the Senate and the White House. The threat of a government shutdown is real if Democrats and resurgent Republicans can't agree.
In fact, additional stopgap spending measures may be needed next year if the battle drags on, as seems likely.
At issue is the approximately one-third of the budget passed each year by Congress to fund the 15 Cabinet departments and other agencies. The rest of the budget is dominated by benefit programs like Social Security, Medicare, and the Medicaid health care program for the poor and disabled.
Republicans haven't been very specific about which programs they want to cut next year, though they promise to rescind unspent money from last year's economic stimulus law, including billions of dollars for high-speed rail projects that critics say are likely to turn out to be boondoggles.
"Right now, there's a lot of posturing, a lot of slogans. I think they're going to go for a lot of quick, symbolic victories — no earmarks, trying to recapture unspent stimulus," Sen. Barbara Mikulski, a liberal Democrat from Maryland, said of pet spending projects and the economic stimulus measure. "Then I think they'll start with women and children. And I will be combat ready."
The cuts are likely to come almost exclusively from domestic programs that have gotten boosts on the order of 10 percent a year since Obama took office.
Democrats warn that cutting spending is easier said than done.
"I think Republicans will discover that it's a lot easier to talk about cutting $100 billion than actually identifying the specific lines in the budget that they want to cut," said Sen. Tom Harkin, D-Iowa. "Do they really want to cut 21 percent from child care subsidies for working families — in this economy? Do they really want to cut 21 percent from job training programs — in this economy?"
An option under discussion among Republicans is to keep the domestic agencies running mostly on autopilot through next October but at lower spending rates.
At the same time, Republicans have promised to actually increase spending for the Pentagon and the Veterans Affairs and Homeland Security departments.
Senate Republicans last week blocked a move by Democrats to advance an almost $1.3 trillion spending bill to wrap up the unfinished budget work. The 1,924-page measure contained more than 6,700 home-state pet projects that Republicans have promised to give up.
The measure makes only a handful of funding adjustments from current levels, for example by cutting the Census budget way back since the decennial count has been completed.
It also implements Obama's recent proposal to freeze the salaries of federal civilian workers for two years.
The measure also provides $5.7 billion for the Pell Grant program, which provides grants of up to $5,550 to college students from low income families.

I think Republicans will discover that it's a lot easier to talk about cutting $100 billion than actually identifying the specific lines in the budget that they want to cut; Do they really want to cut 21 percent from child care subsidies for working famil

description.hltext_display: Plows clearing residential roads
description.author: Heather McIntrye, Metro Edmonton
description.content:
Now that the main roads and bus routes are clear, City of Edmonton sanders, plows and graders are heading for residential streets.
“We have 115 units on the road right now, which is standard,” Lloyd Meyer, superintendent of roadway maintenance services, said yesterday.
In a week to 10 days from now, the city will have cleared all 4,800 kilometres of road.
“It’s a big job, a lot of equipment, a lot of people behind the scenes,” said Meyer.
Snow stacked downtown and in business areas will be removed, while windrows in residential areas will be kept below 30 centimetres at driveways.
While things have come together since the winter storm last week, Coun. Kerry Diotte said yesterday a plan should be in place to let residents know of a timeframe for their streets and back lanes.
“They try to plow the main arterial roads in 48 hours and they’ve got that benchmarked,” said Diotte. “(But) there’s no real benchmark for city residential streets.”
He said his office has been getting a lot of calls, while Meyer said the city had about 1,000 calls between the snowfall and the end of the weekend — an average number.
