description.hltext_display: 沪深300指数12月22日收盘跌1.05%
description.content:
沪深300指数走势回顾：
沪深300指数12月22日以3,253.82点高开后震荡下跌，收盘报3,215.45点，跌1.05%；共成交约70亿股 ，成交金额约983亿元，较上一交易日有所萎缩。钢铁、有色金属、石油等个股有所回落，中国石化跌 0.36%、江西铜业涨0.10%、宝钢股份跌0.30%；金融地产个股走势较弱，中国太保跌3.23%、中信银行 跌2.22%、万科A跌1.42%。前20大权重股拖累指数为16.7点，金融地产股拖累指数为13.2点，能源股拖 累指数为1点。
有色金属板块走势较强，豫光金铅 ( 600531 ) 收盘涨1.57%，中色股份 ( 000758 ) 涨1.85%，江西铜业 ( 600362 ) 涨0.10%。截至12月21日收盘，LME基本金属几乎全线上涨，期铜盘中大涨191美元，触及纪录高位9392美元/吨，最后报9365/9370美元/吨，高于20日收盘价9201美元/吨。今日国内商品期货早盘普涨。
受成品油价格上调刺激，今日石油板块盘冲高回落，中国石化 ( 600028 ) 收盘跌0.36%，淮油股份(002207)涨0.26%，广聚能源 ( 000096 ) 涨3.77%。国家发展和改革委员会21日宣布，自22日零时起将汽油、柴油价格分别提高每吨310元、300元，相当于90号汽油全国平均零售价每升上调0.23元，0号柴油每升上调0.26元。发改委称，这次成品油价格调整有利于保障国内市场供应，同时抑制不合理消费，促进节能减排和经济结构调整。分析师表示，油价上调直致石油公司产品价格的上涨，将直接带来利润。从这个角度而言，油价的上涨对石油企业的业绩及股价表现，都会形成绝对的支撑作用。此外，原油期货周二创下两年结算价新高，受股市走强和市场对美国经济的乐观情绪提振。纽约商交所一月原油期货合约结算价涨45美分，至2008年10月份以来最高结算价水平每桶89.82美元，涨幅0.5%。ICE布伦特原油期货合约涨46美分，至每桶93.20美元，涨幅0.5%。纽约商交所原油期货合约的盘中高点为89.97美元，但未能触及90美元这一被许多投资者视为重要关口的水平。

description.hltext_display: Late wins power Raiders past rival BEA
description.content:
BELLEFONTE — It was a hall of fame-caliber meet on Hall of Fame night in Bellefonte.
With the five new Hall of Fame inductees on hand, the Raiders fought back from an eight-point deficit with two bouts to go to edge arch-rival Bald Eagle Area 33-32 in a dual meet that epitomized what a rivalry is all about.
With the Raider gym three-quarters full and rocking, Bellefonte’s Jake Perryman took the mat against Garren Kunes with the scoreboard showing BEA up 32-30 heading into the last bout of the night.
The 215-pounders, whose records were nearly even (Kunes was 5-3, Perryman 3-3), went scoreless through the first period and in the second
Perryman picked up a reversal with 50 seconds showing. Kunes escaped with 1:40 to go in the bout and yielded a takedown and three back points when he tried a desperation throw with 10 seconds left, giving Perryman a 7-1 win and the Raiders the win.
“It was exhilarating,” said Perryman, the medal for winning the Joseph B. Humphreys award as the meet’s outstanding wrestler, hanging around his neck. “I did what I could. I just took what I could take. I was extremely nervous toward the end of the third period. I just wasn’t going to give up, never back down.
“It being the Hall of Fame night was more incentive to me. I knew the people in the stands were counting on me to win.”
So was Raider coach Mike Maney, a BEA alum who remembers wrestling in the Raider gym the night the first Hall of Fame class was inducted in 1998.
“When the meet started at 285, I knew we would have seniors in there (at 189 and 215) but I wasn’t sure what I was going to do,” Maney said. “I told the guys to be ready when they might be called to wrestle. That was a credit to Jake. He hasn’t wrestled that many years and he just keeps on improving. That was a solid win.”
On the other side of the mat, BEA’s Steve Millward knew Kunes would have his hands full trying to nail down the win.
“He (Perryman) did what he had to do, didn’t do anything crazy,” Millward said. “When you get a lead, you don’t have to do much. But Garren didn’t force the issue like we expected him to. And at the end, he only needed a takedown to win it. He didn’t need five points.”
The meet started off on the right foot for Bellefonte as Garret Poorman used a first-period takedown and second-period reversal to down Nate Sharkey 4-0.
BEA responded by notching three straight wins for a 16-3 lead as Travis Giedroc picked up a forfeit at 103, Jason Sherry pinned Gage Wert in 1:15 at 112 and Tyler Baney rolled over Mike Lewis 11-3 at 119 with a pair of takedowns, three back points and a reversal.
And after Tom Traxler, in his first bout of the year, majored BEA’s Justin Giedroc 13-1, thanks to four takedowns and four back points, the Eagles’ Matt Dillon blanked Tyler Ashpole 11-0 with a four-point move in the first period, a reversal and three back points in the second and a takedown in the third to give the Eagles a 20-7 lead.
Bellefonte then ran off four straight wins as Leo Wortman majored Dion Barnard 12-4 with five takedowns, Frankie Muzika was handed a forfeit, Cody Fisher moved up to 145 and blanked Josh Mauer 12-0, thanks to seven back points, and Nate Alterio nipped Nick Taylor 3-2 in a pivotal bout at 152.
Following a scoreless first period Alterio escaped, Taylor took him down and Alterio reversed to make it 3-2 after two periods. In the third period, Alterio fought off Taylor’s reversal attempt for over half the period and then controlled him the rest of the way for the win that put Bellefonte ahead 24-20.
“I’ve been working on that (riding) in practice,” said Alterio, who missed all of last year with a knee injury. “I’ve gotten better. I knew I could hold him down. I’m still not back to where I should be but this is a big rivalry, the crowd was into it and I knew I could do it.”
“We knew 152 was going to be a toss-up,’’ Maney said. “It’s a credit to Nate that he wrestled a solid third period to get the win.”
Millward, like Maney, knew the bout was going to be even.
“We have every confidence in Nick, with the way he’s been wrestling.’’ Millward said. “But he wrestled a tough kid. Alterio moved up to 152 for a reason.”
With Bellefonte holding a 24-20 lead, the Eagles bounced right back as Coleman Hoffman pinned Nick Shawley in 1:00 at 160 and Jake Taylor stuck Tyler Lucas at 171 for the fall at the buzzer at the end of the second period to stake BEA to a 32-24 lead.
Then Brad Grieb pinned Aaron Varner in 3:32 and handed the meet over to Perryman.
“I remember wrestling here the night of their first Hall of Fame induction, the intensity and the atmosphere,” Maney said. “And these guys who were inducted tonight (Jason Scott, Joel Lyons, Mike Gardner, Mike Reish and Nate Lingle) are guys who rejuvenated Bellefonte wrestling.
“I can’t say this meet isn’t one that you mark on your calendar but the fans here do want to know how you do against Bald Eagle every year. That’s the measuring stick.”
And to beat your biggest rival on its Hall of Fame night makes the win even sweeter.
“It was a special night for Bellefonte,” Millward said. “It sure added to the attitude they brought to the meet. And meets like this are always good for this area.”

description.hltext_display: 金银岛:商投疲软炭黑下游议价较多
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
金银岛讯（市场分析师：张志慧）：
近期国内主流炭黑厂家出厂价格政策延续稳定，市场方面继续盘整行情。炭黑厂库存相对低位，无明显出货压力。中间商存货意向薄弱，终端工厂实体消耗有限，市场买卖气氛两不旺，实盘交投滞缓。国内大型轮胎企业的开工率基本维持在70%左右，橡胶制品厂开工情况仍不乐观。受到了天气转冷下游需求减弱的影响，加之临近年底资金回笼，经销商和下游企业对炭黑多随用随采，尚无备货意向。目前山东市场湿法N330主流出厂报价7000-7200元/吨，N220报价7600-7800元/吨，实际成交略低。国内主流炭黑厂开工6-7成，煤焦油价格高端回落后企稳，炭黑厂整体利润偏低，生产积极性受到压制，维持合同户订单为主。
国内煤焦油市场中低位运行，主流价格在3350-3400元/吨，近期焦炭销售良好，各焦化厂开工率相对正常，而下游深加工因自身市场不佳，停、限产居多，对原料议价较多。但市场经过一轮下跌后，下游采购基本恢复正常，预计煤焦油后期跌幅空间有限。
近期炭黑市场缺乏实质利好因素提振，高位价格执行困难。临近年底，下游需求持续转淡，部分厂家可能采取小幅让利走货。
【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

description.hltext_display: Police hunting for slain businessman’s employees
description.author: Gia Nicolaides
description.content:
Police are hunting for three suspects in connection with a murder in Bree Street in central Johannesburg on Tuesday.
The 26-year-old business owner, Imraan Omar, was allegedly stabbed by three of his employees.
The police’s John Maluleke said the suspects managed to escape with a number of items.
“They sped off with in a silver VW Golf 5, a laptop and undisclosed amount of money,” he said.
“The three suspects who are two males and a female are still at large.”

event_or_fact.property: the suspects managed to escape with a number of items

description.hltext_display: 《剑网》福利版上线 千万豪礼回馈玩家
description.author: zolgame
description.content:
昔日英雄再聚江湖，千万豪礼倾情回馈！中华武侠网游鼻祖《剑侠情缘网络版》（以下简称《剑网》）周年庆典火爆开启，福利版本今日隆重上线！游戏全新系统和精彩玩法横空出世，同时首届“中越对抗赛”剑拔弩张紧张进行，另外还有系列精彩活动同步开启，各种丰厚大礼疯狂派送中！
【轻松秒升120级 上线就有礼】
《剑网》周年庆典今日火爆开启，为感谢广大玩家的长期支持和厚爱，各项惊喜豪礼海量发放。玩家登录即可享受多种福利，同时各位玩家还可轻松秒升120级，与他人处于同一起跑线！因此所有回归游戏的老玩家不必担心等级被落下，还有多种回馈好礼等你拿！
【回馈老玩家 千万现金返还】
《剑网》陪伴广大玩家度过了难忘而珍贵的岁月，共同留下了一段美好的回忆！因此福利版以“千万现金返还”为诸位侠客送上一份温馨好礼！凡2010年6月30以后没有登录游戏的大侠只要进入游戏，即可获取层出不穷的珍贵奖励和消费返还！快与昔日兄弟一起体验新版本，感受新变化吧！
【召唤昔日兄弟 邀请有惊喜】
曾几何时，诸位侠客以自己血肉之躯厮杀于网络时空，以睥睨天下的身手来击败强敌！然而曾经的英雄如今却在哪里？《剑网》福利版今日全新开放，现在邀请昔日兄弟再次携手鏖战江湖，就可获取分别价值300元、200元、100元的金山一卡通相送哦！
【见证武侠荣耀 七千万玩家参与】
一场关于武侠文化的恢弘盛宴即将拉开帷幕！《剑网》首届“中越对抗赛”精英选拔火热进行中，所有中国服务器玩家正厉兵秣马整装待战，谁将代表中国七千万剑网玩家见证震撼人心的一刻，身临其境体会中华武侠文化的魅力和影响，各位高手快来一起参加吧！
【全新系统开放 畅享激情江湖】
《剑网》福利版中将开放全新地图“天池密境”，并将日常任务全面更新；各大门派还将推出饰品以及全新装备，通过换装系统还可随意更换角色外观；另外玩家在线就可通过福利系统获得奖励；同时还有激烈劲爽七城大战，让千百万剑侠每日畅享全服PK盛宴！
中华武侠网游鼻祖《剑网》周年庆典今日激情开启，全新福利版横空出世！游戏丰富有趣的系统玩法和精彩活动同步开放，首届“中越对抗赛”精英选拔紧张进行，快来关注中华武侠的经典传说，在纷争江湖中建立自己不朽的传奇！
《剑侠情缘网络版》官方网站：http://jx.xoyo.com/
《剑侠情缘网络版》官方论坛：http://jx.bbs.xoyo.com/
关于《剑侠情缘网络版》
《剑侠情缘》是中国武侠着名游戏品牌，由金山西山居工作室研发打造。在单机游戏时代，《剑侠情缘》总共销售70万套，被业内媒体誉为国产游戏里程碑式的作品。而《剑网》作为金山软件首款网络游戏大片，取材于中国传统武侠题材，历时三年耗资千万，成为昔日国产网游面对外来游戏入侵崛起的标志。后来在越南市场，《剑网》为越南首款母语网游，以最高85%市场占有率成为越南版“传奇”。

description.hltext_display: '2011 방송통� 위원회 방송대상', 내년 3월7일 개최
description.content: 【서울=뉴시스】정옥주 기자 = 올 한 해 최고의 방송프로그램을 선정하는 '2011 방송통신위원회 방송대상'이 내년 3월7일 열린다. 방송통신위원회는 22일 전체회의에서 '2011 방송통신위원회 방송대상' 시상계획을 확정, 발표했다. 이 행사는 방송인의 창작의욕을 고취시키고 방송프로그램의 질적 향상을 도모하기 위해 2010년 한 해 동안 방송된 프로그램 중 우수 작품을 선정·시상한다. 시상식은 이날 오전 10시30분 서울 소공동 롯데호텔에서 개최되며 대상 1편, 우수상 6개(창의 발전·사회 문화·지역 발전·뉴미디어·시청자 제작·라디오)부문 12편과 특별상 3개(공로상·바른 방송언어상·방송기술상)부문을 시상한다. 특히 3회째를 맞는 '방송대상'은 대상의 훈격이 기존 '국무총리상'에서 '대통령상'으로 격상됐다. 또 방송매체 간의 불균형을 해소하기 위해 라디오 부문을 신설했고, 방송환경 변화에 부응하기 위해 '바른 방송언어상'·'방송기술상'을 신설했다. 방송대상에 응모 또는 추천은 내년 1월3~12일 신청서와 소정의 서류를 서울 송파구 가락동 한국전파진흥원에 직접 방문·접수하거나, 마감일 전까지 우편 발송하면 된다. channa224@newsis.com 저작권자ⓒ '한국언론 뉴스허브' 뉴시스통신사. 무단전재-재배포 금지.

description.hltext_display: 12月22日权证长虹CWB1收盘跌1.01%
description.content:
[世华财讯]沪深300指数12月22日震荡下跌，收盘跌1.05%。长虹权证收跌。
沪深300指数12月22日收盘跌1.05%。沪深300指数早盘以3,253.82点高开后震荡下跌，收盘报3,215.45点，跌1.05%。昨日大幅走强的房地产、券商等权重板块今日回调，带动股指午后加速回落。从盘面看，近期市场波动加剧，多空双方对于后市分歧加大，但总体而言，随着市场交易氛围明显改善，加上目前权重股的估值处于相对安全边际，对于后市继续持乐观态度。沪深两市唯一交易权证长虹CWB1 ( 580027 ) 跌1.01%，其正股四川长虹 ( 600839 ) 跌0.78%。
沪深300指数走势回顾：
沪深300指数12月22日以3,253.82点高开后震荡下跌，收盘报3,215.45点，跌1.05%；共成交约70亿股 ，成交金额约983亿元，较上一交易日有所萎缩。钢铁、有色金属、石油等个股有所回落，中国石化跌 0.36%、江西铜业涨0.10%、宝钢股份跌0.30%；金融地产个股走势较弱，中国太保跌3.23%、中信银行 跌2.22%、万科A跌1.42%。前20大权重股拖累指数为16.7点，金融地产股拖累指数为13.2点，能源股拖 累指数为1点。

description.hltext_display: Galicia lévase dous quintos, un en Ribadumia e outro en Arzúa
description.content:
Galicia empezó con buen pie el sorteo de Navidad ya que los dos primeros premios que han salido, dos quintos, han sido vendidos en Ribadumia (Pontevedra) y Arzúa (A Coruña). El primero en salir fue el 75.869 y fue vendido en la administración número 1 de Ribadumia y el segudo, trece minutos después, cayó, entre otros lugares, en Arzúa, también en su administración 1. En este caso el premiado fue el 73.684.
El sorteo de Navidad ha comenzado a las 09.20 horas, veinte minutos después de que las bolas empezasen a vaciarse en los bombos correspondientes. Las puertas del Palacio de Congresos de Madrid se abrieron pasadas las 07.30 horas y de momento todo transcurre con normalidad. Los niños de San Ildefonso ya cantas los números y los premios en un sorteo en el que cada gallego se juega una media de 66,75 euros.
Por primera vez desde 1963 el sorteo no se celebrará en el tradicional salón del Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE), sino que tendrá lugar en el céntrico Palacio de Congresos de Madrid, con más aforo para dar cabida al cada vez mayor número de ciudadanos que desean asistir al evento.
Como siempre, la gran expectación se concentra en saber qué número será el agraciado con el Premio Gordo, dotado con tres millones de euros y que dejará 300.000 euros al portador de cada décimo. En total, el primer bombo, el de los números, contiene 85.000 bolas -del 00.000 al 84.999-, mientras que el segundo, el de los premios, aloja 1.787. Este año se repartirán 2.320 millones. Además del Gordo, habrá un segundo premio dotado con un millón de euros (100.000 euros al décimo); un tercero de 500.000 (50.000 euros el décimo); dos cuartos y ocho quintos.
Suerte esquiva con los gallegos
La suerte ha sido tradicionalmente esquiva con Galicia, en donde el Gordo ha tocado 'sólo' 12 veces desde el primer sorteo celebrado en Cádiz un lejano 18 de diciembre de 1812. Aquella vez, el premio, dotado de 8.000 reales, se lo llevó un ciudadano que se gastó 40 reales en el número 03604.
A Coruña, en 8 ocasiones, ha sido la provincia gallega más afortunada; seguida de Lugo, con 3 premios Gordos, y Pontevedra, con dos. Ourense, tan sólo agraciada una vez, ha sido la que menos suerte ha tenido, pese a que la última ocasión que un pellizco recayó en Galicia fue en Allariz.
Las bolas con los premios y con los 85.000 números de la suerte se volcarán a primera hora sobre los bombos después de que el presidente de la mesa lo haya autorizado y de que cualquier ciudadano presente en el salón haya podido comprobar la existencia de un número determinado.
La final del Mundial y la visita del Papa
Entre los datos curiosos del sorteo destacan los relacionados con las propias bolas: están fabricadas en madera de boj, pesan tres gramos, tienen un tamaño de 18,8 milímetros y el número o las letras grabados con láser. Entre los números más solicitados figuran dos fechas imprescindibles de este 2010 que termina, como son la de la victoria de España en la final del Mundial de fútbol -el 11.710- y la de la visita del Papa -el 61110 y el 71110, según el día que estuvo en Santiago o en Barcelona-. También se ha hecho célebre el 291110, que se corresponde con la fecha del último Barcelona-Real Madrid de fútbol, que terminó con un histórico 5-0 para los catalanes.
Otro de los datos llamativos es que cinco provincias nunca han 'cazado' el Gordo. Son Zamora, Salamanca, Ávila, Tarragona y Huelva, mientras que esa suerte tampoco ha recaído nunca en las ciudades autónomas de Ceuta y de Melilla.
En el lado opuesto está Madrid, la provincia que más veces ha sido agraciada con el primer premio (78 veces, la última el pasado año), seguida de Barcelona (50 veces), y a continuación, aunque a mucha distancia, se encuentran Valencia (18), Sevilla (16), Alicante (14), Málaga y Vizcaya (13 cada una), Cádiz (12), Asturias y Zaragoza (11 veces en cada una).
Galicia gasta menos de la media
La consignación que se ha efectuado para el sorteo de mañana asciende a 3.210 millones de euros, según los datos de Loterías del Estado, que ha previsto un gasto por habitante de 68,68 euros, aunque las ventas definitivas no se conocerán hasta primera hora de mañana.
En Galicia, el gasto medio es un poco inferior a la media -66,75- y muy alejado del de los riojanos -juegan más de 101 euros por habitante-, de los castellanoleoneses, con 97,7 euros, y los asturianos, con 91,7 euros.

description.hltext_display: 長期金利上昇“犯人”は大手銀 米国債で大損→日本国債売りで穴埋め
Pak Polisi Diminta Jaga SPBU Pertamina
description.author: Stevy Maradona
description.content:
REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA-- Pertamina meminta kepada pihak penegak hukum untuk benar-benar mengawasi dan melakukan penjagaan keamanan Stasiun Pengisian Bahan Bakar Umum (SPBU) H-7 perogram pembatasan BBM bersubsidi terimplentasi.
Direktur Utama Pertamina, Karen Agustiawan selain itu perlindungan hukum bagi pengusaha dan operator pompa di SBPU jug."Itu semua agar, implementasi ini berjalan kondusif di lapangan," tuturnya, Rabu (22/12).
Karen menambahkan, saat ini juga pihaknya banyak mendengar dari pengusaha SPBU, agar mereka bisa mendapat fasilitas pinjaman dari bank untuk investasi tangki pendam SPBU dan dispenser bagi pengusaha SPBU dengan bunga rendah.
"Pengusaha membutuhkan dana untuk investasi bagi penambahan infrastruktur," tukasnya.
Pemerintah merencanakan pembatasan BBM bersubsidi mulai Maret 2011. Pada saat itu, seluruh jenis kendaraan pribadi kecuali motor, tidak lagi boleh membeli BBM bersubsidi.

description.hltext_display: Headstart Advisers Cautiously Optimistic About 2011 After Stellar Returns for 2010 and 2009
description.content:
- We can Keep on Recognising Fund Manager Talent, Says CIO Najy Nasser
Najy Nasser, Chief Investment Officer of Headstart Advisers, says the investment firm's outlook for 2011 will mean having to rely again on being well diversified, nimble and fleet of foot.
Headstart Advisers advises a number of funds, including the investable Headstart Fund of Funds, which claimed its place at the top of the leader board of the Investhedge rankings for multi-strategy funds of hedge funds for the last three, six and twelve months and has returned 13.94% for the year to date to the end of November 2010.
The investment approach for the Headstart Advisers who run Fund of Funds is to look for the best risk adjusted returns. It pursues a 'bottom up' approach to manager selection and combines it with a top down macro analysis of global markets to determine the correct strategy weightings.
Najy Nasser, CIO of Headstart Advisers, said: "Our aim is to recognise talented managers early on in their ascent and to keep ahead of the curve by continually developing our talent for finding the successful funds of the future. We will work hard so that we can continue delivering high-quality risk-adjusted returns for our clients.
"Following the hedge fund industry's difficult 2008, we are pleased with the Headstart Fund of Funds' outperformance. Since the start of 2009 the investable fund is up 34.28% while the indices we are judged against are up in the region of 15%."
Najy Nasser also said: "The Headstart Fund of Funds is well positioned going into 2011 and is diversified across a range of strategies while being able to adapt quickly to an ever changing investment environment".
Notes to editors about Headstart Advisers
Headstart Advisers Ltd is a financial services company incorporated in 1990, authorised and regulated by the FSA as an investment advisor to the Headstart family of hedge funds. It advises three hedge funds and a fund of hedge funds with the common mandate of superior returns with lower volatility (risk).
The directors of Headstart Advisers Ltd are Najy Nasser and Henry Watkinson. The firm has its office in Chelsea Harbour, London.

description.hltext_display: 金银岛:电石市场局部货量增加行情跌势难改
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
金银岛讯（市场分析师：彭雯雯）： 进入本周，国内大部分地区电石价格继续走跌。目前，陕西地区电石企业生产均已恢复正常，山西及内蒙地区前期停车的电石企业开工也在陆续恢复中。虽然电石产量并未出现明显的放大。但由于下游PVC行情不振，氯碱企业开工降负，致使电石行情进入下行通道。另据了解，华北地区电石已出现排队卸货的现象。
截至目前，除西南地区电石价格大体持稳之外，其余地区电石价格均出现不同程度的走跌。就当前情况而言，下游PVC行情难有回转之势，且电石供应量递增在即，预计周内电石价格还将呈现走跌趋势。

description.hltext_display: 恒指午后收窄升幅 现于23,000点水平争持
description.content:
[世华财讯]港股22日午后显著收窄升幅，恒指现于23,000点大关争持；分析师表示，由于圣诞节长假临近，市场交投持续减少，料大市难以大幅走好，恒指很可能在目前水平窄幅波动，预计波动区间仍在22,800-23,500点。
在内地A股跌幅扩大拖累下，港股12月22日午后显著回落，恒指一度倒跌至22,990.69点，现于23,000点大关争持，最新报23,001.87点，升8
.01点或0.03%，国企指数转升为跌，现报12,595.45点，跌11.98点或0.1%，红筹指数现报4,165.8点，升11.71点或0.28%，大市成交十分淡静，目前成交额仅420.88亿港元。
从盘面看，蓝筹股个别发展，香港本地地产、石化、煤炭等股份仍涨幅靠前，长实(00001)及中石化(00386)仍表现最佳，现分别升3.1%及2.77%；而中资银行股则显著回落，工行(01398)现跌1.21%，位居蓝筹跌幅首位，建行(00939)及中行(03988)亦跌1%及0.97%；权重股汇控(00005)及中移动(00941)亦跌0.37%及0.32%，限制大市升势。

description.hltext_display: Preakness threatened by dispute
description.author: Staff and News Services
description.content:
The future of the Preakness at Pimlico is in doubt after a vote by Maryland's racing commission.
The board voted to reject a proposal by the owners of and Laurel Park to conduct live racing next year, meaning there won't be horse racing at either track unless an agreement is reached.
That would leave the future of the Triple Crown's second leg in doubt at the track where it has been run since 1873. Nearly $80 million was bet on the race this year, which was attended by more than 95,000.
"It's disappointing the parties involved could not reach an agreement," Gov. Martin O'Malley said in a statement. "We are prepared to aggressively protect the state's interests. ... We will continue to explore the legal options available to us."
The tracks' owners said they cannot profit from hosting live racing on days that don't have the huge crowds drawn by the Preakness. They proposed 146 days of live racing but asked horsemen to give up simulcasting revenue, among other concessions, and were turned down.
On Tuesday, a proposal to run 78 live days was rejected 8-0 by the commission in an acrimonious meeting.
Roger Federer beat Rafael Nadal 4-6, 6-3, 6-3 to open a two-match exhibition series for charity between the world's top-ranked tennis players.
Federer sealed the victory on Nadal's serve with a backhand crosscourt return in front of 10,000 fans at Hallenstadion indoor arena in Zurich. The match in Switzerland raised money for Federer's foundation, which backs educational work with children in Africa. The foundation supports projects in Ethiopia, Malawi, Tanzania, Zimbabwe and his mother's native South Africa.
NFL: There was no word on punter Shane Lechler's MRI for a strained hamstring, but Oakland did sign former UFL punter Danny Baugher to its practice squad as insurance. Agent David Canter confirmed the signing, first reported by the National Football Post. Lechler strained his hamstring in Sunday's win over Denver. Baugher led the UFL at 44.6 yards per punt with a net of 36.7 for the two-time league champion . - Vittorio Tafur
Baseball: The Yankees were hit with an $18 million luxury tax on their major-league-leading payroll, New York's lowest tax since 2003. The Yanks lowered their tax from nearly $26 million last year after they won the 2009 World Series.
-- The Red Sox completed a two-year, $12 million contract with former White Sox closer Bobby Jenks, adding him to the back of the bullpen with closer Jonathan Papelbon and Daniel Bard.
College football: Syracuse punter Rob Long will have to undergo post-operation treatment after doctors found malignant cells in a brain tumor removed a week ago.
Coach Doug Marrone said Long plans to be at the Pinstripe Bowl when Syracuse plays Kansas State on Dec. 30 at Yankee Stadium. Treatment will begin after New Year's.
-- Tennessee reported secondary violations to the NCAA after discovering 36 student-athletes were given special treatment at the Knoxville bar where a fight involving Volunteers football players broke out in July.
This article appeared on page B - 8 of the

description.hltext_display: El Schalke toma ventaja en la copa
description.content:
El equipo de Gelsenkirchen venció por 0-1 al líder de la segunda división, el Augsburg, con un gol de Jefferson Farfán tras una gran jugada de Raúl González, mientras que en Francia, Lorient y Montpellier empataron.
Jefferson Farfán hizo el gol de la victoria para el Schalke ©
Publicado: Martes, 21 de diciembre de 2010, 21.30HEC El equipo de Gelsenkirchen venció por 0-1 al líder de la segunda división, el Augsburg, con un gol de Jefferson Farfán tras una gran jugada de Raúl González, mientras que en Francia, Lorient y Montpellier empataron.
Las bajas temperaturas obligaron a la suspensión de varios partidos de la Copa de Alemania aunque el FC Schalke jugó su partido ante el FC Augsburg y lo ganó por 0-1.
En Alemania, las inclemencias del tiempo sólo permitieron que se disputaran dos de los octavos de final de la copa alemana. El Schalke se impuso 0-1 al líder de la segunda división germana, el Augsburg, gracias al único gol del partido obra de Jefferson Farfán que llegó tras una buena jugada de Raúl González. Por su parte el TSG 1899 Hoffenheim venció 2-0 al VfL Borussia Mönchengladbach con los tantos de Gylfi Sigurdsson y de Demba Ba, el último de ellos después de un gran despiste en la defensa.
Finalmente, el único partido de liga programado para este martes en Francia vio como el FC Lorient y su rival de la parte media de la tabla, el Montpellier Hérault SC, repartieron los puntos en un encuentro sin goles. Los locales fueron mejores, pero el equipo de Christian Gourcuff logró llevarse un punto a pesar de jugar los últimos 17 minutos con diez hombres tras la expulsión de Mapou Yanga-M'Biwa.

description.hltext_display: MAKING SPIRITS BRIGHT: Volunteers deliver Christmas wishes for local families, tots in need
description.content:
STATE COLLEGE — Nat King Cole played on the stereo, canned goods sat on shelves, and Sue Ott greeted parents who were having trouble affording Christmas gifts for their children.
CDT photos/Craig Houtz
Toys for Tots volunteer Hilary Field stocks the shelves at the food and toy distribution site at Hills Plaza on Monday.
Decked in a snowman sweatshirt and Santa earrings, Ott treated the parents like customers. She’d talk them through the form they’d have to fill out, point out a grocery bag they could load up, and tell them the gifts would be ready in just a minute.
Then toy gathering would begin, as part of the 2010 Marine Corps Toys for Tots campaign.
“We’ve got an order,” Ott said, as she handed fellow volunteer Jeremy Field a slip.
Field, the youth pastor at Park Forest Baptist Church, called up one of the teenagers who a few minutes earlier had been discussing the “Narnia” films.
“Kelsie, here you go,” he said. Kelsie Zuercher, 16, scanned the form for the key piece of info: one child, age three. Then she headed to the back room, looking to make somebody’s Christmas happen.
Organizers of the Centre County Toys for Tots have collected almost 7,000 toys for needy families, and they’ve been distributing them this past month, mostly through local food banks. On Tuesday afternoon, about 10 volunteers worked inside a Hills Plaza storefront, giving out toys to families who had not registered in advance for gifts. To qualify for the program, a family’s income has to be below 150 percent of the poverty level — which is $27,465 for a family of three and $33,075 for a family of four.
This year is a more emotional one for Sue Ott, as it’s the first time she’s volunteered without her husband by her side.
Bob Ott, one of the longtime program coordinators, died in October at the age of 60.
“We’re continuing Bob’s legacy. ...We didn’t want to have any bumps in the road,” said Sue Ott.
The issue was a personal one for Bob Ott, who grew up in a Johnstown housing project, was raised by a single mother, and received donated Christmas toys — including an Uncle Wiggly board game — as a child.
As an adult, Ott put in many hours with the Centre County Toys for Tots campaign. One year, he received a late phone call, and after Christmas Eve Mass, he and Sue headed over to the Centre House shelter. They dropped off a wagon full of toys for a family with two children.
Sue Ott has thought of Bob often this week.
IF YOU GO
Eligible families in Centre County who are not registered with their local food bank, can pick up food and toys at 2135 S. Atherton St. in State College.
The center will be open from 9:30 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. today and Thursday, and from 9 a.m. to noon Friday. Recipients must show identification and complete an eligibility form. Anybody with any “toy crises” through the holidays, can contact the Community Help Line at 800-494-2500.
“It’s been a little difficult, because it’s been emotional. But it’s so important,” Sue Ott said. “... Here I am, and I’m sure he’d be very happy and pleased that I’m not breaking down, that I’m not losing it.”
On Saturday, the Hills Plaza site gave out toys for 163 children. Monday, it was 116 kids. Tuesday was slower, with about 40 kids served by 3 p.m.
When Kuercher headed to the back room, she was looking for four toys: two small, two big. The gifts had been wrapped in advance, but a sticker indicated what they were. “GAM” for game, “TRK” for truck and “TOY BLK” toy with blocks. She also picked up a stuffed animal, some coloring books and put them all in a black garbage bag. Then she headed back to the main room. “Merry Christmas,” she said to the mother.
The mother thanked her, turned away and started to cry. She told two other volunteers she felt bad taking the help. They told her not to worry about it. A few minutes later, she headed out the door with a bag full of groceries and another full of toys. She thanked the volunteers again.
“Thank you,” Sue Ott said in reply, as the mother walked out.
Ed Mahon can be reached at 231-4619.

description.hltext_display: Tonight: Skating with the Spazmatics
description.author: ALYSIA GRAY PAINTER
description.content: ROCK AROUND THE RINK: It's the second week for the free concert series at Pershing Square -- they're called "Rock Around the Rink," and if you guessed there's a big slab of skateable ice in the area, you'd be correct -- and the Spazmatics are up tonight. Which means things are going to get bright and high-energy, fast. Also "free," too; the concert is gratis, though skating is additional. 8-10 p.m. "ELF": We've seen a lot of screenings of this newer seasonal fave around town these past few weeks; tonight's show is at ArcLight Beach Cities. Zooey Deschanel has a pretty voice; she's on the soundtrack. I wonder if anyone else has noticed her pretty voice, too? She should make an album or something. Oh, ho ho ho. 7:30 p.m. "SANTA CLAUS CONQUERS THE MARTIANS": And speaking of cheeky Christmas wonder and outlandish costumes. This Maverick Theater production is just a smidge ahead of wrapping up. But two things to note: One, a few festive laughs about now can do a world of good, or at least pretty good. And two, this is the half-decade anniversary for the show. Clearly, people like. A lot. In Fullerton.

description.hltext_display: Idaho State hammers Great Falls
description.content:
Katie Zigars ISU sports information Idaho State Journal | 0 comments
Katie Zigars
ISU sports information
Idaho State kept rolling on Tuesday day, winning its fifth game in a row and eighth consecutive home victory by hammering Great Falls 98-50 at Reed Gym.
The Bengals’ 48-point advantage marked the sixth best margin of victory in school history.
Idaho State improved to 8-4 for the season while the game was an exhibition loss for the Argos (3-7, 0-2 exhibition).
“I want us to maintain our play at a high level regardless of who we play against,” said ISU coach Seton Sobolewski. “Eventually it gets to a point where you are playing against the game of basketball and just how good you as a team can be and the opponent is a bit arbitrary.”
The Bengals had their fifth game of the season putting four players in double-figure scoring. They were led by senior guard Chelsea Pickering with 19 points in 21 minutes. She was 7-of-12 (58.3 percent) from the field, 2-of-4 from the arc and 3-of-3 from the line.
She also pulled down three rebounds, all on offense, made four assists and recorded a steal. It was the senior’s seventh game leading the Bengals in scoring this season and her second consecutive.
Ashleigh Vella, a sophomore forward, recorded 15 points for ISU in 21 minutes hitting 4-of-7 from the field and 7-of-8 from the line. She pulled down six rebounds. Senior guard Andrea Blodgett recorded 14 points for Idaho State knocking down 6-of-9 (66.7 percent) from the field while posting 2-of-4 from beyond the arc. She also posted a career and game-high six assists.
Freshman forward Cydney Horton posted a career-high 10 points in 15 minutes hitting 5-of-9 from the field while pulling down a game-high seven rebounds.
“Cydney hasn’t played a whole lot, her injury slowed her down a bit but she ran the ball really well tonight,” said Sobolewski.
“I don’t know if I’ve ever had a player finish as well with her left. She missed one today on her left, but otherwise, in traffic she can move pretty quick. She doesn’t have to slow down and concentrate and finish.”
Horton helped Idaho State outrebound Great Falls 39-28 for ISU’s second game out-rebounding an opponent, first by double-figures.
“I think it is slowly getting better and it depends on the opponent and who we can play,” said Sobolewski of ISU’s rebounding effort for the season. “If we can play Cydney, Jess (Jessica Jensen) and Shannon (Byrne) more you are going to do better on the boards. If Chelsea has to stay in at the four spot you aren’t going to do as well on the boards but you are still going to have a great scorer and you still have a really quick defense. You can also really pressure people because you basically have four guards and a forward out there so there is give and take.”
The Bengals broke several season records against Great Falls including hitting 51.4 percent (36-of-70) from the field for the game, scoring 50 points in the paint, scoring 48 points off turnovers, recording 22 assists, posting eight blocked shots as well as posting their best scoring mark in the first and second halves.
Idaho State jumped out to a 14-point lead 6:33 into the game with a 16-2 spread capped by a Vella layup. The Argos were able to work its way back to an ISU seven point when Great Falls put up its largest scoring stretch, a 9-0 run, holding the Bengals scoreless for 4:42 when ISU put in its second wave of substitutions that struggled with Great Falls’ press. Andrea Blodgett ended the ISU dry spell with a big three-pointer to put ISU back up by 10 points, 19-9.
“One of the things I was happy about is that our level of play did not fall off much when we subbed. In the first half we struggled a little bit against the press and we were still feeling people out, the second group did, but after that we were still efficient and competitive when we subbed so that was good,” said Sobolewski.
Idaho State held its biggest lead of the first half with 23 points, 39-16, on a Cydney Horton layup with 2:19 remaining in the half. Idaho State exposed the Great Falls Zone defense by working quick passes to the inside player for 28 points in the paint in the first half alone.
The Bengals found its stride out-scoring Great Falls 57-28 in the second half. Idaho State quickly worked up a 31 point lead, 56-25, on a 15-3 run with 14:40 remaining in the second half. Great Falls kept the contest competitive for the next 5:40 before the Bengals put the pedal to the metal improving to a 45 point lead, 85-40, on a 16-2 run capped by a Lindsey Reed three-pointer with 85-40 remaining.
Every single Bengal on the Idaho State roster scored in the contest. Senior guard Kari Green put up ISU’s largest lead of the game, 48 points, to end the game with a driving layup in the final four seconds. Green recorded a career-high four points hitting 2-of-4 from the field. She also made and assist and a steal. Aralee Smith, a senior guard who made her first appearance on the court this season, scored four points hitting 2-of-2 from the field. She also had three rebounds and a blocked shot.
“I wanted to get everyone in. In these next few games I’d like to play everyone as much as we can because we are going to need our bench when it comes to conference. They need some experience and these two games are the games that make the most sense to play a lot of minutes. It is our last two games to tune up before we start conference,” said Sobolewski.
The 90-plus scoring game was Idaho State’s first under Sobolewski who runs a motion offense with the Bengals. The last time ISU scored 90-plus was four times during the 2007-08 season under the run-and-gun offense of former Head Coach Jon Newlee.
Idaho State will have time off to enjoy the holiday and will start the New Year with its final non-conference game of the season when the Bengals host Montana Tech on Jan. 1 at 2:05 p.m. at Reed Gym.

description.hltext_display: Katy Perry wil veel baby's!
description.content:
ADHESE IMU (in artikel) - 2K - NIET VERWIJDEREN
ADHESE TEXTLINK - NIET VERWIJDEREN
Alles over
De hitdiva is klaar om met Russell Brand een gezinnetje te stichten
Katy Perry ( 26) stapte onlangs in het huwelijksbootje met Russell Brand en is nu al klaar voor de volgende grote stap in hun relatie, ze kan amper wachten om een gezinnetje te stichten! De hitdiva vertelde aan Grazia Magazine dat zij en Russell (35), nu al aan kinderen denken. 'Absoluut. Die ervaring wil ik niet missen. Ik wil veel kinderen', aldus Katy. Perry voegde er nog aan toe dat ze er erg naar uitkijkt om haar eerste Kerstmis met Brand door te brengen als getrouwd koppel: 'Het zullen ik, Russel, een roze kerstboom en een tofu-kip zijn op kerstavond. We zullen de avond voordien een pakje opendoen, omdat dat traditie is in mijn familie. En dan doen we iets nieuws. We starten onze eigen traditie, omdat we nu ook een familie zijn.'

description.hltext_display: Pontren, Pionir Pelestarian Lingkungan Hidup
description.author: Sadly Rachman
description.content:
REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA--Kementerian Lingkungan Hidup mengharapkan pondok pesantren (Pontren) menjadi fondasi dasar tata kelola lingkungan tanah air. Sebab, pontren boleh dibilang institusi pendidikan agama yang berposisi strategis guna memberikan penyadaran kepada masyarakat melalui pendekatan keagamaan.
Deputi Kementerian Lingkungan Hidup Bidang Komunikasi Lingkungan dan Pemberdayaan Masyarakat, Ilyas Asaad menilai eco pontren, demikian nama program kementerian Lingkungan Hidup, merupakan program yang menjadikan pontren sebagai role model tata laksana lingkungan hidup melalui pengembangan pendidikan seperti penerapan konsep ideologi, dan penerapan.
Ketua Lembaga Pemuliaan Lingkungan Hidup Majelis Ulama Indonesia (MUI), Hayu S Prabowo mengatakan pontren bukanlah satu-satunya lembaga yang dilibatkan dalam penanggulangan masalah tata lingkungan tanah air. Meski begitu, pontren memang diharapkan menjadi role model strategis dalam pengembangan pendidikan berbasis lingkungan.
Ke depan, Menurut Hayu, pendidikan berbasis lingkungan dapat diterapkan tidak sebatas pontren saja melainkan pendidikan konvensional dan masyarakat umum yang melingkupi. Dengan demikian, permasalahan lingkungan hidup di Indonesia bisa teratasi secara sistematis dan komprehensif.
Program Eco Pontren telah berlangsung semenjak tahun 2002.Hingga kini tercatat ribuýan pontren yang berada dalam sejumlah region seperti Sumatera, Jawa, Bali, Kalimantan, Nusa Tenggara, Sulawesi, dan Papua.Pusat lokasi program berada di Jogyakarta.

description.hltext_display: Freezing Weather: More Snow On The Way
description.content:
There is another bitterly cold day ahead with more heavy snow falling across central UK.
The snow will extend from north Wales, through Merseyside and Birmingham, and out to Cambridgeshire and East Anglia.
Up to 15cm could fall in some areas with the snow dying out from the West during the day, but not fading in the East until the night.
Further north, freezing fog will linger and temperatures will stay at -10C and below all day.
Devon and Cornwall are most at risk of icy roads, given the early sleet showers and surface temperatures at below freezing.
The South East will be cloudy and slightly milder at up to 3C.
Tomorrow should be drier for all, but it will feel harsh and bitter against strong northeasterly winds.

description.hltext_display: Arab economies to grow by more than 5% in 2011
description.content:
Oil industry
The Arab economies will grow between 2.4% and 4.5% by the end of 2010 and rise by more than 5% in 2011. These positive remarks were made by Jassim Al Mannai, Director General of the Arab Monetary Fund.
According to him, the Arab economies and banks are in better position compared to those in other parts of the world. He added they were less affected by the global financial crisis. Al Mannai explained that the actions by several countries to confront the crisis by increasing spending and injecting additional liquidity to banks helped them to confront the crisis.
He made the remarks on the sidelines of the signing ceremony of providing a new credit line between the Arab Trade Financing Program and the National Bank of Kuwait, held in Abu Dhabi. The new line is worth US$30 million and it will be used for the financing of Kuwait's foreign trade. The program provides a credit line to the branch of the National Bank of Kuwait in Dubai worth US$ 10 million.

event_or_fact.property: the actions by several countries to confront the crisis by increasing spending and injecting additional liquidity to banks helped them to confront the crisis.

description.hltext_display: 大証と東京工業品取引所がバックアップシステムで連携
金银岛:2010年液化气进口走势回顾：成本支撑高位震荡
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
_内参资讯: http://info.315.com.cn/media_detail.jsp?id=734095
金银岛讯（市场分析师：卜李敏）：
2010年华南进口气在国产行情和国际原油等多种因素影响下波动前行，上半年窄幅震荡，而下半年则呈稳步上行趋势。年内低点在7月中旬的5278点，此时南方持续高温导致区内需求萎靡难振，而原油支撑不足进口成本持续下挫，加之码头补给集中到岸，悲观心态下进口联合国产大幅下行； 高点则出现在11月上旬6969点，进口成本持续大涨使得码头动力强劲，区内主力炼厂纷纷检修减产，且有降温利好助力，致使成交连连攀高。 综合看来，10年和09年进口价格走势呈现出三个共同的特点。其一，深受国际国内经济大环境影响，价格走势与国际原油价格走势基本契合。其二，成交高点均出现在11月-12月间，其共同影响因素主要包括进口成本高位、原油给力及天气利好等。其三，市场下半年均呈单边上行趋势，每轮推涨行情之后回调幅度甚微。 【免责声明】本文仅代表作者本人观点，与和讯网无关。和讯网站对文中陈述、观点判断保持中立，不对所包含内容的准确性、可靠性或完整性提供任何明示或暗示的保证。请读者仅作参考，并请自行承担全部责任。

- 开放坐骑配种系统
【配种规则】
配种需通过NPC【驯马师】进行
配种时，先选择一匹主要坐骑，接着界面上会列出这匹主要坐骑可搭配的次要坐骑清单，选择次要坐骑后则列出成品清单
配种完成后，主要坐骑与次要坐骑均消失，玩家会获得成品清单中的其中一匹坐骑
配种的组合方式，主要依照主要坐骑的等级来决定
成品坐骑的数值为掉落数值
因调教失败而造成疲劳的坐骑，无法使用配种功能
配种的费用会受税率影响
特殊马不可作为主要与次要坐骑。※特殊马：经由商城购买获得取得的坐骑
【配种流程】
与NPC交谈，选择坐骑配种法。
选择要配种的主要坐骑，选择后，次要坐骑清单会显示该主要坐骑可搭配的所有次要坐骑项目。
选择要配种的次要坐骑，选择后，成品清单会显示该主要坐骑与次要坐骑搭配后，有机会配种出的成品坐骑项目。
确认玩家物品栏中有足够材料后，将会弹出确认界面：确定配种？
确认后出对话文字信息：配种完成
- NPC【杂货铺老板娘】新增贩卖物品
第四气增之书、第四气增之书、60兵令福袋、精锐兵令福袋

义军砥石、义军缀片、义军马鞍、一级强化福袋、一级精致强化福袋、二级优质强化福袋、3日铁甲战虎、3日铁甲战豹、3日铁甲战狼、3日高级神气羊驼、3日高级睿智羊驼、3日高级杰出灰驴、3日高级灵敏灰驴、3日高级残暴黑熊、3日高级刚猛黑熊

- 机具血量调整

description.hltext_display: 07:41 Anelka agent eyes US switch
description.content:
Nicolas Anelka's brother and agent has claimed the striker could move to the United States when his Chelsea contract expires.
The 31-year-old's deal at Stamford Bridge runs until 2012, by which time he will have spent 11 seasons in English football. And he could be tempted to follow former France team-mate Thierry Henry to the States in search of a fresh challenge.
Claude Anelka said, in comments reported by the Daily Star: "Nicolas told me he is interested in playing in the United States. We could see him crossing the Atlantic, and I'm serious when I say this."
He added: "He asked himself what he will do once his current contract runs out.
"The US is quite something, and a dream destination. He says he will give it a try, even though he would earn less money than in somewhere like Qatar."

event_or_fact.property: he will give it a try, even though he would earn less money than in somewhere like Qatar.

description.hltext_display: 12月22日期指震荡下跌 主力合约IF1101收盘跌1.46%
description.content:
[世华财讯]期指各合约22日震荡下跌。今日股指小幅高开后震荡盘整，昨日权重股走强推动股指走出一根大阳线，但股指仍未脱离前期箱体，表明短期市场相当谨慎，加之临近年末，市场活跃度也有所下降，午后昨日大幅上涨的房地产板块集体走低，带动股指快速下探。从盘面看，此前多头利用利好消息再次向上突破，主力合约IF1101短线向上趋势基本确立，短期市场或仍将延续盘整。总体而言，随着市场交易氛围明显改善，加上目前权重股的估值处于相对安全边际，对于后市继续持乐观态度。
截至12月22日收盘，主力合约IF1101现报3,243.6点，跌48.0点或1.46%，最高至3,303.0点，最低至3,211.4点。下月合约IF1102现报3,279.8点，跌46.4点或1.39%；季月合约IF1103现报3,310.0点，跌51.6点或1.53%；隔季合约IF1106现报3,392.0点，跌45.8点或1.33%。
现货市场板块方面，有色金属板块走势较强，豫光金铅 ( 600531 ) 收盘涨1.57%，中色股份 ( 000758 ) 涨1.85%，江西铜业 ( 600362 ) 涨0.10%。截至12月21日收盘，LME基本金属几乎全线上涨，期铜盘中大涨191美元，触及纪录高位9392美元/吨，最后报9365/9370美元/吨，高于20日收盘价9201美元/吨。今日国内商品期货早盘普涨。
受成品油价格上调刺激，今日石油板块盘冲高回落，中国石化 ( 600028 ) 收盘跌0.36%，淮油股份(002207)涨0.26%，广聚能源 ( 000096 ) 涨3.77%。国家发展和改革委员会21日宣布，自22日零时起将汽油、柴油价格分别提高每吨310元、300元，相当于90号汽油全国平均零售价每升上调0.23元，0号柴油每升上调0.26元。发改委称，这次成品油价格调整有利于保障国内市场供应，同时抑制不合理消费，促进节能减排和经济结构调整。分析师表示，油价上调直致石油公司产品价格的上涨，将直接带来利润。从这个角度而言，油价的上涨对石油企业的业绩及股价表现，都会形成绝对的支撑作用。此外，原油期货周二创下两年结算价新高，受股市走强和市场对美国经济的乐观情绪提振。纽约商交所一月原油期货合约结算价涨45美分，至2008年10月份以来最高结算价水平每桶89.82美元，涨幅0.5%。ICE布伦特原油期货合约涨46美分，至每桶93.20美元，涨幅0.5%。纽约商交所原油期货合约的盘中高点为89.97美元，但未能触及90美元这一被许多投资者视为重要关口的水平。

description.hltext_display: Di Rupo beschuldigt Vlaamse politici en pers van 'militantisme'
description.content:
ADHESE IMU (in artikel) - 2K - NIET VERWIJDEREN
ADHESE TEXTLINK - NIET VERWIJDEREN
Alles over
BRUSSEL - PS-voorzitter Elio Di Rupo laat zich in een interview met de kranten van Sud Presse scherp uit over de Vlaamse politiek en journalistiek, die hij beschuldigt van 'autonomistisch militantisme'.
'We worden geconfronteerd met een dubbel fenomeen', betoogt Di Rupo. 'Een autonomistisch militantisme bij de politiek en de journalisten in het noorden van het land, terwijl in het zuiden van het land de journalisten zich professioneel gedragen en de waarheid van verzinsels kunnen scheiden.'
Als de interviewer opwerpt dat Di Rupo met die uitspraken dezelfde weg opgaat als N-VA-voorzitter Bart De Wever, die min of meer het tegenovergestelde beweert, antwoordt Di Rupo: 'Het verschil tussen ons is dat mijnheer De Wever zich uitspreekt in termen die propaganda verraden, terwijl wat ik zeg, bewezen kan worden.'
Ook woensdag pakt de krant Le Soir opnieuw uit met controversiële uitspraken van De Wever, dit keer uit het weekblad Humo. De Wever heeft het daarin over de 'Latijnse cultuur' in Wallonië waarin 'de kiezer niet negatief reageert als de overheid voordelen doorschuift, terwijl je Vlaanderen voor zoiets wordt afgemaakt'. 'Kijk naar de verkiezingsresultaten in Henegouwen: er is op dat vlak niets veranderd.'

description.hltext_display: NS-Station Geldrop krijgt lift
description.content:
GELDROP - Het NS-treinstation van Geldrop krijgt een lift. Spoorwegbeheerder ProRail begint op 3 januari met de bouwwerkzaamheden, die tot september gaan duren.
Met de komst van een lift is het station voortaan makkelijker bereikbaar voor reizigers die moeilijk ter been zijn of personen die met bijvoorbeeld een kinderwagen op pad zijn.
De bouw van de lift vindt grotendeels plaats in de fiets- en voetgangerstunnel onder het station. Die is daarom gesloten voor (brom)fietsers van 10 januari tot 1 juni 2011. Zij worden omgeleid via de fietserstunnel Hoog Geldrop. Voetgangers kunnen tijdens de bouw wel gewoon door de tunnel lopen.
De lift is onderdeel van het programma Toegankelijkheid. Volgens deze afspraak tussen ministerie van Verkeer, ProRail en de Nederlandse Spoorwegen worden op honderden stations maatregelen uitgevoerd om reizigers met lichamelijke of visuele beperkingen makkelijker zelfstandig te laten reizen.

description.hltext_display: Как нас обманывают на новогодних распродажах
description.content:
Мало кто может удержаться от шоппинга в сезон предновогодних распродаж и скидок. Этим и пользуются предприимчивые продавцы.
Вот 9 самых распространённых магазинных хитростей, из-за которых мы вроде бы покупаем «дешевле», а на самом деле остаёмся накануне праздников без копейки.
Три товара по цене двух
Это простое упражнение на устный счёт. Цены на «акционные» товары временно повышаются в полтора раза (или чуть меньше), в результате экономия получается нулевой.
Только сейчас
При входе в магазин консультант объявляет вам, что «сегодня проходит специальная акция: скидки 30% на все пиджаки» (брюки, сумки, носки и т.п.). Не ведитесь на волшебные слова «сегодня» и «специальная»: как правило скидки растут по мере приближения Нового года, а в январе остатки коллекций вообще распродают по минимальной цене. Так что, если этот пиджак не нужен вам срочно, да и без лишней пары брюк вы вполне проживёте ещё пару недель, лучше отложите покупку до каникул.
Мы клеили, клеили...
Вы берёте в руки чудесный свитерок и смотрите на ценник: 900 грн. Дороговато... Но тут замечаете, что из-под «новой этикетки» выглядывает «старая», на которой цена стоит в два раза больше. Вот это повезло! И скидка сумасшедшая, и свитерок такой красивый, да и висит он один единственный во всём торговом зале...
Не спешите радоваться. Скорее всего, этот свитер стоил те же 900 грн круглый год. Просто ценник переклеили, а на вешалке специально оставили только один экземпляр, чтобы повысить мотивацию покупателя «отхватить, пока не забрали». Наткнувшись вот на такие «волшебные этикетки», прикиньте для начала: купили бы вы этот свитер за такие деньги, если бы не думали, что цена со скидкой? Нет? Тогда оставьте его в покое.
Почём костюмчик?
Остерегайтесь покупать несколько вещей в одном магазине, особенно если они висят на вешалке как комплект. В этом сезоне очень модны кардиганы, тонкие свитера, длинные кофты и т.п. — а всё это можно навешать слоями и таким образом спрятать ценник.
Например: над стойкой в магазине одежды стоит яркий плакат «Скидка 40%». Покупатель логично предполагает, что скидка распространяется на всё, что на этой стойке висит, и хватает вешалку с блузкой, кардиганом, брюками и отлично подобранным пояском. Всё подходит. Идём на кассу. И там обнаруживаем, что скидка есть только на поясок. Или что брючки и пояс нам отдали подешевле, а на рубашку и кардиган накинули те же 40%, а то и больше.
Товары-близнецы
Чаще всего их можно встретить в магазинах бытовой техники, продуктовых или крупных сетевых гипермаркетах. Несколько товаров разных марок, но в похожей упаковке сваливается в кучу под «скидочный» плакат. При этом реальная уценка идёт только на один из товаров, но увлечённый покупатель этого не заметит.
Когда же на кассе обнаруживается разница в цене, вернуться в торговый зал, обменять товар и простоять ещё одну очередь ради 25 гривен нам зачастую просто лень. И на таких «сотнях» магазины за несколько недель зарабатывают миллионы.
Читателю на заметку
Большинство магазинов предупреждают покупателей о том, что «товар, купленный со скидкой, возврату и обмену не подлежит». Помните, это нарушение закона «О правах потребителя». Согласно ему, никакие скидки и акции не освобождают продавца от обязанности принять обратно или обменять товар в течение 2-х недель без объяснения причин, а также снизить цену на товар, если он оказался бракованным.
Мал золотник
Некоторые магазины в сезон распродаж вообще не делают никаких скидок, а просто пользуются потребительским оживлением. Так, на витрину или ящик с каким-нибудь мелким товаром (мылом, носками, салфетками и т.п.) водружается плакат «Мыло такое-то, 1 шт. — 2,5 грн». И счастливый покупатель, решая, что это, мол, очень дёшево, запасается мылом на год вперёд.
Однако в соседнем магазине то же мыло может стоить гораздо дешевле, а в этом всегда стоило 2,5 грн или вообще «внезапно» подорожало к сезону распродаж. Как правило, разница составляет 25-50 коп., но поскольку товар мелкий и набирают его много, итоговая выгода магазина огромна.
Смотрите под ноги
Те товары, от которых магазин хочет избавиться в первую очередь (непопулярные, слишком дорогие, с маленьким сроком годности и т.п.), почти всегда выставляют на верхние полки — так, чтобы они оказались на уровне глаз. И, конечно, объявляют на них «30-% скидку». Но попробуйте заглянуть на полки пониже или покопаться в дальних углах, и можете найти там аналогичный товар, но значительно дешевле «скидочного».
Вес имеет значение
Пачка масла марки «Х» стоит на 1-2 гривны дешевле, чем все остальные? Обратите внимание на её вес — наверняка он меньше стандартных 200 г.
Кто не успел, тот опоздал
Это излюбленный предновогодний трюк магазинов бытовой техники и электроники. На определенную модель какого-нибудь прибора обещается скидка в столько-то процентов. На рекламных плакатах указана итоговая цена, которая действительно оказывается меньше старой; однако, когда вы приходите в магазин, продавец разводит руками и говорит, что именно вот этой модели в продаже уже нет. И предлагает вам другую, которая стоит примерно столько же.
Чаще всего покупатель согласится — ведь цифра-то всё равно аналогична ожидаемой; но никакой выгоды он при этом не получит: купленный товар всегда стоил тех же денег.

description.hltext_display: Seattle ships C Rob Johnson to San Diego
description.content:
The Seattle Mariners have traded catcher Rob Johnson to the San Diego Padres for a player to be named later or cash considerations.
Seattle and San Diego made the deal on Tuesday.
Johnson had been designated for assignment by the Mariners on Dec. 13 after the Mariners signed designated hitter Jack Cust and needed a spot on the 40-man roster.
Johnson was Seattle's opening day starter behind the plate in 2010 but his struggles at the plate eventually led to his demotion to Triple-A Tacoma. The 28-year-old Johnson played in 61 games last season with Seattle, but hit just .191.
He also struggled with an American League-high nine passed balls in less than a half-season.
Johnson never played for the Mariners after Aug. 1. In 18 games at Tacoma, Johnson hit .297.
Johnson was originally the Mariners' fourth-round pick in 2004 and played parts of four seasons in Seattle.

description.hltext_display: Russia investigates Bank of Moscow over loan (AFP)
description.content:
MOSCOW (AFP) Russian law enforcement officials have opened a criminal investigation into a top Russian bank owned by the Moscow city government, the Kommersant business daily reported Wednesday.
The probe into the Bank of Moscow, which has been majority-owned by the city since 1995, is linked to a 12.76-billion-ruble (415-million-dollar) loan the bank issued to a little known firm in 2009, Kommersant said.
That company then went on to purchase a plot of land at what investigators believe was an inflated price from Yelena Baturina, the wife of the now-deposed mayor of Moscow, Yury Luzhkov.
Baturina has risen to become Russia's richest woman according to Forbes magazine on the back of Moscow real estate contracts awarded to her Inteko construction firm.
But the company has been riddled with debt since the 2009 financial crisis.
The Financial Times reported that the transaction took place on the same day as the Moscow city parliament approved a 15-billion-ruble transfer to the Bank of Moscow. Russia's interior ministry is now checking to see whether the funds were transferred to help Baturina settle her debts, the Financial Times said.
A spokesman for Baturina's company told the Interfax news agency Wednesday that the land deal was "completely legal" but provided no further details.
Luzhkov became mayor of Moscow in 1992 and eventually established himself as one of Russia's most powerful regional bosses.
But he lost a political tug of war with the Kremlin and was fired by President Dmitry Medvedev in September.
The bank is also being probed by the country's audit chamber -- with both investigations launched since Luzhkov's ouster. "The Bank of Moscow financed all of Moscow's major economic projects, which is why is why we are checking all the funds that flowed from the bank to the city," audit chamber chief Sergei Stepashin was quoted as saying by Interfax.
He said the initial results of the audit chamber's investigation would be made public this month.
The Russian media reported this month that Baturina has been negotiating to sell her company. Inteko officials have refused to publicly comment on the reports.
The investigation surfaced amid attempts by Russia's VTB bank to acquire the Moscow lender.
The Bank of Moscow has accused VTB of making a series of false allegation about the bank that are meant to help reduce its eventual acquisition price.
VTB executives this month said they had questions about the Bank of Moscow's ownership structure and whether some of its city assets were in fact privately held.
The Bank of Moscow reports on its website that it is Russia's fifth-largest bank in terms of assets and capital.
It also says that the Moscow city government owns 46.48 percent of the bank directly and 17.32 percent indirectly through another city-controlled firm.

event_or_fact.property: the initial results of the audit chamber's investigation would be made public this month
The Bank of Moscow financed all of Moscow's major economic projects, which is why is why we are checking all the funds that flowed from the bank to the city

description.hltext_display: 損保ジャパン、支払い漏れ１７００件
'엔씨, 구단 창단'…게임업계 '긍� �� � 기대'
description.content: 【서울=뉴시스】강세훈 기자 = 엔씨소프가 프로야구 제9단 창단 의향서를 제출해 스포트라이트를 받고 있는 가운데, 게임업계에서는 부러움과 함께 긍정적인 기대를 나타내고 있다. 22일 엔씨소프트는 KBO(한국야구위원회)에 제9단 창단 의향서를 제출했다고 밝혔다. 엔씨소프트의 창의성, 도전정신, IT 기술력, 세상 사람들을 더 즐겁게 만든다는 기업 목표가 어우러져 야구단 운영에 나서게 됐다고 설명했다. 게임업계에서는 엔씨소프트의 신생 구단 창단 의지를 크게 반기는 분위기다. 부정적인 이미지가 강했던 게임산업에 대한 인식 개선에 일조할 것으로 기대하고 있기 때문이다. 업계의 한 관계자는 "야구단을 운영할 정도로 게임산업이 성장했다는 인식을 심어줄 수 있을 것"이라며 "야구 팬의 입장에서도 게임업계 종사자로나 기대가 크다"고 말했다. 특히 최근 정부가 게임산업을 유해산업으로 지목하며 강도 높은 규제를 가하고 있는 상황. 엔씨소프트의 야구단을 창단 의지는 게임산업이 사회적 역할을 충실히 이행하고 있음을 보여주는 셈이다. 또 다른 업계의 한 관계자도 "게임회사가 프로야구단을 운영하게 되면 게임에 대한 국민들의 인식이 바뀔수 있을 것으로 기대한다"며 "국내 게임업체들의 사회적 책임에 대한 높은 인식을 보여주는 일"이라고 말했다. 또한 네오위즈게임즈와 CJ인터넷, 엔트리브소프트 등 야구게임을 서비스하는 회사들도 유저 유입 효과를 거둘 것으로 전망되고 있다. 엔씨소프트의 경우에도 이미지 격상 효과도 클 것으로 기대되고 있다. 1997년 3월 설립한 엔씨소프트는 지난해 약 6300억원의 매출액을 벌어들이며 넥슨에 이어 게임업계 2위를 차지하고 있다. 하지만 '리니지'와 '아이온' 등 주요게임이 대부분이 중독성이 높은 다중접속역할수행게임(MMORPG) 장르이고, 아이템 현금 거래 문제 등으로 사회적 이슈를 낳기도 했다. 이 때문에 중독성 게임 회사란 이미지가 여전히 있는 것도 사실이다. 하지만 국민스포츠로 자리잡은 프로야구의 구단을 운영하게 되면 브랜드 인지도를 높이고 기업 이미지 제고에도 큰 도움이 될 것으로 기대되고 있다. 앞서 CJ인터넷의 경우에도 2009년부터 KBO 타이틀 스폰서로 참여해 게임 사업 면이나 기업 이미지 제고에 큰 효과를 거뒀으며, 해외에서도 일본 게임사 닌텐도가 미국 메이저리그 시애틀 매리너스 구단을 소유하면서 프로야구에 참여하고 있다. kangse@newsis.com 저작권자ⓒ '한국언론 뉴스허브' 뉴시스통신사. 무단전재-재배포 금지.

description.hltext_display: 沪深基指12月22日收盘涨跌互现
《降龙之剑》圣诞新版抢先探秘
description.author: zolgame
description.content:
次世代2D热血PK网游《降龙之剑》将于12月23日（本周四）进行例行维护，而在维护之后将会新增圣诞及元旦系列活动，开放元宝寄售系统，新增10-70级全新支线任务，以及玩家生日及节日免费领取礼物等多项内容。
【新增内容】
圣诞节元旦系列活动
说明：从12月23日-1月3日持续的圣诞节元旦系列活动，轻松参与、奖励丰厚。
元宝寄售系统
说明：玩家可以在寄售系统中寄售道具，购买的玩家需要使用元宝。
10-70级新的任务线
说明：10-70级的全新支线任务，游戏更加丰富多彩，玩法更加多样。
节日礼物使者
说明：玩家每逢自己生日及每年的节日，可以在该使者处免费领取一份奖励。节日每年共计30个，从1月1日元旦持续到12月25日圣诞，全年不休，送礼不停。
魅力榜礼包新增“独角兽”坐骑
商城新增圣诞系列道具
说明：包括圣诞时装、坐骑、限量大礼盒等系列节日道具。
商城新增圣诞系列礼包出售
说明：包括“欢乐冲星礼包”在内的数种礼包火热上架，全面促销，同贺《降龙之剑》的第一个圣诞节。
【调整内容】
恶魔岛PK死亡掉落机制调整：若掉落的道具为叠加道具，则只掉落一个。
仓库扩充上限为200格，后100格打开时为双倍效果，即一个仓库扩充（5格）可以打开10个仓库格子。
调整10-30级地图为全地图可以穿人设置。
30级以下心法等级与角色等级绑定，30级需2个20级心法，20级需2个10级心法。
魅力榜月活动调整为周活动，冠军有几率获得金色马匹和珍稀独角兽坐骑。 《降龙之剑》已于12月10日开放全新电信服务器【烽火连城】，即刻入驻，所有内容抢先体验就此开始。
《降龙之剑》官方网站：http://xlzj.wanmei.com
《降龙之剑》玩法大荟萃：http://xlzj.wanmei.com/info/index.htm

description.hltext_display: 香港恒指收升0.22% 靠稳23,000点水平
description.content:
[世华财讯]港股22日收升0.22%，靠稳23,000点水平；分析师表示，虽然恒指早段承接昨日反弹走势，但内地A股由升转跌，拖累大市迅速回落
，随着圣诞节长假临近，投资者投资意欲不大，料港股短期上涨动力不足，恒指或将继续于22,800-23,500点区间波动。
港股12月22日冲高回顺，恒指高开45点升越23,000点后，升势逐步扩大，最多升166.6点高见23,160.44点，但在内地A股转跌拖累下，恒指午后一度倒跌至22,990.69点，之后于23,000点大关争持，全日收报23,045.19点，升51.33点或0.22%，国企指数收报12,611.3点，升3.87点或0.03%，红筹指数收报4,176.3点，升22.13点或0.53%，大市成交继续淡静，全日成交额萎缩至541.99亿港元。

description.hltext_display: 地方ベンチャーに上場のススメ 証券業界 “ＩＰＯ復活”起爆剤
07:41 Angry Samba seeks Rovers exit
description.content:
Captain Christopher Samba is intent on leaving Blackburn after being angered by the decision of new owners Venky's to sack manager Sam Allardyce.
The Indian food group axed Allardyce within a month of completing their takeover of the club, with Steve Kean currently in temporary charge as a long-term replacement is sought.
"If this is the way the club's going to be run from now on, I don't want to be part of it and I want to leave," said the 26-year-old in remarks reported by the Sun.
"As captain it's very difficult to say this but I've thought long and hard about it. Nobody in football understands the decision to sack Sam.
"We could have been relegated last year and Sam saved the club, so how can he be treated like this now?"
Samba exempted chairman John Williams from blame, though, before pleading for a swift decision over Allardyce's replacement.
"I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision. He's a football man and respects what a great job Sam has done," he said.
He added: "The players and fans need answers about the club's future. Unless we commit to who the manager is, how can we attract big players in January?"

event_or_fact.property: The players and fans need answers about the club's future.
I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision.

description.hltext_display: KTIS, 가천의대길병원과 U-헬스 사업 진출
description.content: 【서울=뉴시스】정옥주 기자 = KT자회사인 마케팅 전문 기업 케이티스(KTIS)는 가천의대길병원과 공동으로 U-헬스케어 사업을 추진한다고 22일 밝혔다. 이날 인천 가천의대길병원 뇌과학연구소 1층 회의실에서 진행된 양해각서(MOU) 체결식에는 이태훈 가천의대길병원장과 노태석 KTIS 대표이사를 비롯해 양측 임직원들이 참석했다. KTIS는 서울 지역 종합병원 및 지방 병원을 포함 약 30개 병·의원 예약센터를 운영하며 쌓아온 노하우와 전문인력 인프라를 바탕으로 가천의대길병원과 U-헬스 사업모델을 공동 개발, 사업화할 계획이다. 노태석 대표이사는 "IT환경에서 유비쿼터스 시대로 변하고 있는 의료환경에서 U-헬스 산업이 급성장할 것으로 예견돼 이번 MOU에 거는 기대가 크다"며 "앞으로 가천의대길병원을 비롯한 타병원과의 협력을 지속적으로 확대해 나갈 예정"이라고 말했다. channa224@newsis.com 저작권자ⓒ '한국언론 뉴스허브' 뉴시스통신사. 무단전재-재배포 금지.

description.hltext_display: 香港国企指数收升0.03% 煤炭及石化股领涨
description.content:
[世华财讯]香港国企指数22日收升0.03%，煤炭及石化股领涨；分析师指出，内地上调油价带动石化股走好，并提振国指一度走高，但内地A股再度走弱，对国指走势形成拖累，而在市场成交偏低之际，预计国指将延续窄幅上落走势。
香港国企指数12月22日高开40.69点后一度升见12,709.760点，但在内地A股由升转跌拖累下，一度倒跌至12,583.26点，全日收报12,611.3点，升3.87点或0.03%，成份股个别发展。
资源股普遍上扬，其中，煤炭及石化股表现较佳，兖州煤业(01171)升3.56%，中国石化(00386)升2.35%，鞍钢股份 ( 00347 ) 升1.84%，紫金矿业 ( 02899 ) 升0.99%，中煤能源 ( 01898 ) 升0.84%，中国神华 ( 01088 ) 升0.77%，中国铝业 ( 02600 ) 升0.71%，中石油(00857)升0.3%，而江西铜业(00358)跌0.2%。
金融股方面，保险股表现较佳，中国财险 ( 02328 ) 升1.82%，中国太保 ( 02601 ) 升1.32%，中国人寿 ( 02628 ) 升0.79%，中国平安 ( 02318 ) 持平；而银行股则普遍回落，民生银行 ( 01988 ) 跌1.2%，建设银行 ( 00939 ) 跌1%，工商银行 ( 01398 ) 跌0.87%，中国银行 ( 03988 ) 跌0.73%，中信银行 ( 00998 ) 跌0.6%，农行(01288)跌0.49%，唯有交行(03328)及招行(03968)分别升0.51%及0.41%。

description.hltext_display: Wrestling: Highland sweeps - again; Indians stunned
description.content:
Journal Staff Idaho State Journal | 0 comments
Highland 62, Hillcrest 18
Highland 54, Bonneville 30
The Rams raised their record to 15-0 by crunching Hillcrest and Bonneville in a double-dual meet at Bonneville.
“I am just grateful to get through the last week and a half,” said Highland coach Travis Bell. “Most of our kids picked up 18 matches. At Bonneville, it was two great victories over two great teams. Our kids had some tough battles.”
Highland heavyweight Gaylen Edmo picked up a forfeit against Hillcrest, then pinned Bonneville’s Alan Rice in 12 seconds. Edmo has an 18-0 record with 18 pins.
Rams 160-pounder Andre Lopez picked up a pair of pins as did 145-pounder T.J. Southwood. Bell said 125-pounder Trey Hugues had two wins over tough opponents and he also noted that 140-pounder Cole Weir, who picked up a pin and a decision win, continues to be a great senior leader.
Hillcrest pins Pocatello
Pocatello’s wrestling team was stunned on Tuesday by Hillcrest 42-33 at a double dual meet at Bonneville High School. The Indians split on the evening, winning it’s first meet against the host Bees.
Highland was also at the event, but the two local schools did not face off. That meet will come on Jan. 7.
“We had some injury forfeits, and that hurt,” said Pocatello head coach Todd Praska. “But what really killed us was that Hillcrest’s best wrestlers matched up really well with ours.”
One of the biggest upsets of the night was when Knights’ Nicko Moreno (135-pounds) pinned Sean McClellen in 2:20.McClellan had earlier defeated his Bonneville opponent in 3:31.
Tyler Praska (145) and Matt Okelberry (160) had wins for the Indians against both Hillcrest and Bonneville, but the Knight gained forfeits in two of the last three matches to pull out the victory.

?I am just grateful to get through the last week and a half,?
125-pounder Trey Hugues had two wins over tough opponents and he also noted that 140-pounder Cole Weir, who picked up a pin and a decision win, continues to be a great senior leader

description.hltext_display: Gefährliche Glätte in Berlin und Brandenburg
description.content:
Wegen des Verdachts schweren sexuellen Mißbrauchs wird gegen einen Krankenpfleger des Helios-Klinikums in Berlin-Buch ermittelt.
Er ist seit Freitag in Untersuchungshaft. Der Beschuldigte soll mehrere Jungen auf der Kinderintensivstation sexuell misbraucht und davon Videosequenzen mit einem Handy aufgenommen haben. Die Ermittler gehen bisher von fünf Fällen aus.
Der Direktor des Helios-Klinikums Buch, Christian Straub, äußerte sich fassungslos über die Vorfälle. Noch sei völlig unklar, wie es trotz der guten Personalausstattung auf der Intensivstation und der Anwesenheit von betreuenden Eltern dazu habe kommen können.Die Klinik werde alles daran setzen, das sich solche Fälle nicht wiederholen, sagte Straub dem rbb.

description.hltext_display: Ramsauer hält Winterreifen-Regelung für ausreichend
description.content: In der Diskussion über eine Winterreifenpflicht für LKW hält Bundesverkehrsminister Ramsauer die aktuelle Regelung für ausreichend. Nicht vorschriftsmäßig bereifte Lastwagen würden sofort aus dem Verkehr gezogen, betonte Ramsauer...

description.hltext_display: 香港红筹指数收升0.53% 电信股逆市走低
description.content:
[世华财讯]香港红筹指数22日收升0.53%，成份股普遍上扬，分析师表示，欧美市场续升，利多市场人气，提振红筹指数一度走高，但随着圣诞假期临近，在市场成交偏低之际，预计红筹指数短期维持4,000-4,400点震荡走势。
香港红筹指数12月22日高开8.68点后一度高见4,190.2点，之后随市收窄升幅，全日收报4,176.3点，升22.13点或0.53%，成份股升多跌少。
电信股走低，权重股中移动(00941)跌0.06%，中国联通 ( 00762 ) 跌0.52%。石油股走势分化，中国海洋石油 ( 00883 ) 升0.66%，昆仑能源 ( 00135 ) 跌1.61%。
地产股涨跌互现，保利香港 ( 00119 ) 升1.3%，中国海外发展 ( 00688 ) 升1.09%，华润置地 ( 01109 ) 升1%，远洋地产 ( 03377 ) 及越秀地产 ( 00123 ) 持平，而方兴地产 ( 00817 ) 跌3.38%。
(李姝婵 撰稿)

description.content:
想要一个展现自我的机会？想要拥有一份幸运的惊喜？世纪天成携手爱国者再推全新活动，让你在圣诞节和新年伊始收获节日好礼，而你需要做的就是尽情展示自己！

description.hltext_display: Police stop man from burning self
description.content:
WESTVILLE — A man was injured Tuesday after trying to set himself on fire near a Westville school.
Westville police, along with medical personnel, responded just before 4 p.m. to the scene near Westville Senior High School, 918 N. State St.
According to Westville Police Capt. David Booe, the name of the man was not released as family members were contacted about the situation.
The man was taken by ambulance to Provena United Samaritans Medical Center for treatment. Booe said the man had doused himself in gasoline. He successfully ignited himself before he was tackled by police and rolled in the snow, which put out the fire. A reason for the man’s actions was unknown, although Booe described the man as “irate” at the time.

entity.property: N. State St. According to Westville Police

description.hltext_display: CJ헬로비� �，中企 � �화사업 직� � 한다
description.content: 케이블TV 방송사업자(SO)인 CJ헬로비전이 중소기업(SMB) 전화시장 공략에 직접 나선다. CJ헬로비전은 오는 2013년도 전체 매출의 10%를 중소기업 케이블TV-전화-인터넷 결합상품에서 달성한다는 목표도 세웠다. CJ헬로비전은 세종텔레콤의 350여만명 가입자 분량의 인터넷전화·국제전화 교환시설 및 영업권을 인수해 기업영업 시장에 직접 참여한다고 22일 밝혔다. 지금까지는 한국케이블텔레콤(KCT)을 통해 간접적으로 일반 가정용 전화와 인터넷 시장 영업을 해왔는데 앞으로는 CJ헬로비전이 직접 영업에 나서겠다는 것이다. 특히 CJ헬로비전은 올해 케이블TV와 인터넷전화, 초고속인터넷 상품에서 달성한 매출액 100억원 중 2%가량을 중소기업 시장에서 달성한 만큼 내년에도 이 여세를 몰아 약 200억원 매출달성을 목표로 잡아놓았고 오는 2013년까지는 2.5배 이상 급성장을 이루겠다는 전략이다. CJ헬로비전은 "중소기업이나 병원 같은 소형 사업장에 케이블TV 영업을 하다 보니 전화나 인터넷 등 통신분야 수요가 의외로 많은데 KCT를 통한 간접영업 방식으로는 기업시장 수요에 대응하기가 어려워 직접 영업에 나서기로 했다"고 설명했다. 즉, CJ헬로비전의 케이블TV를 시청하는 중소기업이 케이블TV에 인터넷전화와 초고속인터넷을 결합해 저렴한 요금으로 통합서비스를 희망하면 이를 CJ헬로비전의 영업직원이 직접 다양한 결합상품을 설계해 시장을 공략해 가겠다는 전략이다. CJ헬로비전 관계자는 "올해 중소기업 시장에서 달성한 100억원의 매출 가운데 절반 이상이 전화 매출"이라며 "케이블TV를 중심으로 영업이 확대되는 가정시장과 달리 중소기업 시장은 전화나 인터넷을 기반으로 케이블TV가 결합하는 구조여서 직접 영업력을 키울 필요성이 커지고 있다"고 강조했다. 그러나 CJ헬로비전은 일반 가정 시장까지 영업력을 동시에 넓히기가 어려운 데다 케이블TV SO들의 인터넷전화 시장 연합공략 전략 구도를 깨지 않기 위해 일반 가족용 인터넷전화 시장은 당분간 KCT를 통한 간접 영업방식을 유지하기로 했다. /cafe9@fnnews.com이구순기자 ※ 저작권자 ⓒ 파이낸셜뉴스 . 무단 전재-재배포 금지 [☞ First-Class경제신문 파이낸셜뉴스 구독신청하기]

description.hltext_display: Martin Fredriksson - dödsfall
description.author: webmaster@nsd.se
description.content:
Martin Fredriksson, Luleå, har avlidit efter en tids sjukdom i en ålder av 78 år.
När det gäller att tala om min gode vän Martin behövs inga överdrifter... det är en vänskap, som känns som en riktad människokärlek. Den växer fram och blir bestående, även efter döden.
Martin har många vänner, som han fick genom sin hjälpsamhet och generositet, att inte alltid sätta sig själv i främsta rummet.
Han har genom sina intressen och verksamheter ett stort socialt nät av kontakter: Friluftsfrämjandet, kursplanering, ekonomi och ledarskap som skidlärare. Motionär med längdåkning, promenader och på äldre dagar även boule. Martin såg det som sin uppgift och deltog med intresse i föreningslivet, till exempel i den bostadsrättsförening, där han och Ulla gjort det trivsamt för sig.
Martin var den som höll ordning och reda oavsett vad han sysslade med, inte minst på oss inom Friluftsfrämjandet, där han "sopade" upp efter oss. En Gällivarekurs utan Martin var ingen riktig kurs! I föreningslivet en klippa, verka utan att synas, honnörsord för en man av ordning. Luddiga besked och vaga uttalanden gillade inte Martin, han kunde till och med bli irriterad över sådant "svammel".
Martin talade aldrig illa om sina medmänniskor, han var i den saken mycket respektfull. Inte minst därför blev han själv en mycket respekterad person.
Saker och ting behövde inte vara så fantastiska och storvulna kring Martin, med Martin kunde man mysa i det lilla. Han storgarvar inte utan skrockar lite och ler förnöjt. Ett sätt att vara och väldigt nöjd med det liv han lever.
För Martin satt kontrollen i generna, kontrollen över sin kropp och sina känslor. Inget utåtagerande här inte, en lite introvert läggning, som nog gav en stress som han brottades med mellan varven. Syntes, när vi tillsammans åkte utför, kontroll på varje sväng!
I Martins och Ullas paradis, stugan på Skatan, blev kärleken till varandra så tydlig, till skogen, havet, ja hela skapelsen.
Det bästa man kan säga till en människa vill jag säga till Martin.
Du är en god människa!
Din vän Totte

description.hltext_display: New Zealand Air Force releases 47 years of UFO reports
description.author: DPA
description.content:
Wellington - The New Zealand Air Force released Wednesday more than 2,000 pages of previously top secret reports on nearly half a century of UFO sightings.
News reports indicated that the material, documenting alleged sightings of strange flying objects from 1952 to 2009, showed no evidence of visits to the Pacific country from outer space.
They particularly shed no new light on New Zealand's most famous UFO sighting of mystery lights seen by crew and passengers on a commercial airline flight along the east coast of the South Island in December 1978.
The lights, which were filmed by a Television New Zealand camera crew aboard the plane, were observed at the same time as air traffic controllers said they saw mysterious objects on their radar, but said no other aircraft were reported in the area.
The documents include suggestions by various people that they were reflected lights from a squid boat, a meteor or caused by atmospheric conditions.
But Suzanne Hansen, who told Television New Zealand she had been researching UFO sightings for 35 years, said, 'It is obviously something else we can't explain.
'We don't know what it is, but it is certainly something that is unidentified and non-conventional.'
TVNZ said the 12 volumes contained correspondence 'of a fairly outlandish nature' but there was also a 1961 sighting from a respected Air Force officer who insisted he saw a mysterious cigar-shaped object, with what appeared to be a cockpit and undercarriage - a sighting that baffled him and his superiors.

event_or_fact.property: she had been researching UFO sightings for 35 years, said, 'It is obviously something else we can't explain

description.hltext_display: Veldhoven houdt waterenquête
description.content: VELDHOVEN - Hoe is het gesteld met de afvoer van hemelwater en afvalwater in uw buurt? Wat merkt u van het grondwater? Het zijn zomaar twee vragen die de gemeente Veldhoven aan haar burgers stelt in een waterenquête. De gemeente hoopt via de vragenlijst een goed beeld te krijgen van hoe Veldhovenaren met het water in hun omgeving omgaan en hoe daar beleid op gemaakt moet worden.

description.hltext_display: 07:51 Indian missile test 'successful'
description.content:
India claims to have successfully tested a short-range, nuclear-capable missile with a range of 220 miles.
The army twice fired the surface-to-surface missile Prithvi II from a range in Chandipur in the eastern state of Orissa, a senior official said.
The missile, which would target mainly military installations, can carry a warhead weighing up to 1,100lb (500kg).
It has already been tested more than half a dozen times. However, a test of the same missile three months ago failed due to technical problems.
India and long-time rival Pakistan routinely test-fire missiles, and usually notify each other ahead of the launches.
New Delhi has said it developed its current crop of missiles - including the short-range Prithvi, the anti-tank Nag and the supersonic BrahMos - as a deterrent against neighbours China and Pakistan.
India's Agni-II missile, with a range of up to 1,250 miles, can put areas of southern China within striking distance. And the Agni-III, successfully tested last year, can carry nuclear warheads across much of Asia and the Middle East.

description.hltext_display: 华工科技增资子公司用于募投项目投资
description.content:
[世华财讯]华工科技董事会审议通过了关于公司利用募集资金向武汉华工激光工程有限责任公司增资的议案，此次用募集资金向华工激光增资的行为符合公司发展需要，有利于长远发展。
华工科技 ( 000988 ) 12月22日发布公告，公司董事会审议通过了《关于公司利用募集资金向武汉华工激光工程有限责任公司增资的议案》，此次向华工激光增资行为无需公司股东大会批准，此次增资亦不构成关联交易。
此次增资的目的是用于华工激光建设公司配股募投项目，包括先进固体激光器产业化项目、半导体材料激光精密制造装备项目、激光加工工艺研发中心建设项目和激光特种制造装备项目。
公司2009年度配股募集资金净额约为4.21亿元，并已于2009年12月以募集资金向武汉华工激光工程有限责任公司增资1.5亿元。为了保证华工激光项目工程建设的资金需求，根据工程建设安排，公司将于近期向华工激光增资6,000万元。增资完成后，华工激光注册资本金从现在的2.8亿元增加至3.4亿元。
根据华工科技2009年9月16日发布的《华工科技产业股份有限公司2009年度配股说明书》，公司此次配股所募集的资金将投入五个项目，其中先进固体激光器产业化项目、半导体材料激光精密制造装备项目、激光加工工艺研发中心建设项目和激光特种制造装备项目由武汉华工激光工程有限责任公司负责建设。
华工激光系公司全资子公司，该公司主要经营激光加工技术及设备的开发、研制、技术服务；激光仪器、强激光治疗仪器生产等。根据武汉众环会计师事务所有限责任公司出具的《武汉华工激光工程有限责任公司审计报告》，华工激光2009年的主要财务指标为，资产总额约7亿元，负债总额3.54亿元，应收款项总额2亿元，归属于母公司所有者的净资产3.5亿元。公司2009年实现营业收入1.79亿元，营业利润46.53万元，归属于母公司所有者的净利润320.43万元，经营活动产生的现金流量净额-609.23万元。
华工科技目前已经形成了四大核心业务即激光加工设备及成套设备、激光全息综合防伪标识及包装材料、敏感电子元器件、光通信器件与模块，在四大领域市场占有率均处于国内领先水平，旗下的华工图像、高理电子、正源光子、华工激光已经成为各自领域的知名龙头企业。
在激光加工设备中，大型成套设备占收入的比重高达70％，主要应用于工程机械、汽车车辆的生产制造，激光精密加工30％。公司已经开发出紫外、绿光以及光纤激光器，相关的精密加工设备也已经投入市场。公司未来将重点发展高端产品，如大功率切割以发展大幅面为主，小功率产品以精密设备为主。
在光通讯器件方面，公司产品主要为华为、中兴通讯、大唐等GPON配套，在三网融合的推动下，公司未来具有很大的发展空间。公司目前已经推出40G产品，国内没有竞争对手，正在送样阶段；在敏感元器件方面，公司产品主要是热敏电阻，是温度传感器中的核心部件，目前的主要客户是国内的家电公司，是美的的唯一供应商，格力等调公司均是公司客户。
公司此前发布了份澄清公告，主要是针对国元证券此前发布的《华工科技―金陵岂非池中物，一遇风云便化龙》的文章，核实了关于华工激光与境外某公司签定激光打标机订单，以及与美国云桥公司合作成立云计算公司的报道，海外订单的签定体现了公司所具备的较强的技术能力，云计算公司的设立体现了公司对未来业务发展前瞻性布局能力。
华工科技2010年三季报显示，公司前三季度实现营业收入14.13亿元，同比增长33.81％；净利润2.06亿元，同比增长67.9％；每股收益0.51元，其中第三季度每股收益0.08元。

description.hltext_display: Mayor names 2 to police board
description.content:
Council members approved a corrected tax levy ordinance. The actual levy was $608,913, according to Alderman Brandon Hamilton. The ordinance had a typographical error.
Learned the city dog catcher gave two weeks notice to the city. An ad will be placed in the paper next week regarding the part time position, said Alderman Ed Lotz.
Learned several members of the city had not received certification from online testing through the National Emergency Management System (NIMS) several months ago. A request will be sent for city officials to receive the certificates.
Petition packets for alderpersons are now available from the city of Hoopeston. Deadline for the petitions to be returned is near the end of January, according to Crusinberry. One four-year term in Wards 1, 2, 3 and 4 are up for election. Petitions also will be available for a two-year city treasurer’s position.

description.hltext_display: 12月21日股指期货全线高开
Raiders rally to surge past Jaguars
description.author: KEVIN PHILLIPS
description.content:
MIDDLETOWN -- Ursuline Academy turned up the defensive pressure in the second quarter to storm past host Appoquinimink and win 61-42 in girls' basketball action Tuesday night. The Raiders (3-0) trailed 9-0 early in the game and 11-5 entering the second quarter as the Jaguars pounced on Ursuline errors.
"We really didn't do what we were supposed to do. We all played how we wanted to play and didn't work as a team," said Audra Cranston, who led the Raiders with 13 points. "Our coach kind of let us have it and said we had to play like we do in practice every single day."
Ursuline turned it around in the second as the Raiders began to press the ball more, putting two defenders on the ball and leading to several Jaguars turnovers. That led to easy baskets, and Ursuline outscored Appoquinimink 28-4 in the quarter to take a 33-15 lead into halftime.
Ursuline's lead ballooned to 22 early in the second half, but Appoquinimink (3-2) started to claw back into the game, pulling within 11 points on two occasions, but each time it appeared the Jaguars were going to get back in the game, Ursuline went on a run to halt the comeback attempt.
Eleven different Raiders scored in the game.
"We have the greatest depth in the state, and that's what our team tries to do," Cranston said. "We don't have to give the ball to one person. We pass the ball around, and everyone can score."
Ashley Smith scored 14 points to lead Appoquinimink with Amani Clark and Nicole Cwiertniewicz added 10 for the Jaguars.
Ursuline 61, Appoquinimink 42
Ursuline 5 28 7 21 - 61
Appoquinimink 11 4 12 15 - 42
URSULINE - Carter 2 4-4 8, Abram 2 2-4 6, Cranston 4 3-4 13, M. Williams 2 0-0 5, B. Williams 0 1-2 1, Wendel 3 0-0 6, Witt 2 0-0 4, Noonan 1 1-2 3, Garcia 2 0-0 6, Lyons 1 2-3 4, Hahn 1 3-4 5. Totals 20 16-24 61.
APPOQUINIMINK - Wiener 0 0-2 0, Clark 4 2-7 10, Smith 4 4-5 14, Cwiertniewicz 4 2-2 10, Harper 0 0-0 0, Bond 1 2-2 4, Scott 1 2-3 4, Cale 0 0-0 0, Minner 0 0-0 0. Totals 15 10-20 42.
Three-point goals- U 5 (Cranston 2, Garcia 2, M. Williams 1). A- 2 (Smith 2).

description.hltext_display: 「ネット番付2010」、ゲーム部門「ゲームキャラクター賞」マリオが1位に
description.content:
2010年12月22日(水) 17時30分
Yahoo!Japanが実施した「ネット番付2010」のゲーム部門にて、任天堂の「マリオ」がゲームキャラクター賞の第1位に輝きました。
これは、2009年11月1日～2010年10月31日に発売されたゲームソフトのなかから、Yahoo! JAPANでの検索回数をもとに、Yahoo!ゲームでのアクセス数、ニュース掲載数などを総合的に考慮してノミネートし、インターネット利用者の投票により決定したもの。
1位を獲得したマリオは、『New スーパーマリオブラザーズ Wii』に登場。9,862票を獲得しました。これは、2位の「初音ミク」（『初音ミク -Project DIVA- 2nd』）を3,000票以上、上回っています。
なお、3位以下には「伊達政宗」（『戦国BASARA3』）、「ネイキッド・スネーク」（『METAL GEAR SOLID PEACE WALKER』）、「アイルー」（『モンハン日記 ぽかぽかアイルー村』）が続きます。
マリオの人気は、誕生してから25周年となる今年も不動のものだったようです。
