description.hltext_display: Afghan official rebukes NATO for civilian deaths
description.content:
An Afghan provincial governor says NATO needs to exert greater caution in its operations following the death of five civilians during a battle with insurgents.
The office of the governor of Helmand province said in a statement Wednesday that the five civilians killed during the clash a day earlier included three women and two children. NATO says it is investigating the deaths, which Afghan officials say occurred during a Taliban raid on an Afghan national police checkpoint.
Afghan officials have repeatedly spoken out about civilian deaths, arguing that the international forces are not being careful enough to avoid such casualties as the war nears its tenth year. Insurgents also try to use the civilian death toll as a way of rallying support for their cause.

description.hltext_display: [한중일 바둑 영웅전] 고수는 웅크리지 않는다
description.content:
흑13은 세력의 분수령이 되는 곳. 이제는 백이 14의 걸침을 서두르지 않을 수 없다. 그 방면을 흑이 두면 흑진이 양날개를 편 이상형이 되기 때문이다. 흑15, 17은 예정 코스. 여기서 콩지에는 12분을 장고했다. 두칸벌림이냐 세칸벌림이냐를 놓고 고민한 것이었다.
교과서에 적힌 대로 2립3전을 하자면 마땅히 실전보의 백18로 벌려야 하는데 이미 상변에 흑 한 점이 대기하고 있는 상태이기 때문에 문제인 것이다. 흑19의 침공이 불을 보듯 뻔한 장면이니까. 기리에 맞게 두자면 백은 참고도1의 백1로 한칸을 좁혀야 한다. 그러나 그것이면 흑은 2로 하나 걸쳐놓고서 흑4, 6으로 모양도 좋게 우상귀 방면을 키울 것이다. 이 코스는 백이 겁난다.
백18은 콩지에의 결단이었다. 자기의 약점을 그대로 드러낸 채 싸우는 길을 선택한 것. 약점을 커버하기 위해서는 웅크려야 마땅하지만 공격당할 때 당하더라도 웅크릴 수는 없다는 고수의 자존심이었다. 흑19는 노타임. 뛰어들지 않을 이유가 없는 곳이다. 백20은 일단 이렇게 누르고 볼 자리. 여기서 이세돌은 5분쯤 뜸을 들였다.
사이버오로의 해설을 맡은 송태곤9단은 참고도2의 흑1 이하 5을 진작에 생중계 사이트에 올려놓고 있었다.
"이것으로 흑이 기분좋아요."(송태곤)
그것이면 흑의 실리가 돋보이며 백대마는 아직 미생마의 신세였다. 그런데 이세돌은 여기서 더 좋은 수가 혹시 없나 궁리에 빠졌다. 이 궁리가 결과적으로 화근이 될 줄이야….

description.hltext_display: 成品油价第三度上调 新机制有望明年实施
description.content:
[世华财讯]国家发改委12月21日夜间发布通知，根据现行成品油价格形成机制，结合近一段时间国际市场油价变化情况，决定调整国内成品油价格，汽、柴油供应价格每吨分别提高310元和300元，调整后的汽、柴油供应价格分别为每吨7,730元和6,980元。测算到零售价格90号汽油和0号柴油(全国平均)每升分别提高0.23元和0.26元。其他成品油价格相应调整。
【专题：国内成品油价格上调】
综合考虑国内物价形势以及成品油市场供应状况，国家适当推迟了提价时间、控制了提价幅度。10月26日国内成品油价格调整以来，国际市场油价持续震荡上扬，早在12月初，再度上调成品油价格的条件就已经符合。根据目前实施的成品油调价机制，当国际市场原油连续22个工作日平均价格变化超过4%时，可相应调价。其中，当国际油价小于80美元/桶时，按正常加工利润率计算油价；当油价大于80美元/桶时，开始扣减加工利润率，直至按加工零利润计算油价；当国家油价超过130美元/桶时，将采取财税政策保证成品油生产和供应，汽、柴油价格原则上不提或少提。
当调不调，现行成品油定价机制弊端显现。市场屡次猜测成品油调价窗口即将打开之时，却又屡次被“忽悠”。近期，不少成品油批发市场已出现“批零一价”，甚至部分地区的成品油批发价甚至涨到超过最高零售限价的水平，这表明自新成品油定价机制实施以来已基本绝迹的“批零倒挂”重现市场。从这个角度看，定价机制已经失去了理顺上下游价格体系的功能。目前运行机制的问题，主要集中在调价周期过长，容易引发投机。导致调价前，销售商囤货推价，调价后出货又导致价格下降等现象。
新机制有望明年实施。发改委负责人表示，已经组织有关方面对成品油价格机制运行情况进行了全面的总结和评价。打算充分听取各方意见，进一步改进和完善成品油机制，以期更好地灵活反映市场供求的变化，减少人为因素。最新消息称，成品油定价新方案目前已经上报至国务院待批，但受到物价调控影响，新机制或推迟至明年初试行。此方案仍是试行版，但成品油改革市场化的大方向没有改变，最大变化是缩短了调整周期以及对操作手段进行了微调。方案为再改革预留充足空间，未来改革的大方向，将是实现机制的“自动调价”，以及定价权的向企业下放，这也就意味着调价或无需上报国务院。
涨价对成品油炼制行业利好，但非市场化的机制下，对行业前景应保持必要理性。以国内最大的炼厂中石化为例，新成品油定价机制实施一年来，炼油板块扭转了政策性亏损的局面。但2009年下半年以后，国际油价大幅上升，而国内成品油价格的涨幅却小于国际原油价格涨幅，这使得中石化相应的炼油毛利同比有所下滑。之后随着2010年4月份国内成品油价格上调，从二季度炼油板块的情况看，其毛利水平有所回升，已好于一季度。也就是说，炼油毛利水平受政策影响很大，一旦国际油价进入上升通道大幅上涨，考虑到CPI等因素，政府有可能减小调价的频率和幅度，这对行业盈利水平将构成一定威胁。

description.hltext_display: Pressure Mounts Over Frozen Xmas Getaway
description.content:
Pressure is mounting on transport operators to get the Christmas getaway back on track after days of snow disruption.
Heathrow Airport's second runway reopened on Tuesday night, raising hopes for the hundreds of stranded air passengers - many who have spent several nights in the terminals.
The airport has released a list of flights that will arrive and depart today.
It plans to run around two-thirds of flights today but travellers are warned not to expect services to return to normal at once.
Eurostar says it is running a near normal service but only passengers with bookings should go to a station.
There are delays at other UK airports and travellers are advised to check with their airlines before leaving home.
Meanwhile, forecasters say a thaw is unlikely in the coming days as the cold weather continues.
Heavy snow is expected to affect the Midlands today and parts of Wales today.
Prime Minister David Cameron expressed his "frustration" at the length of the disruption at Heathrow.
Airlines have also accused airport operator BAA of failing to have enough de-icer to cope with the situation.
Wolfgang Prock-Schauer, chief executive of airline BMI, told The Times the Heathrow situation is "completely unacceptable".
He said: "BAA was not prepared. It did not have enough de-icing fluid.
"The Prime Minister has stepped in and de-icing fluid has been released from other sources."
The EU Commission also criticised Europe's air travel disruption as unacceptable and urged airports to "get serious" about better planning for bad weather.
:: Top tips for safe driving in icy conditions
BAA chief executive Colin Matthews told Sky News: "It's not just two runways we need - we need every other link in the chain to be fully up to speed and it's going to take some time to do that."
Mr Matthews also pledged to investigate why it took so long to clear snow for aircraft.
But the inquiry will have to come after the "short-term" goal of getting passengers to where they need to be has been achieved, he said.
Rail travel also remans affected by the weather.
The East Coast line, one of the country's main railway arteries, is expected to return to a "near normal" service today.
It was suspended on Tuesday after hundreds of people were evacuated from stricken trains following damage to overhead power lines at Huntingdon, near Peterborough.
There will be an hourly service between Edinburgh, Newcastle, Leeds and London.
But northbound services from London will take an extra 15 minutes due to an 80mph speed restriction between Sandy and St Neots.
On the roads the the M5 has re-opened but there are severe delays northbound from junction 4a to 7.
In Aberdeenshire the A939 and A941 are partially closed due to snow. The A55 in Conwy is closed because of an accident, while snow has shut the A470.

description.hltext_display: 住友信託と中央三井 経営統合を承認
[2011 스포츠코리아 빛낼 샛별]<1> KLPGA 슈퍼루키 장하나
description.content:
"데뷔전 우승 놓친 건 값비싼 레슨이라 생각해요" "12살이라고요? 그 나이에 난 이렇게 멀리 똑바로 치지 못했어요."
지난 2004년 처음으로 한국을 찾은 '골프황제' 타이거 우즈(미국)의 눈을 휘둥그렇게 만든 소녀가 있었다. 당시 초등학교 6학년이었던 장하나(18?삼화저축은행)가 그 주인공. 라온인비테이셔널 스킨스게임에 앞서 가진 어린이 클리닉에 초대된 장하나가 장타를 펑펑 터뜨리자 우즈는 '가르칠 게 없다'며 계속해서 열심히 하라고 격려했다.
소녀는 어느새 프로골퍼로 성장, 내년 한국여자프로골프(KLPGA) 무대를 빛낼 '대어급 신인'으로 이름을 올렸다. 장하나를 주목하는 가장 큰 이유는 어린 나이에도 슬럼프를 털고 일어났다는 점 때문이다. 초등학교 3학년 말 골프에 입문한 그는 일찌감치 천재성을 드러냈다.
초등학교 6학년 때 장타를 앞세워 제주도지사배와 송암배?한국여자주니어선수권대회를 제패하며 주니어 무대를 평정했다. 하지만 승승장구할 것 같았던 그에게 자만심이라는 불청객이 찾아왔다. "너무 일찍 매스컴을 타고 이름이 알려지면서 이상하게도 볼이 맞지 않았다"는 그는 "주위에서 (우승이라는 우승은) 다 휩쓸 거라는 말이 당장은 기분 좋게 들렸지만 결국 자만심과 부담만 키웠다는 걸 깨달았다"고 회상했다.
중학교 시절 미국 주니어 대회를 참가했지만 중3 때이던 2007년 US여자아마선수권대회 4강을 제외하면 큰 성과가 없었다. 국내 대회에 집중하기로 결심한 2008년 첫 대회인 제주도지사배와 메이저급 대회인 익성배를 석권하며 부활을 알렸고 국가대표로도 발탁됐다.
올해 희망차게 시작한 KLPGA 2부 투어에서는 드라이버 난조가 발목을 잡았다. 상금랭킹 8위에 그쳐 3위까지 주어지는 정규투어 직행 티켓을 놓쳤으나 전화위복이 됐다. "2부 투어에서 페어웨이가 좁고 까다로운 코스를 돌다 보니 드라이버 샷에 이상이 생겼다"고 분석한 그는 "넓고 평탄한 무안CC에서 시드전 2위에 오르면서 스윙을 찾았다"며 자신감을 나타냈다.
19일 끝난 KLPGA 2011 시즌 개막전 현대 차이나레이디스오픈에서는 정규투어 '데뷔전 우승'을 할 뻔했다. 김혜윤(21?비씨카드)과 2타 차 공동 4위에 오른 뒤 아쉬움보다 배운 점이 더 많았다고 한다. 1타 뒤진 최종라운드 15번홀에서 두번째 샷이 그린을 오버하는 결정적 실수로 우승 기회를 놓친 장하나는 "핀 위치를 제대로 확인하지 않고 너무 길게 쳤다. 한 샷 한 샷, 한 홀 한 홀 신중하게 쳐야 한다는 교훈을 정규투어 첫 대회에서 얻었다"고 말했다.
여느 루키처럼 장하나도 내년 신인왕이 1차 목표지만 꿈은 더 원대하다. "언젠가는 해외로 진출하겠지만 한국에서 최고라는 인정을 받을 때가 될 거예요. 기왕이면 (신)지애 언니가 세워놓은 여러 기록들을 바꿀 수 있었으면 좋겠어요."
외모와 정교한 아이언 샷이 비슷해 '제2의 신지애'라는 평가를 받는 장하나는 공격적인 스타일의 소피 구스타프손(스웨덴)과 항상 밝은 표정의 로리 케인(캐나다)을 좋아한다고 한다. 트로트곡 '당돌한 여자'를 좋아한다는 장하나의 '당돌한' 2011년이 기대된다.

description.hltext_display: King Abdullah leaves NY hospital
description.content:
Saudi King Abdullah
Saudi King Abdullah has left a New York hospital to convalesce, the royal court declared on Wednesday, one month after his departure for back surgery. The Saudi monarch left the hospital on Tuesday evening "for his New York residence for a period of convalescence and physiotherapy," the court said in a statement cited by the official SPA news agency.
Saudi television showed Abdullah together with Health Minister Abdullah al-Rabeeah, walking with difficulty and smiling at hospital staff. He flew to New York on November 22 and was operated on two days later at New York Presbyterian Hospital for a debilitating herniated disc complicated by a haematoma that put pressure on his spine, AFP reported. That operation was declared a success.

description.hltext_display: "산 좋고 물 좋더라"
description.content:
독주 체제보다는 양강구도가 발전적이다. 동지이자 경쟁자로 서로를 자극한 사례는 레오나르도 다빈치와 미켈란젤로, 고흐와 고갱의 시대에도 늘 존재해 왔다. 한국 근대 산수화에 있어서는 청전(靑田) 이상범(1897~1972)과 소정(小亭) 변관식(1899~1976)이 양대산맥을 이뤘다. 같은 시대를 살았던 둘은 오원 장승업의 화풍을 이어받은 마지막 도화서 화원 심전 안중식과 소림 조석진 두 스승을 함께 모셨다.
조선 후기 진경산수의 전통을 그대로 계승한 청전 이상범은 동아일보 미술책임 기자로 근무하던 시기에 손기정 선수 일장기 말살사건에 연루돼 옥고를 치르기도 한 인물이다. 평화로운 자연의 계절변화를 표현한 '사계산수(四季山水)'를 통해 한국적 서정성을 표현했는데 완만하고 넓게 퍼진 언덕과 강 풍경 속에 자신만의 이상향을 구축했다.
소정은 스승인 소림 조석진의 외손자로 예술가적 기질을 타고났다. 초기에는 전통화법에 서구적 일본화풍을 받아들였고 이후 실제 풍경을 '관념산수'로 재해석해 갈필(渴筆)의 묵법과 파격적인 구도를 통해 또다른 이상향을 그려냈다. 지금의 관점에서 보면 좀 더 현대적이다.
청전과 소정의 산수화 만을 모은 '요산요수'전이 인사동 공아트스페이스에서 22일 개막했다. 전시를 기획한 공창호 대표는 "같은 스승에게서 수학했으나 각기 다른 표현력을 가진 동시에 한국적 특성의 창의력을 보여주는 두 거장"이라며 "맑은 붓질을 사용한 청전의 작품이 여성적, 수평적이라면 일필휘지를 즐긴 소정의 산수는 남성적, 수직적이라고 구분할 수 있다"고 소개했다.
청전의 전통 산수화는 시원하고 고요한 풍경에서 선비적 기품을 보여주는 반면 소정은 좀더 현대적인 구도의 화면에서 굵은 필선으로 예술가적 패기를 드러낸다. 작품 안에서 자신이 꿈꾸는 풍광을 찾아가는 것은 관람객이 누리는 안복(眼福)이다.
총 42점의 출품작 가운데 청전의 작품 6점은 처음 일반에 공개되는 것이라고 한다. 내년 1월9일까지. (02)735-9938

description.hltext_display: 티켓판매 사상최대 공연계 풍성한 2010년
description.content:
지난 해 글로벌 경기 침체에 따른 시장 위축으로 어려움을 겪었던 공연 시장이 올해는 대형 콘서트 등에 힘입어 사상 최대 판매 기록을 세운 것으로 나타났다.
국내 최대 티켓예매 사이트인 인터파크INT는 올 한해 인터파크 사이트와 현장에서 판매된 공연 티켓을 통해 공연 시장을 결산한 결과 총 판매 규모가 지난해보다 29% 증가한 2,155억 원(공연 편수 7,261개)으로 집계됐다고 22일 밝혔다. 인터파크가 공연 시장을 결산하기 시작한 지난 2006년 이후 2,000억 원을 돌파한 것은 이번이 처음이다.
올해 공연 시장에서 가장 큰 폭의 상승세를 보인 장르는 콘서트로, 지난해 보다 41%나 증가한 832억 원으로 집계했다. '포크의 전설' 밥 딜런, '팝의 황제' 스티비 원더, '팝페라 여왕' 사라 브라이트만 등 해외 유명 뮤지션 스타들의 내한 공연이 지난 해 89개에서 올해 111개로 늘어난데다 콘서트에 강한 '예비역' 가수들의 활동 재개, 아이돌 가수의 콘서트 성황, 페스티벌의 안착화 등이 시장을 키웠다.
뮤지컬 시장은 945억 원으로 지난 해보다 27% 정도 증가했지만, 1,000억 원을 돌파했던 2008년보다는 다소 줄었다. 전반적인 뮤지컬 시장이 창작ㆍ초연 작품보다는 인지도가 높은 작품을 선호한 가운데 '빌리 엘리어트', '모차르트', '몬테크리스토' 등 올해 국내에 첫 선을 보인 대형 라이선스 작품 3편이 흥행에 성공해 눈길을 끌었다.
연극 시장은 매년 꾸준한 상승세를 보이고 있다. 모든 공연 장르가 조금씩 침체됐던 2009년조차 연극은 유일하게 소폭 증가했다. 장기 흥행 연극을 비롯해 '연극열전'과 '무대가 좋다' 등 연극 시리즈가 연극 시장을 쌍끌이한 것으로 분석된다. 이밖에 다른 장르에 비해 규모가 작은 무용ㆍ전통예술 분야는 티켓 판매 금액이 지난해 같은 기간에 비해 30% 증가했으며 클래식은 예년 수준과 비슷했다.
각 장르별 1위(판매액 기준)를 차지한 작품은 뮤지컬 '빌리 엘리어트', 연극 '뉴보잉보잉', 콘서트 '김장훈싸이의 완타치', 무용 '유니버설발레단의 호두까기인형' 등으로 나타났다.
올해는 경기 침체와 신종 플루 등 지난 해 악재들이 해소된 데다 10대를 비롯해 전 연령층으로 관객이 확대된 것이 시장을 키운 요인으로 분석된다. 김선경 엔터테인먼트&티켓 부문 마케팅팀 과장은 "보통 20~30대가 전체 예매자의 80% 이상을 차지했던 예년에 비해 올해는 76%로 줄어든 대신 10대와 40대의 약진에 힘입어 관객층이 전 연령대로 확대됐다"고 설명했다.
한편 인터파크INT는 ▦아이돌(아이돌 가수의 뮤지컬 캐스팅) ▦한류(일본 등 해외 관객 증가) ▦레전드의 방한(팝 역사를 대표하는 뮤지션 내한) ▦페스티벌의 페스티벌(락 콘서트, 국제공연예술제 등 활발) ▦모닝연극 등을 올해의 5대 공연 키워드로 제시했다.

description.hltext_display: Covington kids enjoy shopping
description.content:
Passed Ordinance 2010-8 — a salary ordinance for 2011. The only change to the annual ordinance is that the clerk/treasurer’s salary is now $500 higher since that $500 is no longer being added to her salary as the collector of utilities.
Learned from Weber toys collected at Dollar General were scheduled to be distributed to the children in the Head Start program on Tuesday.

description.hltext_display: Newton girls win Chuck Miller tournament
description.content: McDONOUGH — The Newton girls had to regroup at halftime to overcome a deficit to win the 2010 Chuck Miller Holiday Classic with a 60-54 win over Heritage on Tuesday.

description.hltext_display: MTV3: Veripalvelun konsulttisotkussa kolmaskin epäilty
description.content:
Veripalveluun liittyvässä rikostutkinnassa on kolmaskin epäilty, kertoo MTV3. Poliisi on aiemmin kertonut, että se epäilee Suomen Punaisen Ristin Veripalvelun entistä johtajaa Jukka Rautosta luottamusaseman väärinkäytöstä.
Rautosen on epäilty ostaneen yli kolmen miljoonan euron arvosta konsulttipalveluja ilman kilpailutusta. Hän jätti tehtävänsä marraskuussa sotkusta nousseen kohun vuoksi, mutta on kiistänyt laiminlyönnit.
Kahta muuta henkilöä epäillään avunannosta luottamusaseman väärinkäyttöön. MTV3:n mukaan toinen heistä olisi Veripalvelun käyttämä konsultti.
Poliisi on saanut Veripalvelua koskevan rikostutkintansa pääosin valmiiksi.

description.hltext_display: Анатолий Рубинов поздравил парламент с историческим выбором белорусского народа
description.content:
/ 10:33 / Общество Просмотры: 18 Обсудить
Заседание Совета Республики 22 декабря началось с поздравления председателем верхней палаты Национального собрания Анатолием Рубиновым всех присутствующих с "убедительной победой на прошедших выборах Александра Григорьевича Лукашенко".
"Уверен, что каждый из нас испытывает чувство гордости за белорусский народ, который сделал единственно правильный исторический выбор, — сказал Рубинов. — Наших людей пустыми речами не обманешь. Им есть с чем сравнивать и есть что терять. Успехи страны и возросшее качество жизни людей очевидны. Выбранный народом путь, модель развития на деле доказали свою эффективность".
По словам спикера, планы "дальнейшего строительства государства" дают "явную перспективу дальнейшего движения общества по пути прогресса и процветания". "Именно поэтому народ в своем подавляющем большинстве <…> проголосовал за Александра Григорьевича Лукашенко как реального лидера и организатора тех достижений и завоеваний, которыми по праву гордится наша страна", — заявил Рубинов.

description.hltext_display: 朝鲜意外“克制” 期指空头借机锁定利润
description.content:
您的股票和问题：
您的手机：
毫无疑问，周一A股市场出现深幅下挫的最直接导火索就是韩国决定在朝韩争议区域实施演习，引发投资人对“战争一触即发”的忧虑，权重股快速跳水，恐慌情绪在市场中蔓延。但从最新传来的信息看，朝鲜方面的态度却出人意料地“克制”，这使得“千钧一发”的南北韩局势得到缓和。期指市场上，部分空方主力在昨日急跌过程中选择获利了结，锁定了因韩国“让子弹飞”而带来的意外之财。分析人士认为，短期内，市场仍会受外围地缘政治的动向影响，但朝韩真正爆发战争的可能性较小，短期的波动后，市场将重回盘升轨道。
朝鲜：韩国挑衅不值得回应 同意核查人员返朝
针对韩国昨日延坪岛进行实弹射击训练一事，朝鲜中央通讯社当天播发新闻公报说：美国和韩国当天在半岛西部海域延坪岛进行的军事挑衅是一场“奸诈的阴谋”。它试图挑起朝鲜进行军事应对，从而将朝鲜半岛局势拖向战争边缘，以挽救美国濒临破产的亚洲政策和对朝战略。同时，这也是一场“宣传性”的挑衅，试图以此拯救韩国当局面临的统治危机，挽回当局和军方的脸面。朝鲜方面称，当天没有进行反击，还因为韩国当天举行的射击训练“偷偷地变更了射击区和弹着点”，发射的也是上次训练时的剩余炮弹，对于这样“卑劣的军事挑衅”，“不值得每次都加以对应”。公报表示，朝鲜军方此前宣布的第二、第三次对应打击今后将用于“清算美国和韩国的巢穴”。
更具转折性的是，最新消息称，经美国新墨西哥州州长比尔・理查森斡旋，朝鲜同意国际原子能机构核查人员重返朝鲜。朝鲜还同意就出售1.2万根核燃料棒并将其运往国外展开谈判，“这些核燃料棒足以制造大约6至8件核武器”。此外，朝鲜还同意考虑理查森的建议，即成立一个由美国、朝鲜和韩国三方组成的军事委员会，并在朝韩军方之间设立热线电话。
期指空头坐收渔利 借恐慌减持空单
中金所提供的数据显示，虽然市场显著下跌，恐慌情绪上升，但股指期货市场上，排名前20的空头主力周一却呈现净减仓状态，总减仓量达117手。与此形成鲜明对比的是，前20名多头主力仅减仓47手。上述信息表明，因朝韩危机而引发的市场暴跌实际上成了部分空头借机兑现利润的契机。但从期指多空双方的绝对力量上看，空头净持仓仍高达19784手，这较前20名多方的持仓15905手多出一大截。
地缘因素仍频 经济基本面才是决定因素
中投证券广州一位擅长宏观和跟踪国际市场的资深分析师认为，南北韩之间不会真正爆发战争。其理由在于，南北韩争端背后其实是大国博弈，韩国是否选择令冲突升级实际上取决于美国，但从经济上看，目前发动战争并不符合美国利益。这是因为，美国的经济在很大程度上受制于原油，一旦战争爆发，国际油价必然暴涨，这是当前美国经济所不能承受之重。而为了制衡油价对经济的影响，用于原油计价的美元势必上涨才能弥补高油价对经济的冲击，但当前的美国债务状况并不能承受美元的大幅升值。另外，美元走强不符合美联储实施量化宽松的政策本意，当然，美国更不愿意看到欧洲坐收渔翁之利。展望未来，地缘政治因素还会不时浮现，但实质性的战争利空较难看到。

description.hltext_display: Liikenteessä kuoli useita tuiskuisen marraskuun aikana
description.content: Tieliikenteessä kuoli lähes tuplasti enemmän ihmisiä marraskuussa kuin vuosi sitten. Kuolleita oli yhdeksän enemmän ja loukkaantuneita 96 enemmän kuin viime vuonna, kertoo Tilastokeskus.

description.hltext_display: Century dumps Bobcats in OT
description.content:
By Journal Staff Idaho State Journal | 0 comments
Senior Lynnsie Togiai scored 15 points, including four in overtime, as Century defeated the host Bobcats 44-40 on Tuesday evening.
Togiai stole the ball twice in the extra period, was fouled both times and converted all four free throws to provide the margin of victory for the Diamondbacks (4-6, 1-0).
Togiai’s teammate, Kylie Johnson, added 13 points, while Tayler Peck scored nine.
“Lynnsie really stepped up her game tonight,” said Century head coach Chris Schuler. “She carried us even in the overtime period. She did a great job.”
The coach also praised his team’s free throw shooting (18-23) as the biggest factor in the contest.
“I told the girls that if we pounded the ball inside, they would foul us,” Schuler said. “So, if they do, we just need to make them pay — and we did. Our foul shooting was the big difference for us in this game.”
Highland 44, Minico 32
Dakota Gonzalez led the Rams (11-0) with 12 points in a win over a scrappy Minico squad.
“We played all right,” Rams coach Tony Green said. “They stalled a little and it was a sloppy game. We felt good about getting out of there with a win. Our bench played well and got us going.”
Highland guard Mandy Smith added seven points and had a solid all-around game. Rams center Cassidy Elgan scored 10 points.
Preston 53, Pocatello 31
Preston had two players in double figures, McKenzie Wilcox (14) and Ashley Coates (12), and held Pocatello to single digits in three of the four quarters to up their season record to 9-1 (1-0 in conference).
Senior Sarah Rominger led Pocatello (3-9, 0-2) with 18 points, but no other Indians player scored over seven points.
“We were not getting off as many shots as we wanted to,” said Pocatello head coach Laraine Cook. “We need to get better looks at the basket. “We are also relying too much on one person to lead us. We need to establish a more consistent offense.”
Cook said that the defense was fairly solid, but Preston was able to grab too many offensive rebounds and put them back in for scores.
Pocatello next plays at Hillcrest today at 7:30 p.m.
Malad 65, Aberdeen 30
The Dragons raced off to a 20-4 lead in the first quarter and never looked back against the Tigers.
“We came out of the gate shooting well and took that momentum,” Malad coach Bob Sorensen said. “And our 21-point third quarter secured things.”
Malad junior point guard Hope Murray had 10 points, but her assists keyed the attack. “Her points don’t show it, but she made the difference in finding the open girls,” Sorensen said. “She was spreading the ball around.”
Jessica Sorensen led Malad with 19 points. Laci Lavaka had 14 points for the Dragons (6-0, 1-0). Aberdeen fell to 0-1 in 2A Fifth District play.
Malad hosts Bear Lake today at 5 p.m.
BOYS
Soda Springs 52, Grace 35
Led by Tanner Young (15 points), Kaden Smith (11) and Seth Stoor (10), Soda Springs went into Grace and came away with a big win over the Grizzlies.
The win gives the Cardinals a 5-1 record, while Grace falls to 4-3.
“We were down only by five at the half, but came out real sluggish in the third quarter,” said Grace head coach Rory Lloyd. “Our shooting percentage was horrible and we also struggled from the line. Basically, this was not a good game.”
Grace next travels to North Gem today to play Cowboys at 7:30 p.m.
Rockland 83, Magic Valley 18
Rockland’s bench got a workout on Tuesday evening as the Bulldogs took a bite out of Magic Valley.
Reserve players Tanner Kirby and Tyler O’Brien combined to score 29 points for Rockland (4-1, 1-0), while starter Colton Christensen added 11.
The Bulldogs jumped out in front of Magic Valley (1-4) 27-4 in the first quarter and led at intermission 47-8. Head coach Dan Ralphs took his starters out in the middle of the second quarter and there was a running clock in the fourth.
“It’s very hard to keep the players focused in a game like this,” he said. “It’s hard not to get sloppy. At least our bench players had some quality minutes, though.”
Font Size: - +
Posted in Local on Tuesday, December 21, 2010 11:48 pm.

description.hltext_display: NBA game results, Dec. 21
description.author: Danny Moloshok / AP
description.content:
The Milwaukee Bucks' 5-foot-5 Earl Boykins reacts after making a three-pointer against the during the second half in Los Angeles.
Earl Boykins scored a season-high 22 points, John Salmons added 20 and the short-handed Milwaukee Bucks stunned the on their home court Tuesday night, snapping the two-time defending champions' five-game winning streak with a 98-79 victory.
Kobe Bryant scored 21 points and Pau Gasol added 15 points and 11 rebounds for the Lakers, who belly-flopped in their final tuneup before a Christmas visit from the Miami Heat.
Ersan Ilyasova had 17 points and 11 rebounds for the Bucks, who had lost three straight and were down to nine healthy players against the Lakers, who had beaten them six straight times.
Yet with sturdy defense that held the Lakers to their franchise-low in points against the Bucks, Milwaukee jumped ahead early and finished the game on a 21-7 run, holding the Lakers scoreless for nearly four minutes down the stretch.
Bryant was ejected with 2:07 to play, earning two quick technical fouls after being called for an offensive foul.
"I told them I don't think they can play any worse than that," Lakers coach Phil Jackson said. "This is what we were worried about. We got out of whack there in the second half and never recovered."
Perhaps thinking ahead to their holiday visit from LeBron James and Dwyane Wade, the Lakers were largely lifeless in their return from an impressive seven-game road trip, losing at Staples Center for just the third time in 13 games.
Andrew Bogut scored 15 points for the Bucks, who largely controlled the game despite missing injured regulars Brandon Jennings, Corey Maggette and Drew Gooden on the second stop of a three-game road trip.
Perhaps the most improbable contributions were from the 5-foot-5 Boykins, who hit four three-pointers - including a rub-it-in basket with 2 1/2 minutes left - as an unlikely substitute for Jennings, the Bucks' leading scorer.
Lakers center Andrew Bynum played 18 minutes in his first home appearance since Game 7 of last season's NBA finals. The center was slow to recover from offseason surgery on his troublesome right knee.
Derrick Rose collected his seventh double-double with 22 points and 12 assists. Luol Deng also had 22 points, and four other Bulls hit double figures as host Chicago led by as many as 51 points late in the game.
Caron Butler scored 20 points, Dirk Nowitzki had 17 and visiting Dallas became the latest team to topple reconstructed Orlando, which has lost its first two games since making two trades Saturday.
Kevin Durant scored 32 points and visiting Oklahoma City overcame a poor shooting night by dominating the fourth quarter to beat Charlotte.
In Memphis, Brook Lopez scored 26 points, and New Jersey ended a 10-game road skid.
This article appeared on page B - 3 of the

description.hltext_display: Många mjölkbönder julpyntar ladugården
description.author: peter@ja.se
description.content:
Den populäraste juldekorationen är adventsljusstaken följt av en julstjärna eller en krans på dörren. Vissa mjölkbönder hänger till och med upp julgardiner och vissa ställer in en julgran eller en julbock hos sina kor, det skriver Svensk Mjölk i ett meddelande. Även under övriga delar av året har många mjölkbönder andra metoder för att korna ska må bra. 8 av 10 uppger att de klappar eller kliar korna för att de ska må extra bra. 7 av 10 menar att de också pratar med sina kor. För att öka kornas välbefinnande kan det också handla om musik i ladugården, att ge dem extra gott foder, tvätta dem extra mycket och ge dem frukt eller grönsaker. Jordbruksaktuellt
Tel: 019-16 61 30
E-post: redaktionen@jordbruksaktuellt.se

description.hltext_display: Produktinformation - Zellspannungsüberwachung
description.content: Beide Forschungsfelder stellen dabei ähnlich hohe Anforderungen an die Messtechnik. Durch Reihenschaltungen von z.T. mehreren hundert Brennstoffzellen oder Batteriezellen zu größeren Stacks sollen die benötigten hohen Betriebsspannungen erreicht werden. Je nach Anwendung liegen diese Spannungen in Bereichen bis zu 1000 V, was besondere Herausforderungen an die Isolationsfestigkeit der Messgeräte stellt. Die Überwachung aller Einzelzellen auf Unterspannung ist besonders im Entwicklungsstadium von Brennstoffzellen unbedingt notwendig. Eine Unterspannung ist ein Indiz für Materialermüdung oder unzureichende Medienversorgung mit Wasserstoff bzw. Sauerstoff. Im Defektfall droht dadurch ein Kurzschluss der Zelle. Dies stellt beispielsweise im maritimen Bereich, in dem die Brennstoffzelle mit reinem Sauerstoff betrieben wird, eine ernstzunehmende Explosionsgefahr dar. Eine Spannungsüberwachung der einzelnen Zellen ermöglicht proaktive Regeleingriffe um Schäden an Mensch und Maschine zu vermeiden. Im Akkumulatorbereich stellen sowohl Unterspannung als auch Überspannung wichtige Betriebspunkte dar. Im Fall einer Unterspannung droht ein Spannungsverlust des Gesamtsystems und im Fall einer Überspannung muss der Ladevorgang beendet werden, um die Überhitzung des Akkumulators zu vermeiden. Um den Entwicklungsingenieuren die notwendige Messtechnik an die Hand zu geben, bietet PEWATRON ein Cell Voltage Measurement System („CVM“) der SMART Electronic Development GmbH an. Die Firma SMART Electronic Development GmbH entwickelt seit über 14 Jahren Messtechnik für diesen Bereich. Das Cell Voltage Measurement System ist mittlerweile in der 3. Generation am Markt und bietet eine Einzelzellerfassung in Echtzeit mit bis zu 90 Kanälen pro Gerät. Die Datenübertragung erfolgt hierbei via CAN auf 2 getrennten Bussen. Zusätzlich können alle Messkanäle gegen zwei Grenzwerte in Echtzeit überwacht werden. Dadurch erhalten das Fahrzeugsteuergerät oder der Prüfstandsrechner zu jedem Zeitpunkt präzise Informationen über den Zustand der Zellen und können regelnd oder steuernd eingreifen und so kritische Systemzustände erkennen bzw. verhindern. Eines der führenden Forschungsinstitute im Bereich Brennstoffzellen und Batterieentwicklung bzw. -forschung ist das Zentrum für Sonnenenergie- und Wasserstoff-Forschung Baden-Württemberg (ZSW) in Ulm. Seit Jahren wird hier das Mess-System CVMpro90-R3 und neuerdings das neue MCM-System eingesetzt, um Brennstoffzellenund Batterietests, Zelloptimierung und -validierungen durchzuführen. Bei der Bayer MaterialScience AG in Brunsbüttel sind seit Jahren CVMpro60-R3 Geräte im Einsatz, welche die Spannungsverläufe von Salzsäureelektrolyseuren im großindustriellen Prozess überwachen. Hierfür wurde zusätzlich eine kundenspezifi sche Leitstandssoftware entwickelt, die Datenauswertung und Logging ermöglicht. Im mobilen Sektor wurden in den letzten Jahren zahlreiche Systeme an deutsche Fahrzeughersteller ausgeliefert und kommen erfolgreich in Versuchsfahrzeugen wie NEBUS und NECAR der Daimler AG u.a. zum Einsatz. Besonders die geringe Baugröße, hohe Resistenz gegenüber EMV-Einstrahlung und Potentialsprüngen sowie die Automotivetauglichkeit stehen hier im Vordergrund.

description.hltext_display: Commissioners delay wind ordinance
description.content:
COVINGTON, Ind. — Fountain County Commissioners tabled action Monday on a wind ordinance on the advice of County Attorney Tom O’Connor.
O’Connor read a concern from Greg Leuchtmann, business development manager, regarding the noise limits of the wind ordinance. He stated Tippecanoe County’s ordinance had similar language and that county is in process of modifying it.
Leuchtmann asked the ordinance be put on hold until a study is completed.
In other business, commissioners:
Learned from Virginia Scherer, ambulance services director, that the cost for the paramedic training will be about $31,500 at Hendricks Memorial Hospital in Danville, Ind. Scherer wondered whether the county should have a contract with each employee who goes to the training. She also questioned the amount of pay, mileage and meals while in training.
O’Connor will look into a contract. It was suggested a committee be formed. Terry Ellingwood will represent the commissioners. They would like for an ambulance employee and a councilman to be on the committee.
Heard from Amanda Smith, extension educator, that she still is working on wireless broadband access. She learned a fiber optic cable project will go through the county.
Gave the West Central Community Corrections permission to apply for a $776,000 grant.
WHAT'S NEXT
The Fountain County Commissioners moved the Jan. 3 meeting to 8:30 a.m. EST Jan. 4 at the courthouse. The courthouse will close Jan. 3 for the New Year’s Day holiday.

event_or_fact.property: Tippecanoe County?s ordinance had similar language and that county is in process of modifying it

description.hltext_display: 新合约IF1102升水最高近100点 套利机会不多
description.content:
您的股票和问题：
您的手机：
昨日股指期货市场早盘大幅高开，并在突破上周的最高点后高位横盘近一小时，同期各大指数高开幅度却远不如期指各合约，导致早盘出现近一个月以来最大的期现基差空间和最好的套利机会，但随后行情的突变使得套利空间迅速消失，午后基差也未见扩大。
具体来看，股市开盘时主力合约IF1101基差超过40点，各合约均存在8%左右的套利年化收益，开盘后各指数的涨幅跟不上期指各合约，基差进一步扩大，IF1101基差一度逼近60点，并于10点21分夺得当日期现套利年化收益率峰值11.21%。10点30分过后，受朝韩紧张局势传闻的影响，大盘和期指一齐向下大幅崩跌，各板块呈现普跌的态势，盘中各大指数将上周一的阳线实体全部跌穿，期指跌幅大于指数，基差迅速收敛，主力合约IF1101落入无套利区间之内；午后IF1101频繁进出无套利区间。
昨日新挂牌合约IF1102走势较强，基差早盘曾接近100个点，全日都存在4%以上的期现套利年化收益，两个远月合约IF1103和IF1106的套利年化收益相对更高，分别在6%和8%附近盘整，显示期指市场即使在昨日盘中大跌时仍然对中长期走势持乐观的态度。
同时，昨日各期指合约间跨期套利机会不多。IF1102与IF1101的价差在30到40点之间震荡，没有出现明显的开仓信号。IF1106与IF1101的价差冲高至150点以上，持有卖IF1101及买IF1106的仓位的投资人可以考虑在价差150点以上时平仓获利出局，30到50点的价差收益对于跨期套利来讲属于较高的收益，激进的跨期套利者可选择继续持有。

description.hltext_display: 《乾坤在线》带你品读上古之战
description.author: zolgame
description.content:
自盘古开天辟地创造了新世界，女娲创造了生命，海内世界渐渐展现出生机勃勃，这是一个神兽与其他种群一起和谐共存的乐土。随着各大族群的不断繁衍生息，由于各自习性、信仰和价值观的不同，战争频发。在一段混乱不堪、战火纷飞的漫长混战期之后，无数势力随之成长或消亡。经过无数小规模争斗之后，各种族强弱渐渐分出。而各大强势种族已经不满足统治一隅，统一王者呼之欲出，大陆已经到了建立新轶序的时刻。
大陆最大二个种族的王者轩辕族的黄帝和神农氏的炎帝进行了决定华夏走向的涿鹿之战。最终，黄帝一举战胜了炎帝，获得了建立统一大陆的机会。
黄帝一战威名远扬，其他种族不敢反抗，纷纷依俯。一些不愿听命于黄帝统治的种族，也在轩辕族无数次清缴中被打得支离破碎，退出了中原。黄帝渐渐统一了大陆，并与东海氐人结为同盟关系，建立了轩辕天朝阵营，是为大陆正统，这便是《乾坤在线》轩辕天朝的由来。
而失败的一方，炎帝的神农氏族被黄帝的轩辕氏族吞并。九黎氏族原先是炎帝神农氏族的一支，后从神农氏族中分裂出来迁徙到南方居住。在蚩尤的率领下九黎人卷土重来前往北方与轩辕氏决战，战败灭亡。刑天原是九黎人，悲愤之下与皇帝决斗，被黄帝施计断首。但强烈的怨念支撑下他没有死去，而是成为了第一个“鬼族”。他用招魂帆把死去九黎人的怨魂招回，使灵魂与死去的躯体重新结合以半人半鬼的形式重生。整个九黎族渐渐的被转化成了鬼族。鬼族初具规模时就受到了轩辕氏数次清缴，非常狼狈的逃亡到了曾经是九黎氏族活跃的中原之南。他们不停的招魂，不停的复活亡者，目的就是为了积聚力量向轩辕氏复仇。不论世人如何清缴，鬼族仍然顽强的存在着，他们在南方建立了自己的城市——九黎鬼都，同时拉拢被轩辕天朝击败的各方势力，最终建立了《乾坤在线》的九黎战国。慢慢发展之中，变成了一个可以和轩辕帝国相抗衡的势力，在黑暗中等待向轩辕天朝复仇的契机。
你是想在轩辕皇城踏晚风朝露，还是想在九黎鬼都下诅咒巫毒，而今，乾坤的号角已然响起，上古的神话将在你的脚下延续……

description.hltext_display: Immer weniger Gewaltverbrechen in Berlin

description.hltext_display: China replaces top Foreign Ministry official
description.content:
China has replaced a top diplomat amid a trend toward greater assertiveness in handling territorial disputes and participating in global organizations.
Vice Foreign Minister Zhang Zhijun took over recently as the ministry's Communist Party secretary, state media reports said Wednesday, likely putting him in line to eventually take over from Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi. Yang was accused of being caught off guard when U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton announced at a security conference in Vietnam this year that Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
Zhang, 57, had served almost his entire career in the party's International Liaison Department, a type of shadow Foreign Ministry focusing on contacts with foreign political parties, until he became deputy to Yang last year.
That party background may mean he has more of a say in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world. The country's rising economic clout amid the global economic downturn that has battered traditional powers such as the United States has emboldened Chinese leaders to demand a bigger say in global affairs such as climate change and at international organizations, including the United Nations.
China's aggressive assertion of its territorial claims in the South China and East China seas have, meanwhile, sparked a backlash from other countries in the region, drawing them closer to Washington.
The powerful People's Liberation Army is believed to be leading the calls for a tougher line in such disputes, while other Cabinet officials have emphasized quietly advancing China's interests in economic, media and cultural spheres.
China's most senior diplomat, State Counselor Dai Bingguo, is seen as balancing the different arguments, although the country's opaque political system ensures that such debates almost never make it into the public arena.
Little is known about Zhang's personal style, although his party background and relative lack of experience working abroad suggest he will closely reflect the tone set by the party leadership.
Zhang's appointment was announced on official websites, including that of the party's People's Daily newspaper, but no exact date was given.
He takes over from Wang Guangya, a courtly career diplomat who was ambassador to the U.N. from 2003-2008, during which China took advantage of the U.S. preoccupation with Iraq to quietly expand its diplomatic space.

event_or_fact.property: Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world

description.hltext_display: Die erste AMD APU Fusion Familie erhält Channel-Support
description.content:
“AMD eröffnet damit eine neue Ära der Embedded Computertechnologie und unsere Industriepartner sind bereit, Wettbewerbsvorteile aus dieser erstmals verfügbaren AMD Fusion APU zu generieren,” sagte Chris Cloran, Corporate Vice President und General Manager der Computing Solutions Group, Client Division, bei AMD. “Durch das Zusammenführen der Rechenkapazität von CPU und GPU auf einem einzigen energieeffizienten APU Chip, können die Kunden unserer Partner von einem besseren Preis-Leistungsverhältnis, einer hervorragenden 1080p HD Wiedergabe sowie von kleinen Formfaktoren profitieren und so innovative Designs umsetzen.”
Partner Für den Vertrieb über Retail Kanäle und Systemhersteller sind von führenden Original Design Manufacturers (ODMs) wie ASUS, GIGABYTE, MSI und SAPPHIRE zahlreiche Motherboard Designs mit AMD E-Series APUs geplant. Zudem werden in Q1 2011 auch Motherboard-Designs für Embedded Systeme auf Basis der AMD Embedded G-Series Plattform verfügbar. Sie werden in den kommenden Generationen von Embedded Computing Appliances eingesetzt, wie man sie beispielsweise in den Märkten Digital Signage, Medical Imaging, Casino-Spielautomaten oder Point-of-Sales und Kioske findet.
EMEAs Embedded Computing Hersteller wie CompuLab, congatec, Fujitsu. Kontron oder Quixant sind gerüstet
“CompuLab hat die AMD Embedded G-Series Plattform als Basis für seine nächste Generation von fit-PC3 ausgewählt.” sagt Irad Stavi, Director Business Development bei CompuLab. “Die AMD G-Series APU kombiniert erstmals eine x86er dualcore CPU, herausragende Grafikperformance und geringen Energieverbrauch auf einem einzigen Die. In Kombination mit der Zuverlässigkeit und Vielseitigkeit von CompuLabs fit-PC3 Designs, die sich zudem durch ein besonders kleines, lüfterloses Gehäuse auszeichnen, ergibt das eine neue Generation an Embedded Computing Plattformen, die für Integratoren in vielen Embedded Marksegmenten attraktiv ist.”
„Wir versprechen uns von der AMD Fusion Technology auf unseren Computer-On-Modules einen großen Markterfolg über alle Bereiche der Embedded Computer-Technologie hinweg“, erklärt Gerhard Edi, CEO der congatec AG. „Unsere Kunden erhalten mit einer einzigen Plattform eine enorm breite Auswahl potenzieller Performancebestückungen. Das macht die passgenaue Auslegung des Systems auf die Anforderungen der kundenspezifischen Applikation besonders leicht."
“Das umfassende Featureset und die herausragende Grafikleistung kombiniert mit einem sehr geringen Strombedarf und einer Embedded Langzeitverfügbarkeit machen die EMD Embedded G-Series Plattform zur idealen Wahl für viele Applikationen. Darum entschied sich Fujitsu, zahlreiche industrielle Mini-ITX Mainboards und Thin Clients mit dieser innovativen Plattform umzusetzen“, sagte Peter Hoser, Director OEM Sales bei Fiitsu Technology Solutions.
„Die AMD G-Series Plattform ist ideal für Embedded Applikationen, die echte Highend Grafik benötigen,“ erklärt Norbert Hauser, Vice President der Kontron AG. „Wir sehen neben den Märkten Kiosk und Professional Gaming auch Applikationen in Bereichen wie Radar, Sonar und der Bilderkennung in unterschiedlichen vertikalen Märkten. Hier kann die integrierte GPU deutliche Kostenvorteile bringen gegenüber Plattformen vergleichbarer Performance mit mehreren Prozessorcores. Zudem ist der Formfaktor ideal für SFF-Designs. Aus diesen Grund werden wir unser Produktportfolio mit passenden AMD Embedded G-Series Plattformen sowohl im Motherboard- und SBC-Bereich (Mini-ITX und Pico-ITX) als auch bei Computer-on-Modules (COM Express) abrunden.“
“Quixant ist ein führender Hersteller von Computersystemen für den globalen Slotmaschinen-Markt. Daher ist es für uns absolut notwendig, stets Produkte mit der besten am Markt verfügbaren Technologie anzubieten“, erläutert Nick Jarmany, Managing Director der Quixant Ltd. “Die AMD E-Series APUs repräsentieren dabei einen bedeutenden Schritt nach vorne in den entscheidenden Bereichen Grafikperformance, Videoqualität und geringem Energieverbrauch. Dies alles wird zudem mit einem Embedded Programm für Langzeitverfügbarkeit geliefert. Unsere neuen, speziell für die Gaming-Industrie zugeschnittenen Produkte werden alle diese Vorteile umsetzen, die die AMD E-Series APUs zu bieten haben und es Quixant ermöglichen, den entscheidenden Wettbewerbsvorsprung zu halten.”
Weitere unterstützende Ressourcen:
Statements aus dem kommerziellen Markt von ASUS, GIGABYTE, MSI und SAPPHIRE finden Sie hier:
http://blogs.amd.com/press/2010/12/15/channel-support-geared-up-for-first-amd-fusion-family-of-apus/ AMD’s Fusion Blog AMD’s Work/Embedded Blog AMD Fusion Partner Program Homepage AMD Fusion Demos auf dem AMD Unprocessed YouTube Channel

description.hltext_display: Rossville board returns property to former owner
description.content:
ROSSVILLE — On the recommendation of the finance committee, Ross-ville village board members approved returning ownership of a lot in Masengale subdivision back to the Masengale family.
A plan to build on the lot by an individual fell through when financing was not obtained. The village board decided it would quit claim deed the property back to the Masengale family rather than take ownership of the lot.
In other board action, trustees:
Welcomed Police Chief Bill Shannon back to active duty following his recovery from a stroke earlier in the year. Shannon returned to work Dec. 6.
Approved annual safety awards of $100 for full-time employees and $50 for part-time employees.
A move to make it illegal to park on sidewalks in the village died for lack of a motion. An ordinance to fine persons $150 for illegally parking on sidewalks had been proposed.
Learned the new Dollar General store at the south edge of the village is scheduled to open Jan. 10.
Learned the Summit Street water main project is scheduled to be put out for bid in January with bid opening in February.
Learned the water/sewer committee is studying moving the fire hydrant located on the northeast corner of Attica and Chicago streets. The committee would like to see the fire hydrant moved east closer to the alley running adjacent to the municipal building.
Approved a request by Dick Queen to allow the Rossville Community Organization to use the village manlift to take down Christmas decorations in the park. The approval was granted providing the RCO files a copy of insurance with the village.
NEXT UP
The Rossville Village Board will meet at 7 p.m. Jan. 17 in the municipal building.

由分线分析，昨平高盘开出，拉回封闭平盘得撑即以缓步方式上攻，早盘仍压制于周一尾盘反弹高3232.00点的反压下进入高档振荡整理，早盘收盘前的最后一根棒线11.30AM突往上攻击过早盘高，且带动Kd指标上轧空线，午盘平稳开出后，在13.20PM指标正式进入指标轧空行情，而其两倍幅目标3300.20点在当日收盘前满足抵达。稳健上攻未遭空方太大的反抗，轻易过周一午盘反弹高点3232.00及10.45AM追杀发动棒线高点3272.40点，周二虽未能一举收复周一长阴子母贯穿棒线高3309.20点，但己有兵临城下的态势，在周三要收复周一高3309.20绝对非难事。周三高档反压看周一高3309.20点及12/15日高3330.00点，而低档支撑则看昨14.05PM的回抽低顿3270.40点，及昨11.30AM上攻杀动低点3227.40点。
在日线型态上，昨虽以阳母子收敛型态收出，但轻易收复周一失守的短均线，更完全收复周一的大幅下杀跌幅，形成价稳持仓量增走势，今周三应可借力使力一举攻克上周三反弹高3330.00点，展开另一轮的攻势。型态上现处底部逐步垫高的盘坚走势，而均线结构上为短均缓步走扬的助攻架构，指标亦处稳健的偏多格局。整体趋势正处蓄势侍发的偏多整理行情，短期内一旦攻克上周三反弹高3330.00点，将有机会出现由盘坚转轧空的急攻行情。
基差变化方面，IF1101基差，处于24.20-53.89点,收在53.89点，基差因期指买气递增下而出现大幅扩散，周三又将提供无风险套利者另一轮“卖出无风险套利” 的交易机会。周二内外盘差比在收盘时为1.0189主动买盘大于主动卖盘，（前一交易日为0.9686）盘中买?甚为强劲，但笔均由周一的7.87手缩小为7.36手，大户追势多单似乎略为谨慎。

description.hltext_display: MTV3: Veripalvelun konsulttisotkussa kolmaskin epäilty
description.content: Veripalveluun liittyvässä rikostutkinnassa on kolmaskin epäilty, kertoo MTV3. Poliisi on aiemmin kertonut, että se epäilee Suomen Punaisen Ristin Veripalvelun entistä johtajaa Jukka Rautosta luottamusaseman väärinkäytöstä. Rautosen on epäilty ostaneen yli kolmen miljoonan euron arvosta konsulttipalveluja ilman kilpailutusta. Hän jätti tehtävänsä marraskuussa sotkusta nousseen kohun vuoksi, mutta on kiistänyt laiminlyönnit. Kahta muuta henkilöä epäillään avunannosta luottamusaseman väärinkäyttöön. MTV3:n mukaan toinen heistä olisi Veripalvelun käyttämä konsultti. Poliisi on saanut Veripalvelua koskevan rikostutkintansa pääosin valmiiksi.

description.hltext_display: Altın fiyatlarında korkutan tablo
description.content:
Yılbaşından bu yana yüzde 28 artan altın fiyatlarının 2011 yılında da yükselişini sürdürmesi bekleniyor.
UYARI: Küfür, hakaret, rencide edici cümleler veya imalar, inançlara saldırı içeren, imla kuralları ile yazılmamış, Türkçe karakter kullanılmayan ve tamamı büyük harflerle yazılmış yorumlar onaylanmamaktadır. Ayrıca suç teşkil edecek hakaret içerikli yorumlar hakkında muhatapları tarafından dava açılabilmektedir.

description.hltext_display: Fire guts River Barge Freight Co.
description.content:
DANVILLE — A business owner is optimistic about his future after a Monday night fire ripped through his downtown Danville store.
Flames gutted part of the River Barge Freight Co., 208 W. Main St., late Monday and into Tuesday morning. Firefighters worked for almost three hours to bring the fire under control and investigators were on the scene looking over the building as of mid-morning Tuesday.
Owner Laury Graves walked though his business Tuesday afternoon, describing everything in the first floor showroom as “soot-covered” and wet.
“The building is a total loss,” Graves said, adding reopening River Barge Freight Co. will depend upon finding a new location and fresh inventory. “There’s a lot of stuff that may be able to be saved and sold.”
Graves was unsure how much insurance he had on the business.
Danville Assistant Fire Chief Tom Pruitt said a passerby saw smoke and called in the fire around 9 p.m. Personnel first arriving on the scene reported thick, heavy smoke coming from throughout the building.
Pruitt said crews initially tried to enter the building and did gain entry to the first floor, but with extensive smoke limiting visibility, the firefighters were ordered out of the building. Crews then worked defensively to extinguish the extensive flames on the second floor and rear of the building.
A cause for the fire, as well as where in the building the flames originated, remains under investigation. The business was run primarily from the first floor of the structure while the second floor was used for mainly storage.
Graves said Tuesday afternoon be believed the fire started on the second floor because of the heavy damage present. He had not been informed of a potential cause for the blaze.
Pruitt said even after the fire was brought under control, crews continued to battle hot spots showing up again and again until 5 a.m. Because of the building instability caused by the fire, heavy machinery was brought in to tear down a portion of the rear of the structure. That allowed firefighters to better find and extinguish the hot spots.
West Main Street, which was shut down between Walnut and Gilbert streets as a result of the fire, was reopened by police by late Tuesday morning.

description.hltext_display: 崔永元抨击荧屏弊病 收视率应由独立第三方提供
description.author: sohu.com
description.content:
前日（12月20日）下午，央视名嘴崔永元做客SMG电视新闻中心嘉宾论坛，他讲述的话题是《今天，我们还能怎样做电视》，其中，他对目前我国荧屏收视率的弊病进行了严厉抨击，对我国缺乏“口述历史”的紧迫性进行大声疾呼。
崔永元说，今天还能怎么做电视？他说自己刚进电视台录制现场就看到了一个收视率高的节目获奖榜，而在电视台，收视率低的人连饭碗也保不住。他认为，我们并不是不要收视率，而是需要有科学、准确的收视率。按照国际惯例，收视率应该由独立的第三方来提供，没有任何亲缘关系，这样数据才能客观公正。而目前我国提供收视率的仅央视索福瑞一家。

description.hltext_display: Mitchell wins backstroke at UGA event
description.content: An Eastside freshman continues to swim like a veteran. Jack Mitchell won the 100 backstroke and finished third in the 100 freestyle, helping Eastside’s boys team finish fifth last weekend at the University of Georgia.

description.hltext_display: Christmas makes this sappy runner take a happy look back
description.author: VICKI HUBER RUDAWSKY
description.content:
I absolutely love Christmas time. I am one of those sentimental saps who cry at the Hallmark TV movies and some of the cartoon Christmas shows that I've watched since I was little. Christmas is the time of year, even more than Thanksgiving, when I am reminded of all that I have in my life that I am so thankful for.
I cannot even imagine my life without running and all who have helped me. All that I have and have become are rooted in those first steps. It all started with the knowledge that I was just a bit faster than the other kids in the neighborhood as we played kick the can.
My parents were supportive, but not pushy, and let my running be mine. My brother was my idol, and the main reason I went out for track. He now claims he is my No. 1 fan. My sister still talks to me, even though I am sure she spent most of her life walking in a pretty big shadow.
I had four of the best coaches anyone could imagine. All different philosophies and personalities, but each taught me more than I can ever repay. I am thankful for the fact that I attended one of the best universities in the country on a full scholarship, and now am forever a part of Villanova's amazing track history.
I am even thankful for my time spent injured. Being injured is one of the hardest challenges in an athlete's life, but it can also be a time when an athlete grows the most. I learned patience, self control, and just how tough I am. My injuries also brought me to my husband, so how can I not be thankful for that?
I met my best friend as I was running striders and doing plyometrics in front of her house. She thought I was nuts.
I have a second family out in Oregon who made my Olympic dream in 1996 a serious possibility. I have run with world and Olympic champions and now run with other moms, and honestly cannot say who has impressed me more.
I also have a family who understand how much running means to me, and now a daughter with whom I can share some of this.
Yes, I know I am a sap. However, during this time of the year when we gather to celebrate the holidays, we need to spend some time remembering exactly what we have to be thankful for. I will always be a runner. And even when I may be reduced to jogging once a week, I will always know that running has provided me with more blessings than I ever could imagine.
Former Olympic runner Vicki Huber Rudawsky's column appears biweekly in The News Journal. Contact her at sports@ delawareonline.com.

description.hltext_display: Funding A Call for VISA
description.author: Daniel Ho
description.content:
Investors are now becoming familiar with the story of Master Card (NYSE: MA ) and Visa (NYSE: V ) being pummeled by the Fed's proposal to cut interchange rate drastically for debit cards. To recap, Federal Reserve on December 16 announced the proposal to place a cap on the interchange fees banks allowed to charge merchants to 12 cents per transaction, a limit that could cut up to 90% of the current revenue of such transactions. In addition, the proposal would require merchants having the choice of unrelated networks to process transactions, i.e. networks besides VISA and MasterCard.
Banks were the primary losers in this case, but the payment network giants, VISA and MasterCard, also fell into casualties. Prior to the announcement date, they already started to drop: VISA dropped ~5%, and MasterCard dropped ~2%. On the announcement date, VISA dropped additional ~15% while MasterCard dropped ~10%. Fearing the gun is going to turn to credit card processing as well, American Express (NYSE: AXP ) also dropped ~10% since the announcement.
While the cap on interchange rate, and allowing merchants to have the choice of payment processing network can certainly hurt VISA and MasterCard, we think the market has reacted a little too much. After the drop, we have become bullish on VISA considering that: This is still a proposal. The final outcome could be different. VISA has strong growth in international markets, particularly in emerging markets. Payment options are increasingly moving towards electronic processing, including social security and other federal benefits. VISA has a strong balance sheet. The large drop in price has provided downside support. It will take time for other payment networks to catch up to challenge VISA and MasterCard, and these giants will not sit idle waiting to be slaughtered. Stock prices of MasterCard and VISA have stabilized after their drops, with VISA trading at ~$68/share now. For people who believe that VISA now offers limited downside and potential upside, there are many ways to trade the stock. A few of them are: Buy the stock, waiting for the stock to go up. Buy call options on the stock to lower capital cost and capture more upside if the stock rebounds. Write put options and buys the stock only if it drops further. In essence, committed to buying the stock at a lower price, or just collecting the premium if the stock trades up. In our case, we choose a mix of (2) and (3) to go long the stock. In choosing the time frame for the options, we don't think VISA will have any sudden pop unless the Feds suddenly reverse their proposal. A more likely scenario, we believe, is that as final outcome becomes clearer, the market will digest the news and realizes that VISA still offers substantial value, or the proposal gets shaped into a less drastic change. Therefore, we want to choose a longer time frame for the options. We also do not want to buy too out-of-money, but something around the trading range before the huge drop, so just a trade back to the price level before the large drop would be sufficient for us. To achieve this, we bought a Jan 2012 75 call option for $5.85.
$5.85 for a $75 call is not a light premium, and it implies a break-even point at $80.85. At the same time, we feel that VISA has limited downside if it drops below $60, and we are willing to hold the stock for long term investment at that price. Therefore, we wrote a Jan 2012 55 put for $3.57. With this long call and short put strategy, we will now: break even at $77.28. lose up to $2.28 if VISA trades between $55 and $77.28 committed to buying the stock if it drops below $55/share, and assumes the cost of $57.28/share. committed to any margin requirement necessary to maintain the trade. While this strategy may seem complicated, it boils down to funding a call option with a put option, and committing to buying the stock if it drops below a certain price. The trade may or may not pan out, but it illustrates a way to go long on a stock other than just buying the stock outright.
* Another fallout from this proposal is that retailers should get a boost from this. In the case they don't pass along the reduction in bank fees to them, their margin just went up without doing a thing. Of course, if they start lowering their prices for consumer, the Feds can yell 'Deflation!', and just gets another pass to print more money (uh, I mean, purchasing treasury securities) .
Daniel Ho is the founder of 10xreturn.com , a financial portal providing financial information and market statistics for investment professionals.

description.hltext_display: Another steps up for board
description.content:
DANVILLE — You can’t always believe what you read.
John Spezia became the last candidate to file for the April 5 Danville Area Community College Board of Trustees election Monday, despite a story Tuesday in the Commercial-News saying no new candidates had filed.
Miscommunication between the newspaper and the college led to the error.
Spezia, who joins four other candidates running for three seats, said he’s running because his experience as an educator — including 18 years as DACC’s athletic director until his retirement in 2006 —would give the board a “fresh” perspective.
“More board people ought to see what’s going on in the trenches,” he said. “I’ve been on the inside. I’ve dealt with everything from financial aid to custodians to the media.”
Spezia said he has served “seven different presidents” and has been part of the community college system for more than 30 years. He’s also taught high school and served on several public boards and committees, including the National Junior Community College Association.
Other candidates in the race include incumbent Vice President David Harby and Richard Cheney, and new candidates Keith Souza and Vincent Koers. Those four all filed on the first eligible day and will have a lottery Thursday to determine whose name appears on the ballot first.
Spezia said he became interested in running for the six-year term after DACC moved to eliminate the soccer program during the summer. He was one of several speakers, including fellow candidate Koers, who led a charge that eventually saved the program.
“That probably sparked it,” he said.
He said he has no specific complaints about the management of DACC and said he’s running because “change is always good.”
“My bottom line is, ‘Be fair with everybody,’” he said.
Spezia said he’s aware of the college’s financial concerns, but he would protect its sports programs because they have a community value that reaches beyond direct investment.
He said that was one of his arguments in challenging the college’s estimate of sports’ costs — that community impact wasn’t considered.
“It’s not just about athletics,” he said. “They bring money into this community, they bring revenue here.”
He cited the NJCAA annual basketball tournament specifically.
“It creates jobs and positive media coverage,” he said.

description.hltext_display: 期指主力尚未大举翻多 系统性风险未完全释放
description.content:
您的股票和问题：
您的手机：
本周一开盘期现货指数延续跌势，跳水行情将上周的反弹空间全部吞噬，长阴也将所有均线支撑全部跌穿，但超跌之后周二市场表现企稳并伴有强力反弹，最终收复了大部分失地。近期市场走势来回反复，从主力持仓动向上看，我们认为，期指短期内走势将重回整理格局。
成交量持仓量双现萎缩，期指市场观望情绪浓厚
成交量上，上周各合约整体总成交量为866893手，较前一周1005871成交手数环比下降13.82%，周内日平均成交量为173379手，呈进一步缩减状态；且详细数据显示，在出现大涨行情的周一，成交量达到峰值，此后增减互现。本周二虽迎来中阳上涨，然期指四合约全天成交量却再现缩减，回至212149手，持仓量较前一日小幅增加1691手，仍低于上周日平均持仓水平。持续的量能萎缩，或表明了在这样的牛皮行情之下，在国内紧缩预期阴霾仍未消散的环境之下，在外围地缘政治紧张局势的背景之下，市场保持相对观望态度以及谨慎心态。
多空主力对峙，短期空方略占优势
期指主力合约前20席位多空仓位变化
虽然本周一空单减仓量多于多单减仓量，我们认为是在周一大幅跳水行情中空军的主动平仓行为所致，对盘后净持仓分析，多空持仓差距仍维持高位，前20名会员持卖单手数远远大于持买单手数。另外，周二盘后数据显示主力仍维持较高净空头寸3640手，整体表现偏空。
在IF1012合约转仓至IF1101合约的过程中，两大空头中证期货和国泰君安席位大部分原空头仓位几乎原方向转移至IF1101合约，继续保持空军首位位置，此前积极做多IF1012合约的第一席位华泰长城席位也将其仓位转向偏空方向。在上周五IF1012合约交割当天，国泰君安席位一度大幅增持超过900手的空单头寸，而在本周一先探底后回升的行情之下，日内短线空单获利出局，空单头寸日平仓287手，同时多单头寸也减持133手，净持仓为2022手的重仓空单头寸，其继续看空后市意向明显。截至周二收盘，该席位空单环比大举增仓535手而多单仅仅增加了312手，此外，即使是在日涨幅近3%的情况之下，我们看到位列空头席位第一名的中证期货，对比其4654手的净空头寸持仓，641手的净多头寸显得有些“相形见拙”，而此数据正显示了其对待后市偏谨慎的思路。此外，在这些席位积极做空股指的同时，仍不乏一些非券商系会员的积极做多之举，这或将表明一些主力资金认为期指急跌之后，短期内已经调整到位，后续市场继续下探空间已不大。
总体来看，近期市场参与者信心较为脆弱，谨慎气氛较为浓厚，在系统性风险还未完全释放之前，短期期指仍将反复振荡消化市场担忧情绪。

description.hltext_display: Adidas and Sennheiser make headphones
description.author: Thomas Shambler
description.content:
Adidas has hooked up with audio experts Sennheiser, to launch three ‘trendy’ new headphones. Going for sports style chic, the lug-busting in-ears are laced with Adidas neon-blue, and hope to pack sonic smarts, to boot.
The new designs combine Sennheiser’s renowned sonic smarts with the company’s signature sporty style – starting with the CX 310 in-ear buds. Yours for US$65, this model bundles various sized ear adaptors to fit the most odd shaped lugholes.
For everyday-use the HD 220 headphones, a more modest US$80, sports a closed design to block outside noise, so you can bop along to Miley Cyrus without being interrupted. Fancy yourself as a top disk jockey? Lightweight and comfortable, the HD 25-1-II model offers a more pro quality listening experience but for a more sizeable US$350 outlay. All three models will hit the shops January next year.

description.hltext_display: Tres encapuchados de ETA armados roban material para falsificar identidades
description.content:
Ángeles Escrivá | Madrid
Tres encapuchados armados que se identificaron como miembros de ETA robaron anoche en Francia material para falsificar documentos, tarjetas de crédito y tarjetas de seguridad, según las Fuerzas de Seguridad. Con ellas podrían burlar controles de seguridad. Después huyeron en un coche de la empresa dejando maniatado al único empleado.
El atraco se produjo ayer alrededor de las 20.00 horas en la localidad francesa de Bourg de Peage, Departamento 26, cerca de Lyón, pero la noticia ha trascendido ahora. Fue en una empresa llamada Impuls-France que está especializada en distribución de productos de identificacion automática y desarrollo de sistemas electrónicos relacionados con la seguridad.
Dos hombres y una mujer que dijeron pertenecer a la organización terrorista entraron armados y ocultando su rostro. Tras amenazar con una pistola al único empleado que aún quedaba en la empresa, procedieron al robo de varios programas informáticos (Card Fire, Asure Id, Nice Label y Cod Soft), seis impresoras y 6.000 tarjetas blancas de PVC, formato tarjeta de crédito con bandas magnéticas. Posteriormente, huyeron en un vehículo de la propia empresa dejando maniatado al empleado.
El 'modus operandi' de los asaltantes coincide con el empleado en otras ocasiones por miembros de ETA para cometer actuaciones similares en otras empresas francesas, informa Vasco Press. Los terroristas esperan a que en las instalaciones, previamente vigiladas, quede el menor número de personas para entrar, reducirlas, apoderarse de aquello que han ido a buscar y darse a la fuga, a menudo en los coches de la propia empresa robada.
El municipio de Bourg de Peage, donde se ha producido el robo, se encuentra a unos 100 kilómetros al sur de Lyón y a unos ochenta al oeste de Grenoble. Es una zona en la que los etarras han operado a menudo en los últimos años.
Según recoge Vasco Prss, en Grenoble, en el año 2000, ETA asaltó una empresa de explosivos y se apoderó de una importante cantidad de dinamita. En la misma ciudad se encontró en 2009 un garaje en el que ETA almacenaba 500 kilos de explosivos.
La Policía francesa ha alertado dos veces en tres días de las actividades delictivas de ETA. Los agentes galos sostienen que, a pesar de los rumores de un futuro alto el fuego y de la promesa de haber parado sus acciones armadas, los miembros de la banda terrorista siguen en activo y continúan apuntalando sus labores de logística. Hace dos días la policía francesa incluyó entre los robos efectuados por la organización terrorista el de un coche de la marca Ford Focus.
ZAPATERO Y RUBALCABA MIRAR LO QUE HACEN VUESTROS AMIGUITOS Y ENCIMA LE DAN PERMISO PARA NAVIDADES A LOS ASESINOS ESTOS, ES INCREIBLE LO QUE HACE ESTE GOBIERNO CON LOS TERRORISTA A UN SIMPLE CHIRIZO NO LE DAN PERMISO PERO ALOS ASESINOS SI, EN LAS URNAS LO NOTAREIS.
Debe ser que están preparando la Paz
Y volverán a engañar al Gobierno. Es increible que tropiecen de nuevo en la misma piedra. No se para de cometer irregularidades con los asesinos de ETA, se sacan de las carceles, dandoles un trato de favor, se les absuelven en juicios dudosos y al parecer, se negocia con ellos, y todo para ver si logran que hagan algo de lo que ZP y Rubalcaba puedan presentar a la opinión pública y poder con ello cambiar sus imagenes. Saben que no hay otro camino para acabar con ellos, que los medios policiales y esperar que ETA se rinda es practicamente imposible, así que dejen de marear la perdiz, sigan deteniendo a etarras y no les den mas ventajas, por que ni ellos van a cambiar, ni nuestros Gobernantes van a ser mejor vistos por los votantes. Sr. Rubalcaba cumpla con el deber de acabar con ellos y no mire mas por su imagen, que por cienrto, no está bien vista

description.hltext_display: INL contractor outlines achievements, vision after first five years
description.content:
For the Journal Idaho State Journal | 0 comments
IDAHO FALLS — Nearly 900 new jobs; university collaborations including the Center for Advanced Energy Studies; more than $50 million in laboratory investments; business volume nearly doubling to $1 billion; unprecedented input for the nation’s energy agenda. After five years managing Idaho National Laboratory, its contractor has produced two reports highlighting accomplishments and plans for maintaining momentum.
“INL — The First Five Years” and the “INL 2012-2021 Ten-Year Site Plan” represent a look back at how far INL has come since its creation in 2005 and a look forward to where it’s headed. Combined with an upcoming five-year review of sitewide cleanup progress, Idahoans have a unique opportunity to assess whether the U.S. Department of Energy’s vision for its Idaho site is being realized.
“Halfway through, the lab has made significant strides and cleanup is progressing smoothly,” said Rick Provencher, DOE Idaho Operations Office manager, in a recent opinion for Idaho newspapers. “DOE expects that progress to continue so our 10-year vision for INL will be realized.”
In 2005, DOE split the former Idaho National Engineering and Environmental Laboratory into the research-focused INL and the legacy-focused Idaho Cleanup Project. DOE envisioned INL becoming “the pre-eminent, internationally recognized nuclear energy research, development and demonstration laboratory within 10 years.”
The First Five Years report outlines the progress INL contractor Battelle Energy Alliance has made toward that goal. The report highlights six critical attributes BEA sought to achieve, and its progress to date. Accomplishments include:
• Revitalizing nuclear education and research, with an emphasis on collaboration with Idaho universities — Idaho university enrollment in nuclear disciplines has grown from double digits to more than 400, for example.
• Investing in INL facilities, including 10 new buildings and more than $20 million for maintenance and upgrades at INL’s Advanced Test Reactor.
• Leading development of a collaborative U.S. nuclear energy research agenda.
The benefits of these accomplishments spread throughout Idaho, as illustrated in the recent INL Impacts report conducted by Boise State University economists. It concluded that in 2009 alone, INL directly and indirectly accounted for more than 24,000 Idaho jobs, paid more than $135 million to the state in taxes and fees, contributed $2.5 million to Idaho universities for employees’ continuing education, and made charitable contributions exceeding $33 million and 240,000 volunteer hours.
Such contributions will persist as the lab continues its transformation into the nation’s pre-eminent nuclear energy lab. INL’s Ten-Year Site Plan outlines this vision, including:
• At least four new buildings in Idaho Falls, and consolidated and modernized facilities both in town and at the desert Site.
• More National Scientific User Facility capabilities to enhance collaboration with universities, other national labs and industry researchers across the country.
• Input to help DOE respond to National Academy of Sciences recommendations for investment in research capabilities and a process for prioritizing, evaluating and obtaining them.
You can read both reports at the links below.
INL—The First Five Years: http://www.inl.gov/portal-files/inl-the-first-five-years.pdf
INL Ten-Year Site Plan: http://www.inl.gov/portal-files/inl-ten-year-site-plan-2012-2021.pdf
INL is one of the DOE’s 10 multiprogram national laboratories. The laboratory performs work in each of DOE’s strategic goal areas: energy, national security, science and environment. INL is the nation’s leading center for nuclear energy research and development. Day-to-day management and operation of the laboratory is the responsibility of Battelle Energy Alliance.

event_or_fact.property: ?Halfway through, the lab has made significant strides and cleanup is progressing smoothly,?

description.hltext_display: El Ibex consolida los 10.200 puntos
description.author: La Nueva España
description.content:
El selectivo abre sesión con una subida del 0,31% en una jornada con pocos valores en negativo
EP El parqué madrileño ha abierto la sesión con una subida del 0,31%, que ha situado al Ibex 35 en el nivel de los 10.235,5 puntos, en una jornada con pocos valores en negativo en los primeros minutos de cotización. En concreto, Banesto cedía un 0,64%, seguido de Acciona (-0,47%), Iberia y Bankinter (-0,09%) y Gas Natural, Técnicas Reunidas y ACS (-0,04%). Por el contrario, el mayor ascenso era par BME (+1,4%), por delante de Sacyr Vallehermoso (+1,2%), Abengoa (+1,09%) y Abertis (+1,08%).En el sector financiero, BBVA subía un 0,45%, Banco Santander, un 0,23%, Banco Popular, un 0,12% y Banco Sabadell, un 0,09%. Repsol YPF, Iberdrola y Telefónica, por su parte, subían un 0,74%, un 0,34% y un 0,23%, respectivamente.En Europa, los principales indicadores mostraban signo dispar, ya que París cedía un 0,10%, mientras Francfort avanzaba un 0,03%. En el mercado de divisas, el euro mantiene posiciones frente al dólar y al inicio de la sesión bursátil el cambio entre las dos monedas quedaba fijado en 1,3144 unidades.

description.hltext_display: Zapatero: 'Los ataques no responden a los fundamentos de nuestra economía'
description.content:
Marisa Cruz | Madrid
El presidente del Gobierno se ha dirigido al pleno del Congreso para informar de los resultados del último Consejo Europeo y lo ha hecho reconociendo que el contexto económico actual es de "elevada incertidumbre" y admitiendo que "la reacción de los mercados afecta a España". No obstante, también ha advertido de que los ataques de los mercados "no responden a los fundamentos de nuestra economía".
Zapatero que ha valorado como paso histórico la decisión de los 27 de "hacer todo lo necesario para garantizar la estabilidad del euro", ha asegurado que por parte española el Gobierno responderá a la tormenta financiera "con reducción del déficit, con compromiso con las reformas y con una total transparencia".
Para reforzar el valor de sus palabras el presidente del Gobierno ha hecho hincapié en su determinación de presentar el próximo 28 de enero el texto legal que concrete las propuestas de reforma del sistema de pensiones.
Este texto tendrá, según ha afirmado, "el mismo grado de ambición en cuanto al propósito de garantizar la sostenibilidad de nuestro sistema público de pensiones que la propuesta inicial del Gobierno de enero de 2010, y que recogerá, además, las recomendaciones de la subcomisión parlamentaria del Pacto de Toledo".
El presidente del Gobierno ha señalado que "aún el peligro no está conjurado", pero se ha mostrado convencido de que la voluntad firme de la UE de reforzar su disciplina presupuestaria, establecer automaticidad en el proceso de sanciones para quienes incumplan el Pacto de Estabilidad, fijar un marco de supervisión macroeconómica estricto e intensificar la cooperación de las políticas económicas, permitirán garantizar la estabilidad de la moneda común y el futuro de los europeos.
Zapatero se ha mostrado plenamente partidario de acabar construyendo una verdadera política común con fiscalidad armonizada para emprender un "camino histórico que abre una grandísima oportunidad para Europa".

description.hltext_display: Big East Roundup: No bricks for Irish against Stony Brook (12/20/2010)
description.content:
Carleton Scott was perfect. Ben Hansbrough just helped out.
Scott made all eight of his shots, including four 3-pointers, and scored 20 points to lead No. 24 Notre Dame to an 88-62 victory against Stony Brook Sunday at Joyce Center in Notre Dame, Ind.
Hansbrough had 14 points with eight assists and Tim Abromaitis scored 22 points for Notre Dame (10-1).
"Ben has been unbelievable at finding shooters," Notre Dame coach Mike Brey said. "I don't know if we have had a better guy at doing that."
Marcus Rouse led Stony Brook (4-6) with 15 points while Anthony Jackson added 12 and Dave Coley had 11.
Notre Dame began the second half with a 17-7 run. That followed a 12-2 run before the break which began after the Seawolves made it 29-26 with 5:36 to go.
Jack Cooley's three-point play with less than five minutes gone in the second half made it 58-35.
"Scott is a hard guard, especially for us," Stony Brook coach Steve Pikiell said. "We are used to [tall] guys being around the basket. He got it going early and when he is on he is as good as there is."
Pikiell said the Fighting Irish remind him of Connecticut, only bigger.
"UConn has Kemba Walker who is a terrific player who kind of runs the whole thing but Notre Dame has five players with Eric Atkins coming off the bench and they are not going to shoot themselves in the foot," Pikiell said. "Notre Dame is well-coached, they are veterans, and they have an inside guy who can really post in and then pass back to 6-8 or 6-9 guys on the perimeter. I think they will be a tough game for anybody when they have that kind of size and that kind of passing ability." Seton Hall 68, New Jersey Institute of Technology 45: Freshman forward Fuquan Edwin scored 14 points to pace a balanced scoring attack, leading Seton Hall (6-4) past NJIT (2-6).

description.hltext_display: Juventudes Socialistas de Extremadura aprueba una resolución contra la violencia de género
description.content:
La organización Juventudes Socialistas de Extremadura (JSEx) ha aprobado por unanimidad una resolución contra la "lacra" de la violencia de género, durante el comité regional del colectivo celebrado este pasado martes.
Tu nombre Email destino
Enviado
MÉRIDA, 22 (EUROPA PRESS)
La organización Juventudes Socialistas de Extremadura (JSEx) ha aprobado por unanimidad una resolución contra la "lacra" de la violencia de género, durante el comité regional del colectivo celebrado este pasado martes.
Además, ha criticado que "todavía nadie del Ayuntamiento de Badajoz, ni su alcalde, Miguel Celdrán, ha explicado por qué se ha rechazado la implantación de una oficina de la mujer en una ciudad de 150.000 habitantes que fue propuesta por el Instituto de la Mujer de Extremadura, IMEX, y que fue rechazada por el alcalde de Badajoz"
"En esta sociedad no nos podemos permitir actitudes machistas como la que representa la figura de Miguel Celdrán y más teniendo la responsabilidad de regir un ciudad tan importante como la que tiene él", recalca la organización juvenil en nota de prensa.
Por otra parte, la Comisión Ejecutiva Regional de JSEx ha hecho balance de su gestión al frente de la organización. Según el secretario general, Juan Ramón Ferreira "JSEx ha cumplido su calendario de actividades que se aprobaron en enero".
El secretario general de los jóvenes socialistas ha enumerado las diferentes actividades que la comisión ejecutiva regional ha puesto al servicio de los jóvenes este año, como son las jornadas de inmigración que se realizaron en Talayuela, la Escuela de Formación Margarita Nelken en Badajoz, el Comité Federal celebrado en Cáceres, o el trabajo interno que la asociación juvenil ha realizado durante meses para la Conferencia Política del PSOE ha sido "mucho más que positivo", para la cual JSEx presentó más de 150 enmiendas de las cuales "muchas fueron bien recibidas".
Para terminar, Ferreira no se olvida de los "tiempos difíciles" actuales, en los que ha recalcado "el compromiso de esta organización por y para los jóvenes".

description.hltext_display: 《佣兵天下》全新版本精美美术资源放送
description.author: zolgame
description.content:
“《佣兵天下》将开启，艾米大陆起干戈！”玩家期盼已久的奇幻战争史诗网游《佣兵天下》下阶段测试版本初露端倪，并将逐步揭开神秘面纱。十二大全新副本充满挑战，剧情迷你副本再现经典佣兵情节，全新团战一触即发，休闲玩法趣味横生，而大量美术资源的更新，更是给玩家带来了前所未有的新鲜感觉，仿佛进入了一个崭新的佣兵世界！ 《佣兵天下》官方网站：http://yb.linekong.com
《佣兵天下》官方论坛：http://bbs.yb.linekong.com 全新气势恢宏 艾米诺尔大陆幅员辽阔，山河壮丽，艾米帝国、神圣教廷、修斯帝国三大势力盘踞其间，边界线犬牙交错，战争一触即发！当玩家轻敲“N”键，一幅全新绘制的《佣兵天下》便会映入您的眼帘。茂密的森林，广袤的大地，奔涌的河流一目了然。盘踞在西北方的艾米帝国占据了面积最大的领土，实力雄厚；东方的神圣教廷拥有最肥沃的花语平原，物产丰富；固守西南的修斯帝国背靠强大后援，实力也不容小觑。鼠标点击三大帝国的势力范围，还可查看地图详情，容易迷路的佣兵玩家，赶快收藏一幅吧。 全新游戏场景流连忘返
下阶段测试版本中即将现身的十二大全新副本；精心设计的剧情迷你副本；充满战争氛围的佣兵团战场景……每一个新增内容都会带给玩家完全新鲜的游戏体验，而精心设计的新增场景或景色怡人，或阴森幽暗，或杀机暗伏，或剑拔弩张，带给玩家身临其境的全新感受，畅享游戏精彩画面，感受场景无穷魅力！ 全新怪物模型劲爆眼球
下阶段测试即将来临，艾米诺尔大陆上的怪物们也都开始蠢蠢欲动，想在测试期间亮亮相，显显身手了。盘踞在艾米诺尔大陆深泽大川、山谷洞穴中的怪物们将露出庐山真面目，勇敢无畏的佣兵玩家们，赶快擦亮你们的剑盾，准备去挑战这些令人恐惧的怪物们吧！ 《佣兵天下》下阶段测试即将开启！艾米诺尔大陆再动干戈！等待已久的佣兵勇士们，拿起你们闪亮的武器，创造属于你的佣兵传说！在这个剑与魔法交织的时代，在这个荣耀与梦想闪亮的世界，《佣兵天下》成就玩家英雄梦想！带您体验“荣誉即吾辈生命”的战斗激情！

description.hltext_display: City council approves tax levy
description.content:
DANVILLE — Prior to a unanimous vote by the nine city council members present Tuesday night to approve the 2010 property tax levy, Ward 7 Alderman Steve Foster was the lone alderman to speak.
Foster said after years of increasing resident’s property taxes by about 8 percent, he supports the decreased levy and abating part of the sales tax increase.
He also asked city officials to consider rescinding the 8 percent property tax increase since 2003 with potential revenue from a new casino if the city is to acquire a riverboat. A bill designating a casino license for Danville, among others, has passed the Illinois Senate and awaits action by the House.
Foster said this would “start off the boon to our city and give (property tax funding) back to citizens.”
Aldermen absent Tuesday night were: Dale Brandenburg, Terry Baldwin, Lois Cooper Mike Puhr and Jerry Askren.
The city’s 2010 $6.93 million property tax levy is a 2.47 percent decrease from last year’s levy amount.
The tax rate is estimated at $1.93 per $100 assessed valuation compared to $1.98 per $100 assessed valuation last year.
Of the tax levy, the abated portion (which includes tax dollars created through the new sales tax) of the $1.5 million bond and interest levied amount was increased to $600,000 from $373,850 last year, to keep the total tax levy down.
Also Tuesday, the council:
Heard from Sharon Sawka, social services director at the Salvation Army, about the importance of U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development funding to her agency.
She cited two examples of families who lost everything in fires. The Salvation Army was able to pick up where the American Red Cross left off due to its limited resources and helped the families with motel stays, food, clothing, first month’s rent and other items.
“It’s because of (the HUD funding) that we’re able to help people,” Sawka said, adding that the Salvation Army had 139 cases of helping people this year.
Approved a zoning change to allow Wright’s Heating and Air Conditioning to move and expand to South Gilbert Street.
The city requested that Chapter 150 of the city code, known as the Danville Zoning Ordinance, be amended to allow for “HVAC sales and service” as a permitted use in the B2 Highway Business Zoning District.
Accepted $26,526 in grant funds provided by the Illinois Department of Commerce and Economic Opportunity through the Champaign County Regional Planning Commission to improve energy efficiency and decrease utility costs at the city’s municipal building.
The city’s local match would be up to $1,881 for occupancy sensors, electronic ballasts and high-efficient fluorescent lamps.
Approved a $43,100 contract with Clark Dietz, Inc. for engineering services to replace the pump station at the end of South Shorewood Drive in the Lake Shores Subdivision.
Approved an $18,300 contract with Clark Dietz, Inc. for Phase 1 engineering services to replace the pump station on the west side of Denmark Road at the northern city limits.
Approved a $42,840 contract with A&R Services to rehabilitate the Bell Street pump station and a $1.3 million contract with Duce Construction to replace sewers with structural, alignment and/or size issues in the alleys between Franklin and Walnut and Walnut and Vermilion from Clay to Walnut streets.

event_or_fact.property: the Salvation Army had 139 cases of helping people this year.

强化等级突破传统

高段位技能开放

废墟化与守卫BUFF的实施，攻城战强力升级

description.hltext_display: Saint Petersburg hosts Sargsyan-Putin meeting today
Bulls' eyes on target in win over 76ers
description.content:
CHICAGO -- Derrick Rose and Luol Deng each scored 22 points as the Chicago Bulls beat the 76ers 121-76 on Tuesday night for their eighth win in nine games. Despite missing two big men, Chicago dominated nearly every offensive category and recorded its most lopsided win of the season.
Rose also had 12 assists for his seventh double-double, while Carlos Boozer had 16 points and 11 rebounds, and Kurt Thomas added 12 points.
Andre Iguodala scored 17 points and reserve Thaddeus Young added 12 for the Sixers.
Chicago trailed only in the opening minute, then used a 10-0 run later in the first quarter to open its first double-digit lead. The advantage grew to 90-50 with 1:01 left in the third, and reached 50 points with less than five minutes to play.
"I told the guys that I'll give you one," said 76ers coach Doug Collins, whose team entered the game on a 6-2 run. "In the NBA you're going to have games like this, it just happens.
"It'll be easier (tonight at Boston). Our effort will be better. We were just discombobulated on offense tonight. I didn't recognize us out there. I didn't even know what plays we were running."
Rose shook off a sore right wrist and scored 11 points in the first quarter. Deng added 10 as the Bulls opened a 33-19 lead. Chicago made 10 of its first 14 shots.
The Bulls' lead never slipped under 10 points in the second quarter. Korver had eight points off the bench, including a pair of 3-pointers, to help the Bulls to a 61-43 lead by intermission.
The lead passed 30 points during a 16-0 run, and hit 40 with 1:01 remaining when Rose hit his second 3-pointer of the game to open a 90-50 lead. James Johnson's two free throws with less than five minutes to play pushed the lead past 50.
